http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: TiCl4水解法制备TiO2纳米颗粒包覆Ag纳米线阵列结构
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 王鸣，张敬霖，张建福，赵栋梁
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 钢铁研究总院功能材料研究所,精密合金技术北京市重点实验室，北京 100081
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 采用水热法制备了TiO2纳米颗粒包覆Ag纳米线阵列结构。通过选区电子衍射手段确定了TiO2包覆层的晶体结构为锐钛矿。研究了TiCl4溶液浓度和温度对TiO2/Ag包覆结构形貌的影响，结果显示01 mol/L的TiCl4溶液能够得到连续均匀的TiO2包覆层，当TiCl4溶液浓度高于01 mol/L时，水解产生的HCl在水热环境下会对Ag纳米线造成不同程度的腐蚀。80 ℃条件下能够得到较为均匀的TiO2包覆层和较高的结晶度；温度过低时，TiO2包覆层的结晶不明显，温度过高时，水解产生的HCl会对Ag纳米线产生腐蚀。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: TiO2 Coated Ag Nanowire Array Fabricated by Hydrolysis of TiCl4 Aqueous Solution
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：TiO2 nanoparticles coated Ag nanowire array was fabricated by hydrothermal procedure. The structure of TiO2 coating layer was detected as anatase phase by SAED. The influence of temperature and TiCl4 concentration on the morphology of TiO2/Ag coating structure was studied. It was found that continuous and uniform TiO2 coating layer could be prepared with a 0.1 mol/L TiCl4 concentration. Corrosion of Ag nanowires happened when TiCl4 concentration was higher than 0.1 mol/L. Uniform TiO2 coating layer could be prepared with a certain degree of crystallization at 80 ℃.When the temperature is lower than 80 ℃, crystallization of the coating layer is not obvious. Corrosion of Ag nanowires happened when the temperature is too high.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 超磁致伸缩材料的性能测试及应用
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 陈白宁，陈洁，周卓
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 沈阳理工大学机械工程学院，辽宁 沈阳 110159
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 测试了Terfenol-D磁致伸缩棒的磁致伸缩性能，并利用此性能在机械构件上推广应用。取Terfenol-D磁致伸缩棒放在测试仪上，对测试仪进行加压、通电、标定等进行初始化，然后给测试仪线圈传送变化的电流值，不同的电流会引起磁致伸缩棒周围按照一定规律变化，最后观察传送回的应变位移数据，通过这些数据进行计算、总结、图表分析。Terfenol-D磁致伸缩棒磁致伸缩系数在磁场强度增加初期增长率较小，当驱动磁场强度继续增加时，磁致伸缩系数增加得很快并且线性较好，当磁场强度再持续增加时，磁致伸缩系数增长开始变缓，并逐渐趋于饱和状态。Terfenol-D磁致伸缩棒的磁致伸缩性能优于其他材料，并可以对位移进行更加精确地控制。
keywords_cn: 超磁致伸缩材料 性能测试 测试仪 应用
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: The Performance Test and Application of Giant Magnetostrictive Materials
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Terfenol-D magnetostrictive stick was placed on the tester that was initialized through compressing, electrifying and demarcating. Then tester coil was charged with the variational electricity. Different electric currents can cause regularly changes around the magnetostriction stick. Finally the strain displacement data transmitted were surveyed, and computations, summaries, and graph analyses were conducted based on these data. The rate of increment of Terfenol-D magnetostrictive stick magnetostriction coefficient was small during the origin period of magnetic field strength increasing. When actuating magnetic field strength continued to increase, the magnetostriction coefficient increased very quickly, and the linearity was good. When the magnetic field strength increased continuously, the magnetostriction coefficient became increasing slowly, and gradually tended to saturated condition. Magnetostrictive performance of Terfenol-D magnetostrictive stick surpasses other materials, and may carry on to the displacement controls precisely.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.citation:

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 朱二涛1,2,羊建高1,2,3,谭兴龙2,邓军旺2,戴煜2,郭圣达1,3
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn:
1.江西理工大学材料科学与工程学院，江西 赣州 341000
2. 湖南顶立科技有限公司,湖南 长沙 410118
3.江西理工大学工程研究院，江西 赣州 341000
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 以水溶性醋酸钴代替金属钴粉与WC粉、纯水、微量炭黑和有机碳球磨混匀，经喷雾造粒，H2还原制备WC-Co热喷涂粉。结果表明：当进风温度260 ℃、出风温度140 ℃、转速10000 r/min所制备的粉末粒度在10～80 μm,平均粒度为35 μm。在1250 ℃下，H2还原WC-Co粉末接近共晶温度，产生大量液相，粉末合金化。中空球形颗粒，在重力作用下生成的液相开始流动，填充孔隙，使粉末颗粒密实、颗粒收缩、薄壁变厚，松装密度增大，粉末粒度在10～50 μm、平均粒度为25 μm，Co相均匀包覆球形WC颗粒。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Preparation of WC-Co Thermal Spraying Powder by Spray Granulation-H2 Reduction Process
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Thermal spray feeder powder of WC-Co was prepared by H2 reduction of the perform by spray drying granulating of ball milled mixture started from water soluble cobalt acetate, WC powder, pure water, solid carbon powder and liquid organic carbon. It was shown that during spraying drying granulating process, particle size range is from 10 μm to 80 μm, with mean particle size around 35 μm, when inlet air temperature is 260 ℃,outlet temperature is 140 ℃ and when revolving speed of the spray drying nozzle is 10000 r/min. It was also shown that during H2 reduction process, when powder was heated up to 1250 ℃,which is near the eutectic temperature, liquid phase was formed in the powder, leading to alloy of elements, shrink of the particle and increase of bulk density. Powder obtained had particle size from 10 μm to 50 μm, with mean particle size around 25 μm. SEM shown that cobalt phase was uniformly distributed in the particle.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 含钨高温合金钨夹杂成因的研究
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 于腾，刘宁，李凤艳，王志刚
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 抚顺特殊钢股份有限公司技术中心，辽宁 抚顺 113001
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 研究了含钨高温合金棒材中钨夹杂的形貌、来源及形成原因。研究结果表明，含钨高温合金棒材中钨夹杂的来源是用于合金电极棒焊接的钨电极。氩弧焊钨电极的消耗是钨夹杂形成的原因；结构不合理的等离子弧焊枪导致等离子焊机设备没有形成真正意义的等离子弧，加热能力下降，如果使用的焊接电流越大，熔化的可能性越大，合金出现钨夹杂的几率也越大。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Forming Reasons of Tungsten Inclusion in Tungsten-Containing Superalloy
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The morphology, origin and forming reason of tungsten inclusion in tungsten-containing superalloy was investigated systematically. The results demonstrate that tungsten electrode for the welding of tungsten-containing superalloy electrode was the origin of tungsten inclusion. The loss of tungsten electrode for argon arc welding was the forming reason of tungsten inclusion. The true plasmas arc cannot form because of the unreasonable structure of welding torch for plasmas welding. Thus, the capacity to heat was decreasing. In the same times, with the increasing of electric current for welding, the probability of tungsten electrode melting was increasing, and the probability of tungsten inclusion was increasing.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.citation:

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 电沉积制备纳米晶铁-镍-铬合金箔工艺及机理研究
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 邓姝皓1,2，王妹1,2，潘颖1,2，付振昌1，刘晗1
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn:
1.中南大学材料科学与工程学院，湖南 长沙410083
2.中南大学有色金属教育部重点实验室，湖南 长沙，410083
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 以复合羧酸为配位剂，在含三价铬离子的水溶液中，电沉积制备Fe-Ni-Cr合金箔，研究铬盐浓度、电流密度和供电方式等对箔成分和成箔性能的影响，采用SEM、TEM、XRD和EDS对合金箔进行表征，对合金箔的力学、电和耐蚀性能进行研究，并研究合金箔沉积机理。结果表明，采用复合羧酸体系脉冲电沉积可制备出Cr的质量分数为5%~8 %的高Cr光滑合金箔，其微观形貌为紧密堆砌的球状颗粒，晶粒尺寸10 nm以内，主相为Cr与α-Fe或γ-Fe形成的固溶体。合金箔中Cr含量提高，箔的电阻率、硬度和耐蚀性也随之升高。Fe-Ni-Cr合金共沉积为电化学控制，由于Cr3+加入，合金沉积阻力加大，速度降低。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Electrodeposition and Mechanism of Nanocrystalline Fe-Ni-Cr Alloy Foil
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Fe-Ni-Cr alloy foils were electrodeposited from trivalent chromium ion bath containing composite carboxylic acids as complexing agent. The effects of concentration of trivalent chromic salt, electrodeposition current density and mode of power supply on composition of alloy foil and foil-formability were investigated. The Fe-Ni-Cr alloy foil was characterized by means of SEM, EDS and XRD. The properties of alloy foil and the mechanism of alloy electrodeposition were also studied. An alloy foil is prepared by pulse electrodeposition in composite carboxylic acids system which contains 5%~8% (mass fraction) Cr. The microstructure results indicate the alloy foil piled up compactly with sphericity and its grain size is less than 10 nm; and the main phases are the α-Fe or γ-Fe interstitial solid solution with Cr. The more the content of Cr in alloy foil is, the more the electrical resistance, micro-hardness and anti-corrosion resistance of alloy foil are. Furthermore, the rate controlled step of alloy electrodeposition is charge transfer process. When trivalent chromium ion is added in electrolyte, the velocity lowers while the deposition resistance increases.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 取向硅钢和非晶薄带两种样品在搭接处无压力和压力为1 N的情况下，软磁性能测量结果存在的差异不同。测量结果显示，硅钢搭接处有无压力对激磁功率和损耗测量结果影响不大；而非晶薄带搭接处有压力时的激磁功率和损耗测量结果明显高于无压力时的测量结果，当磁感强度为14 T时，激磁功率高出约15%，损耗值高出约58%。

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Soft magnetic properties of grain-oriented electrical steels and amorphous strips show different measurement results when the pressure upon the lap joints is zero or 1 N. The result shows that the values of exciting power and core loss measured is almost the same for grain-oriented electrical steels. As to amorphous ribbons, the values of exciting power and core loss measured is obviously larger with pressuring upon the lap joints, when the magnetic flux density is 1.4 T, the exciting power is 15% higher and the core loss is 5.8% higher.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 脉冲磁场高温合金凝固细晶技术的工业应用分析
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 陈国军1，张永杰1,2，王恩刚1，杨院生3
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn:
1.东北大学材料电磁过程教育部重点实验室，辽宁 沈阳 110819
2. 宝钢集团中央研究院能源与环境研究所,上海 201900
3. 中国科学院金属研究所，辽宁 沈阳 110016
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 脉冲磁场能够有效细化金属凝固晶粒，正逐渐走向工业化应用阶段。针对高品质电工钢、铁素体不锈钢、高速钢以及镍基高温合金等四大类合金容易存在偏析、疏松等凝固问题，提出施加低频脉冲磁场于连铸工业生产过程。计算了低频脉冲磁场施加于连铸足辊段、二冷段和凝固末端，所需临界磁感应强度值分别为0.0845 T、0.122 T和0.182 T。随着低频脉冲磁场施加位置坯壳厚度增加，临界磁感应强度增加，同时调整占空比，可降低临界磁感应强度。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Industrial Analysis of Grain Refinement Under Pulsed Magnetic Field During Superalloy Solidification
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The pulse magnetic field (PMF) can effectively refine metal grains of solidification, and is gradually in stage of industrializing application. It is prone to generating macro-segregation, loose of solidification problems for the Si steel, ferritic stainless steel, high speed steel and nickel alloy. So applying the PMF is put forward in continuous casting. The PMF is applied to the foot roller section, two cold sections and the solidification end of the continuous casting, and the critical magnetic flux density is respectively 0.0845 T, 0.122 T and 0.182 T. With shell thickness increasing of PMF applied position, the critical magnetic flux density increases, and adjusting the duty cycle can reduce the critical magnetic induction.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 车用镍氢电池性能优良、安全可靠、技术成熟稳定，是混合动力车(HEV)比较理想的辅助动力。随着混合动力车技术的不断发展，动力电池用储氢合金将迎来一个黄金发展期。此外，随着燃料电池技术的日益成熟与发展，以氢气为燃料的电动汽车也将迅速发展起来，这就要求必须有安全高效的贮氢系统与之相匹配。传统的液态及高压气态贮氢方式由于成本、质量、体积大小以及安全性等因素限制，无法应用于车载贮氢系统。相比之下，金属氢化物作为一种新型的能源材料，具有贮氢密度高、安全高效及环境友好等优点，将成为未来车载燃料电池的氢载体。文章主要对近期Ni/MH电池用储氢合金的种类和发展以及高容量镁基储氢材料方面的研究工作做一些综述分析，以期为未来的研究工作提供参考。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Application and Development of Hydrogen Storage Materials
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The vehicle Ni-MH battery is an ideal auxiliary power for hybrid electric vehicle (HEV) as secure and reliable, mature and stable technology, and excellent performance. With the continuous development of hybrid technology, hydrogen storage alloys for power battery will access to a golden development period. Furthermore, with the growing maturity and development of fuel cell technology, hydrogen as fuel of electric vehicle will be also developed rapidly. Therefore, an efficient and safe system of hydrogen storage is needs to establish. The traditional hydrogen storage facilities, such as pressurized gas hydrogen and liquid hydrogen, can not be used in on-board transport applications because of their costs, weight, volume and safety. In contrast, metal hydrides stood as new energy materials have higher hydrogen storage density and are environmentally friendly. Hence metal hydrides storage is a safe and volume-efficient storage carrier for on-board vehicle applications. In the present article the category and development of hydrogen materials as well as the Mg based alloys has been discussed, for offering reference for subsequent studies.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: CeO2稀土对激光熔覆Zr60Al10Ni10Cu20金属玻璃复合涂层性能改善的研究
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 王震,闫岸如,王智勇
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 北京工业大学激光工程研究院，北京100124
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 向Zr60Al10Ni10Cu20 金属玻璃涂层合金粉末中添加质量分数为1%的CeO2粉末制成混合粉末，采用大功率半导体激光器通过同轴送粉方式，在Q235钢基材上制备熔覆层。通过与未添加CeO2稀土粉末的Zr60Al10Ni10Cu20涂层进行对比，利用EDAX、XRD分析研究了稀土加入对熔覆层相结构的影响，用显微硬度计测试了复合涂层的硬度,并采用失重法测定了该金属玻璃在不同浓度的 HCl 溶液中的腐蚀速率。结果表明：由于稀土的加入，涂层中的非晶成分增加，复合涂层的硬度提高了约10%,并且腐蚀速率降低了约37%。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Effects of CeO2 rare earth addition on enhancement of microstructure and mechanical properties of Zr60Al10Ni10Cu20 metallic glass composite coatings by laser cladding
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Zr60Al10Ni10Cu20 BMGs coatings powder added with 1% CeO2 were clad on Q235 steel substrates by high power semiconductor laser. By comparing the coatings with the addition of CeO2 with the coating without CeO2, The effect of rare earth addition on phase structure of coatings was investigated by energy-dispersive analysis of X-rays(EDAX),X-ray diffraction(XRD).The microhardness of the coatings were measured by microhardness tester. The corrosion rate of BMGs in different concentration of HCl was measured by weight loss method. The results indicated that with the addition of CeO2,the content of amorphous phases was increased, the microhardness and corrosion resistance of the coatings were improved.

2.鞍钢股份有限公司冷轧硅钢厂，辽宁 鞍山 114021
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 对120牌号取向硅钢成品板进行激光刻痕，研究工作电流、激光频率、刻痕速率等参数对细化磁畴及铁损值的影响规律。在此基础上分析了不同工艺下的刻痕表面形貌及磁畴细化的程度。结果表明，该样品优化的刻痕参数：工作电流12 A、激光频率3 500 Hz、刻痕速率800 mm/s，该参数下P1.7可降低945%。不同参数下样品表面刻痕形貌差异较大，刻痕蚀点刚好连续时磁畴细化效果最好；激光刻痕后，磁畴宽度明显减小，但显著细化区分布很不均匀。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Optimization of laser scribing parameters and the analysis of underlying mechanism in a grain-oriented silicon steel
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：A 120-brand grain-oriented silicon steel was scribed using laser beam. The parameters such as working current, frequency and scribing rate and the corresponding iron loss were examined to reveal the effect on domain refinement. Then the surface morphologies of scribed samples by different parameters and the effect of domain refinement were analyzed. The results show that the reduction in iron loss is most significant under the parameters of 12 A working current, 3 500 Hz in frequency and 800 mm/s of scribing rate. The surface morphologies of scribed samples under different parameters exhibit great diversity, and the effect of domain refinement is best when the scribing pots build a continuous band. After laser scribing, the width of domain obviously reduced, but the refinement is un-uniform.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 采用固相合成法制备了铝酸镧光学镀膜材料，其物相组成为LaAlO3与LaAl11O18。通过改变电子束物理气相沉积（EB-PVC）法淀积铝酸镧薄膜时的工艺条件，得出了薄膜的折射率及消光系数随淀积工艺的变化情况。在可见光范围内，膜层的折射率随工艺的不同在165~18之间变化，消光系数在10-4数量级；光学性能优异，具有很好的应用前景。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Preparation and properties of lanthanum aluminate with middle refractive index
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Lanthanum aluminate optical coating material was prepared by solid state synthesis，the phase composition is LaAlO3 and LaAl11O18.The film was obtained by EB-PVD.Optical properties of refractive index and extinction coefficient were researched with the changed of depositing conditions.In the visible region，the refractive index is in the range of 1.65 to 1.8 with the change of depositing processes,and the extinction coefficient is in the magnitude order of 10-4.The material has a promising prospect in industrialization in optical coating due to its superior qualities.

2.东北大学材料与冶金学院，辽宁 沈阳 110819
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 研究了箱式炉800~900 ℃区间恒温退火制度控制下，对035 mm厚度规格、硅的质量分数为26%~28%的无取向高牌号硅钢织构组分及性能的影响。结果表明，随着退火温度的升高，成品晶粒尺寸逐渐增大且均匀性得到改善；{111}织构组分占有率呈现下降的趋势， 最佳铁损指标可达到900 ℃时的218 W/kg；磁极化强度变化不显著，由800 ℃时的1685 T降低到900 ℃时的1678 T。

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: The effect of annealing temperature on structure and properties of high-grade thin non-oriented silicon steel
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The effect of 0.35 mm cool rolled plate high grade non-oriented electric steel(mass fraction 2.6%~28%) annealing at 800~900 ℃ by box-furnace on structure ,texture and properties was researched. The results showed that with increasing annealing temperature of cool rolled plate, the grain size increased, {111}texture reduced, the best iron loss value was 218 W/Kg at 900 ℃, and the magnetic induction was changed unconspicuous ,decreased from 1685 T at 800 ℃ to1678 T at 900 ℃.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 骆忠汉1，汪汝武1,2，曾春1，刘振宇3，张凤泉1
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn:
1.国家硅钢工程技术研究中心，湖北 武汉 430080
2. 冶金工业过程系统科学湖北省重点实验室，湖北 武汉 430081
3. 东北大学轧制技术及连轧自动化国家重点实验室，辽宁 沈阳 110819
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 利用双辊连铸-温轧-中间退火-平整轧制-最终退火工艺制备了厚度为0.50 mm、质量分数为6.5 %Si的硅钢薄带。利用光学显微镜、X射线衍射仪和磁性测量研究了不同的平整轧制量对最终退火板的金相显微组织、织构和磁性的影响。结果表明：退火板的平均晶粒尺寸随平整量的增加而逐渐减小，且晶粒尺寸差异减小。当平整量大于12%时，最终退火板表面织构为λ织构，中心层出现明显的γ织构，并且γ织构强度随平整量减小出现增强的趋势。当平整量较小时，织构强点比较分散。随着平整量的增加，最终退火板磁感应强度先减小而后增加。随平整量的增加，低频铁损先快速减小而后缓慢增加，而高频铁损则是逐渐下降。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Effects of temper rolling rate on the microstructure, texture and magnetic properties of Fe-6.5%Si thin strip
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：A Fe-6.5%Si steel thin strip with a final thickness of 0.50 mm was produced by twin-roll continuous casting-warm rolling-intermediate annealing-temper rolling-final annealing process. The effects of temper rolling rate on microstructure, texture and magnetic properties of the annealing strips were investigated with optical microscopy, X-ray diffraction and magnetic measurement. The results show that the average grain size of the annealing strips decreases gradually with increasing temper rolling rate, and the size difference between the grains decreases. When the temper rolling rate is larger than 12%, the surface texture of the annealing strips is λ texture and the obvious γ texture appears in the middle of the strips, its intensity increases with decreasing temper rolling rate. When the temper rolling rate is lower than 12%, the distribution of texture is dispersed. The magnetic induction of the annealing strips decreases firstly and then increases with increasing temper rolling rate. With the increase of temper rolling rate, the low-frequency iron loss decreases rapidly first and then increases slowly. The high-frequency iron loss decreases gradually with increasing temper rolling rate. The research work was useful to develop electrical steel by twin roll continuous casting process.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 针对SiC与铝合金基体间存在的润湿、界面反应等界面结合问题, 介绍了几种常见的SiC表面改性方法及其在金属复合材料中的应用。 概述了铝基SiC复合材料作为结构材料、摩擦磨损及功能材料的一些应用和最新进展, 最后指出了SiC的改性重点以及金属基多元复合材料的发展趋势。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: SiCp modification and their application in aluminum matrix composites
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：With respect to the problems of the interfacial wetting or reaction between SiC particles and the aluminum alloy matrix, several common methods of SiCp surface modification and their application in the metal matrix composites are reviewed. The latest development and applications of SiC aluminum matrix composites used as structural materials, friction and wear materials as well as functional materials are introduced. The future of SiCp modification and application as well as the developing trend of metal matrix composites are summarized in the end.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 建立了电感耦合等离子体原子发射光谱法同时测定FeSiB非晶合金炉渣中Al2O3、B2O3、CaO、MgO、MnO、SiO2和TiO2的方法。用HNO3+HCl+HF处理样品，选择仪器的最佳分析参数和分析条件，采用基体匹配的方法消除基体干扰。该方法Al、B、Ca、Mg、Mn、Si和Ti的检出限分别为0041、0054、0016、0009、0004、0098、001 μg/mL。用该方法对FeSiB非晶合金炉渣分析样品进行了测定，其测定结果（n=11）的相对标准偏差均小于2%，加标回收率为1001%~1058%。

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Determination of Al2O3，B2O3，CaO，MgO，MnO，SiO2 and TiO2 in slag of FeSiB amorphous alloy by ICP-AES
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：A method for the determination of Al2O3、B2O3、CaO、MgO、MnO、SiO2 and TiO2 in slag of FeSiB amorphous alloy by ICP-AES was proposed. The sample was completely decomposed with nitric acid, hydrochloric acid and hydrofluoric acid. The optimum analytical parament and condition were selected. The interference effects of matrix could be eliminated by the method of matrix matching. In this method, the limits of detection of Al,B,Ca,Mg,Mn,Si and Ti were 0.041, 0054, 0016, 0009, 0004, 0098 and 001 μg/mL, respectively. Under the analytical optimum condition, chemical components in slag sample of FeSiB amorphous alloy were determined. The values of RSDs (n=11) were all less than 20% and the recoveries of added standard were between 1001%～1058%.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 轮轴钢35CrMoA单轴微动疲劳失效机理
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 杨洋1，何国球1，卢棋1，樊康乐1，佘萌1，刘兵1，朱旻昊2
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn:
1.同济大学材料科学与工程学院,上海市金属功能材料开发应用重点实验室 上海201804
2.西南交通大学牵引动力国家重点实验室，四川 成都 610031
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 通过平面对平面的接触方式，研究轮轴钢35CrMoA在单轴微动疲劳下的失效机理，采用扫描电子显微镜观察其微动损伤表面的微观形貌，通过透射电镜观察微动疲劳过程中不同应力幅值时接触区位错的组态。结果表明，随着应力幅值的增加，微动疲劳寿命降低的幅度变小；微动磨损可能加速微裂纹的萌生，也可能推迟微裂纹扩展；随着轴向应力幅值的增大，形成的位错胞尺寸也较大，并且其多边形化的趋势也越明显；微动疲劳的接触压应力和循环载荷为位错的滑移切变提供了条件。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Uniaxial fretting fatigue properties of 35CrMoA
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Uniaxial fretting fatigue properties of 35CrMoA was investigated by the means of plane to plane contact. The microstructures were observed by canning electronic microscope (SEM). Dislocation structure at the contact area was observed by transmission electron microscopy (TEM).The results indicate that with the increase of stress amplitude, the fretting fatigue life is reduced, and the range is smaller. Fretting wear may accelerate microcrack initiation, and also may delay the microcrack propagation. With the increase of axial stress amplitude, the size of dislocation cell is bigger, and the trend of polygons is more obvious. Contact compressive stress and axial cyclic stress provides the conditions for dislocation slip shear.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.citation:

YANG Yang, HE Guo-qiu, LU Qi, FAN Kang-le，SHE Meng, LIU Bing, ZHU Min-hao. Uniaxial fretting fatigue properties of 35CrMoA. , 2015, 22(1): 21-26.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 王允，罗强，焦津，曲寿江，沈军
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 同济大学材料科学与工程学院，上海 201804
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: The corrosion behavior of Fe-based amorphous alloy coating in sodium chloride solution
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Fe-based amorphous alloy coating (Fe49.7Cr18Mn1.9Mo7.4W1.6B15.2C3.8Si2.4Fe) was deposited by AC-HVAF thermal spray on the substrate of 304 stainless steel. By the use of XRD, SEM, Vickers Indenter, and Electrochemical measurements, the structure, hardness, corrosion-resistance, and electrode reaction kinetics of the coating were studied. The corrosion behavior of Fe-based amorphous alloy coating in neutral medium was investigated in comparison with 304 stainless steel. The results indicate that Fe-based amorphous alloy coating has the high content of amorphous phase, homogeneous microstructure, high hardness and good corrosion resistance in sodium chloride solution.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 液相量对粉末冶金Al-Si-Cu-Mg合金的组织与性能的影响
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 李冰倩，沈军，曲寿江
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 同济大学材料科学与工程学院，上海 201804
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 研究Al-15Si-26Cu-057Mg合金在烧结过程中液相量随烧结温度和烧结时间的变化，以及液相量对合金组织与性能的影响。结果表明, 冷压坯以10 ℃/min升温至560 ℃烧结1 h为最优实验参数。冷压坯以10 ℃/min升温至560 ℃时含有体积分数为13%的液相，此温度下保温40 min后液相量趋于稳定，随着烧结时间继续增长，液相更加均匀地分布在合金中，同时560 ℃下烧结1 h后合金致密且抗拉强度最好。冷压坯升温过程中约在500 ℃开始出现θ相回溶，Q相在510 ℃开始回溶，至535 ℃完全消失，这些相的回溶使元素溶解度增加，降低固相向液相转变的起始温度，从而促进液相的转变和液相量的增加。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Effect of liquid volume fraction on microstructure and mechanical properties of powder metallurgical Al-Si-Cu-Mg alloy
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The influence of liquid volume fraction changing with different sintering temperature and time on alloy microstructure and mechanical properties during sintering process with nominal composition Al–15Si–26Cu–057Mg was investigated. The results indicated that sintering at 560 ℃ by heating up under 10 ℃/min was the optimum temperature because that the volume fraction of 13% was benefit for alloy mechanical properties. The volume fraction of liquid phase began to stabilize after holding for 40 min at 560 ℃.The strength of alloy increased gradually with liquid phase distributing uniformly in the alloy by longer sintering time. Therefore sintering for 1 h at 560 ℃was the optimum condition. The dissolution of θ phase began around 500 ℃ and the dissolution of Q phase was around 510 ℃ to 535 ℃ during process of the temperature heating up so that the transformation temperature from solid phase to liquid phased creased by the dissolution of these phases with improving solid solubility of elements.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.citation:
李冰倩，沈军，曲寿江. 液相量对粉末冶金Al-Si-Cu-Mg合金的组织与性能的影响[J]. , 2015, 22(1): 32-37.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 热处理对Ti-44Al-4Nb-2(Mo,Cr,B,Y)合金显微组织与硬度的影响
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 宋睿瑾
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 同济大学材料科学与工程学院，上海201804
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 研究了名义成分为Ti-44Al-4Nb-2(Mo,Cr,B,Y) (原子分数%)的TiAl基铸态合金，将其在共析转变温度附近保温后淬火，分析了在共析转变温度附近，保温温度与时间对合金显微组织以及硬度的影响。研究结果表明：通过DSC试验得到合金的共析转变温度为1 17923 ℃；合金在共析转变(α2+γα)温度附近进行保温时,发生层片结构消溶，γ、α和B2相晶粒长大的现象；对铸态合金在1 200 ℃下固溶1 h后进行时效还发现，当时效时间为15 min时,合金出现了析出强化，从而使合金具有较高硬度。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Effects of heat treatment on the microstructure and microhardness of Ti-44Al-4Nb-2 (Mo,Cr,B,Y) alloys
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The TiAl-based alloy with nominal composition of Ti-44Al-4Nb-2(Mo,Cr,B,Y) was studied. Effect of heat treatment temperature and time on microstructure and microhardness of TiAlNbCr alloy was also discussed. It can be concluded that the eutectoid transformation (α2+γα) temperature was found at 1 17923 ℃ through differential scanning calorimetry(DSC) test. And when the alloy was undergoing the heat-treatment at the temperature near the eutectoid transformation (α2+γα) temperature, the lamellar structure was degrading and at the same time the γ,α and B2 grains were growing and spheroidizing. It can also be concluded that after aging at 1 200 ℃ for 15 min following 1 h solid solution, the as-cast alloy obtained precipitation strengthening and had peak value of microhardness.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.citation:
宋睿瑾. 热处理对Ti-44Al-4Nb-2(Mo,Cr,B,Y)合金显微组织与硬度的影响[J]. , 2015, 22(1): 48-52.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 马嘉丽1，于振华2，朱明1，缪卫东1
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn:
1.北京有色金属研究总院有研亿金新材料有限公司，北京 102200
2.吉林省农业机械研究院，长春 130022
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 镍钛形状记忆合金因其优良的力学和生物性能在生物医学方面得到广泛应用。国内外从事镍钛合金血管支架研究的研究者针对镍钛合金支架的径向支撑力、生物相容性和疲劳性能进行了大量的研究，经多年来研究证明该种支架各项性能均优于其他类型支架，是一种非常有前景的医疗器械。随着计算机模拟技术的发展，对镍钛合金血管支架的有限元分析和血流动力学模拟越来越多，既验证了支架设计的安全有效性，又对支架的设计起到了积极的辅助作用。
keywords_cn: 镍钛形状记忆合金，血管支架，数值模拟
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Review on the property of NiTi vascular stent
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Nitinol shape memory alloy is used widely in biomedical science because of its excellent mechanical and biomedical properties. Domestic and foreign researchers made lots of studies about the radial support force, biocompatibility and fatigue performance of NiTi vascular stent. It is shown that NiTi stent is one of most promosing medical devices better than others. There are more and more finite analysis and hemmodynamics simulation on NiTi vascular stent with the development of computer simulation technology. These researches verify the safety and efficacy of stent design,and also play a positive role in support of it.
keywords_en: NiTi shape memory alloy, vascular stent, numerical simulation

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 脉冲磁压缩开关磁芯制备及磁性能
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 陈非非，刘家鹏，李准，刘天成，李德仁，卢志超
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 中国钢研科技集团安泰科技股份有限公司, 国家非晶微晶合金工程技术研究中心, 北京 100081
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 介绍了脉冲磁压缩的原理和磁压缩开关对软磁材料的性能要求。利用平面流铸造法制备了宽度为25 mm的Fe73.5Cu1Nb3（SiB）22.5非晶带材。利用金属氧化物涂层、树脂涂层工艺和磁场热处理制备了64 mm×24 mm×25 mm的Fe73.5Cu1Nb3（SiB）22.5磁芯。Fe73.5Cu1Nb3（SiB）22.5磁芯具有高方形比（Br/Bs=0.84），低矫顽力（Hc=9.04 A/m）和低损耗（P0.5 T/20 kHz=41.64 W/kg）等良好的软磁性能，符合磁压缩开关的性能要求。
keywords_cn: 脉冲磁压缩，磁压缩开关，金属氧化物涂层，树脂涂层，铁基纳米晶合金
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Preparation and magnetic properties of pulse magnetic compression switch cores
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The principle of pulse magnetic compression and magnetic properties requirements of magnetic compression switch were introduced. The 25 mm wide amorphous ribbons of Fe73.5Cu1Nb3（SiB）22.5 alloy were prepared by planar flow casting method. Cores of Fe73.5Cu1Nb3（SiB）22.5 alloy were prepared by metal oxide coating, resin coating and magnetic field heat-treatment. The cores of Fe73.5Cu1Nb3（SiB）22.5 alloy show high square ratio, low coercive force and low core loss, and they meet the properies requirements of magnetic compression switch.
keywords_en: pulse magnetic compression，magnetic compression switch，metal oxide coating，resin coating, Fe-based nanocrystalline alloys

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 倪晓俊1，吴忠旺1,2，冯硕1，李德仁1，卢志超1
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn:
1.安泰科技股份有限公司，北京 100081
2.内蒙古科技大学材料与冶金学院，内蒙古 包头 014010
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 非晶合金纤维在0.5 mol/L H2SO4和0.1 mol/L HCl溶液中均能发生自发钝化，且钝化区宽、维钝电流密度低。在0.5 mol/L H2SO4溶液中钝化区宽度为1 336 mV，维钝电流密度为3.4×10-6 A·cm-2；在0.1 mol/L HCl溶液中钝化区宽度为1 407 mV，维钝电流密度为1.3×10-6 A·cm-2。比较非晶合金纤维和不锈钢纤维2种混凝土增强材料的耐腐蚀性能，非晶合金纤维的耐腐蚀性要优于不锈钢纤维，非晶合金纤维优良的耐腐蚀性能源于表面形成一层致密而稳定的钝化膜。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Study on the corrosion behaviour of amorphous metal fiber
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The amorphous metal fibers show high corrosion resistance with a lower passivation current density and a wide passive region in 0.5 mol/L H2SO4 and 0.1 mol/L HCl solutions. There are passivation current density of 3. 4×10-6 A·cm-2 and a passive region of 1 336 mV in 0.5 mol/L H2SO4 solution. There are also passivation current density of 1.3×10-6 A·cm-2 and a passive region of 1 407 mV solution in 0.1 mol/L HCl solution. The corrosion behaviour of amorphous metal fibers is compared with stainless steel fibers. Amorphous metal fibers exhibit more superior corrosion resistance than that of stainless steel fibers. The superior corrosion resistance of amorphous metal fiber is attributed to the formation of a dense and stable protective passive film.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 镧对Sn3. 0Ag0. 5Cu钎料组织及微米压痕性能影响
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 邵晴，吴敏
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 辽宁石油化工大学机械工程学院，辽宁 抚顺113001
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 运用X射线衍射仪、扫描电镜和能谱分析、微米压痕仪等仪器设备，研究了稀土元素La对Sn3. 0Ag0. 5C钎料组织及微米压痕性能性能影响。结果表明：微量稀土元素La对Sn3. 0Ag0. 5Cu钎料组织有显著影响，可使钎料共晶组织细化，分布均匀；元素La能使Sn3. 0Ag0. 5Cu压痕深度相对下降17. 26%，压痕硬度增大19. 14%，达到0. 53 GPa；研究认为La使Sn3. 0Ag0. 5Cu钎料组织变为细小，且分布均匀，是钎料微米压痕得到显著改善的原因。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Effect of La on microstructure and property of microindentation of Sn3. 0Ag0. 5Cu
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Effect of La on microstructure and property of microindentation of Sn3. 0Ag0. 5Cu was researched by adding rare earth elements to the solder by means of SEM 、 EDAX 、XRD 、microindentation instrument and so on. The results showed that La can remarkable refine microstructure of Sn3. 0Ag0. 5Cu solder，elements of La can make the Sn3. 0Ag0. 5Cu indentation depth is relatively decreased 17. 26%, indentation hardness increased by 19. 14%, reaching 0. 53 GPa as well. It is considered that La makes Sn3. 0Ag0. 5Cu solder microstructure into fine, which is the cause of solder microindentation obtained significant improvement.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 电动汽车用LiFePO4/C电池容量衰减研究
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 宋金保,朱晓辉，马冬梅，贺狄龙，周琳
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 合肥国轩高科动力能源股份公司，安徽 合肥 230001
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 研究了经电动汽车使用后的磷酸铁锂动力电池容量衰减原因。采用场发射电子显微镜（FE-SEM）、X-射线衍射光谱仪（XRD）、X-射线光电子能谱仪（XPS）和拉曼光谱等测试手段对使用后的锂离子电池电极材料进行了表征。结果表明，活性锂离子损失是电动汽车使用后锂离子电池容量衰减的最主要原因，而活性锂离子损失主要来源于SEI膜的溶解与再生、电极活性材料的损失及电解液的分解。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Studies on capacity fading mechanism of LiFePO4/graphite cells for electric vehicle
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Capacity fade mechanisms of LiFePO4/graphite cells after the use of electric vehicle were studied. The charactistics of structure and morphology were investigated by scanning electron microscope (SEM), X-ray diffraction spectrometer (XRD), X-ray photoelectron spectrometer (XPS), and Raman spectrometer. The results showed that capacity fading of lithium-ion cells can be attributed primarily to the lithium inventory loss. The fade of electrode materials, the decomposing of electrolyte, and the SEI destruction and growth on graphite anode surface were found to the main cause for the lithium inventory loss.

The properties of rhenium and its alloys were introduced in detail. The application in the high-tech field and manufacturing processes of rhenium and its alloys were also reviewed, at the same time, compared with characterizations of different manufacturing processes. http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 磁场热处理对铁基纳米晶合金磁性能的影响
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 刘笑闯,李准,崔兴华,刘天成,李德仁,卢志超
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 中国钢研科技集团有限公司，安泰科技股份有限公司, 国家非晶微晶合金工程技术研究中心, 北京 100081
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 研究了不同条件的磁场热处理工艺对铁基纳米晶带材磁性能的影响。研究结果表明，铁基纳米晶材料在0~10 kHz范围内,其磁导率随施加磁场的温度降低而迅速升高，而在10 kHz以上的频段,其磁导率随施加磁场温度的变化较小。与普通热处理的结果相比,在400 ℃以下施加磁场可以提高材料0~50 kHz范围内的磁导率，而在400 ℃以上施加磁场却可以压低材料0~50 kHz范围内的磁导率，并且施加磁场后均能提高材料在50 kHz以上的磁导率。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Effects of magnetic heat treatment on the magnetic properties of Fe-based nanocrystalline alloy
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The effect of magnetic field heat treatment was investigated at different conditions of the process on magnetic properties of Fe based nanocrystalline ribbons. The results show that magnetic permeability of Fe based nanocrystalline materials with the range of 0~10 kHz increase rapidly with increasing the temperature of applied magnetic field. In contrast, the magnetic permeability shows a slight change above 10 kHz. Compared with the ordinary heat treatment results, applying magnetic field, in the range of 0~50 kHz, can improve magnetic permeability of the materials below 400 ℃, while applying magnetic field can decline magnetic permeability above 400 ℃. Applying magnetic field can also improve magnetic permeability of materials above 50 kHz.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 铁基纳米晶共模磁芯的制备及其性能研究
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 崔兴华，李准，刘笑闯，刘天成，李德仁，卢志超
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 中国钢研科技集团有限公司，安泰科技股份有限公司，国家非晶微晶合金工程技术研究中心,北京 100081
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 利用平面流铸造技术制备了不同厚度的Fe73.5Cu1Nb3Si15.5B7纳米晶带材，不同厚度带材经过卷绕制备出40 mm×25 mm×15 mm的纳米晶共模磁芯。研究了热处理温度、磁场等不同热处理条件和带材厚度对铁基纳米晶磁芯电感量的影响。结果表明，磁芯性能依赖于带材厚度和热处理制度。带材越薄，其高频优势越明显。对于不需要进行磁场处理的磁芯，其普通热处理的最佳温度为565 ℃；对于需要加磁场进行二次热处理的磁芯，其普通热处理最佳温度为575 ℃。选择合适的带材厚度和热处理制度对于提高纳米晶磁芯的性能尤为重要。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Preparation and magnetic properties of Fe-based nanocrystalline common mode choke (CMC) cores
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：CMC cores (40 mm×25 mm×15 mm) were made from Fe-based nanocrystalline ribbons with different thickness which were prepared by planer flow casting method. The properties of cores depended on ribbon thickness and heat-treatment process. Thinner ribbon had better properties under high frequency. The best annealing temperature was 565 ℃ without magnetic field, and the best annealing temperature was 575 ℃ with magnetic field. It is important to select appropriate ribbon thickness and heat-treatment process to meet performance requirement of cores.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 苏宏艺1，陈威1，任伟2，李宁一1，张啸宇1
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn:
1.中国人民解放军装甲兵工程学院，北京 100072
2. 钢铁研究总院，北京 100081
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 针对传统SHS法制备陶瓷内衬小口径管中陶瓷熔涂长度过短的问题，开发了制备复合细长管的新工艺。以Al粉和Fe2O3粉为反应原料，混合均匀后配合钢棒装填粉末，使粉料中形成空腔，反应时不锈钢管与地面呈80°夹角。结果表明：新工艺能够解决反应产物堵塞管道和管壁烧穿的问题，显著提高体系的燃烧速度，增加陶瓷的熔涂长度。钢管内壁均已涂上陶瓷，涂层厚度为1. 2～1. 5 mm。涂层中气孔少，不存在凝固缺陷，可防止腐蚀性液体对基体的侵蚀。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Preparation of slender ceramic-lined composite pipe by SHS self-gravitation method
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：A novel technique concerned composite pipe was proposed to solve the problem that the coating length of ceramic was too short by traditional SHS method. Raw materials contained Al powders and Fe2O3 powders were blended uniformly and filled into stainless steel tube combined with a steel bar so that a cavity could form in the reaction mass. The angle between the pipe and the ground was 80°. Experimental results showed that the new technique could solve the problem about pipe plugged and burned by reaction product and the coating length was increased as a result of the improvement of the combustion speed of reactants. The inner wall of the steel tube are coated with ceramic which had the thickness of 1.2～1.5 mm coating. The coating had few pores without through-holes which could prevent the matrix from eroding by corrosive liquid.

The Structure and microstructure of alloys was measured by XRD and SEM; the adiabatic temperature was measured by direct measurement of magnetocaloric effect instrument under magnetic field change of 1.5 T. http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn:
1.合肥工业大学化学工程系，安徽 合肥 230001
2.合肥国轩高科动力能源股份公司，安徽 合肥 230001
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 以废旧的锂电池和化学镀镍废液为主要原料，制备了氧化石墨烯/镍铝双羟基复合金属氧化物复合材料。采用X-射线衍射仪、场发射电子显微镜和电化学方法对该复合材料进行了表征。研究表明，该复合材料呈现为网络状的纳米片，其表面具有特殊微孔结构。在1.0 A/g电流密度下，复合材料电极的比电容可达1 184.3 F/g；经过200次充/放电循环测试后，复合材料的比电容保持率仍可达98.3%，具有良好的充/放电循环稳定性。
keywords_cn: 镍铝双羟基复合金属氧化物
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Simultaneous recovery of graphite from spent lithium-ion cells and spent nickel with formation of GO/NiAl-LDH
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：A novel nickel, phosphate and graphite recovery way was designed by forming graphene oxide/NiAl layered double hydroxides (GO/NiAl-LDHs) from the spent electroless nickel plating baths and graphite anode of spent lithium-ion batteries. The as-obtained materials were examined by X-ray diffraction, field emission scanning electron microscope techniques, and electrochemistry techniques. The results revealed that NiAl-LDH platelets homogeneously developed on the surfaces of the GO as spacers to disperse the wrinkled GO nanosheets and emerge in special microporous structure. The GO/NiAl-LDHs exhibited a maximum specific capacitance of 1 184.3 F/g and excellently electrochemical stability with 98.3% keep after 200 cycles at current density of 1.0 A/g.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 卢棋，何国球，杨洋，樊康乐，佘萌，刘飏
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 同济大学材料科学与工程学院,上海市金属功能材料开发应用重点实验室, 上海 201804
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 采用干摩擦磨损试验机研究了速度和载荷对SiC颗粒增强铝基复合材料的摩擦磨损性能的影响，并对比了SiC颗粒增强铝基复合材料与HT250的耐磨性能。结果表明，在试验条件下，随着载荷的增加，磨损率增加，滑动摩擦系数先下降至最低值（载荷为10 MPa）后缓慢增加。滑动摩擦速度对滑动摩擦系数和磨损率有着直接影响，随着速度的升高，材料的磨损率增加。在载荷为20 MPa，速度为400 r/min的高速高载下，材料容易发生严重的粘着磨损。
keywords_cn: SiC颗粒增强铝基复合材料
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: The friction and wear properties of silicon carbide particle reinforced aluminum matrix composite
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The effect of speed and load on the friction and wear properties of silicon carbide particle reinforced aluminum matrix composite was studied. And the wear resistance of silicon carbide particle reinforced aluminum matrix composite and HT250 was compared. The results show that with the increase of the load, the wear rate increased and the friction coefficient increased after the first fall. The wear rate was influenced by speed directly, which increased with the increase of the speed. Under the high speed and high load conditions, the material prone to severe adhesive wears.
keywords_en: silicon carbide particle reinforced aluminum matrix composite

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The effect of process parameters on the quality factor, frequency loss and effective permeability of FeSiAl magnetic powder core were studied. The powder size, mount of insulation on binder,shaping pressure and temperatures of heat treatment of FeSiAl magnetic powder core were discussed.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 冷变形工艺对锆合金包壳管氢化物取向的影响
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 成亚辉，孙阳平，翟建宇
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 国核宝钛锆业股份公司,陕西 宝鸡 721013
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 使用4种不同壁厚外径为17. 82 mm的Zr-4合金半成品管，在KPW25LC轧机上使用相同的参数轧制9. 53 mm×0. 60 mm成品管，同炉退火后和矫直后检测不同工艺下的氢化物取向并对比分析，结果表明,冷轧Q值对成品管材的氢化物取向影响至关重要，确定成品轧制Q值与氢化物取向因子的规律，明确管材氢化物取向的影响和控制措施。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Effect of cold pilgering reduction on hydride orientation of zirconium alloy cladding tube
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：17. 82 mm Zirc-4 intermediate tubes with 4 different wall thickness were pilgered to 9. 53 mm×0. 60 mm final tubes on KPW25LC cold pilger machine with same pilger parameters. Tubes were then annealed in the same run in the hot wall furnace. Hydride orientation was tested after annealed and straightening. It proves that Q value during cold pilger reduction is crucial to the hydride orientation of the final tubes. A relation between the Q value and the hydride orientation was analyzed to determine the contributors to the hydride orientation and process control actions.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 2507双相不锈钢在不同Cl-含量冷却水中的腐蚀行为
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 翟芳婷1，李辉辉2，胥聪敏3
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn:
1. 陕西工业职业技术学院,陕西 咸阳 712000
2. 陕西汽车集团有限责任公司，陕西 西安 710200
3. 西安石油大学，陕西 西安 710065
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 采用失重法、扫描电镜和能谱分析及电化学测试研究了2507双相不锈钢在4种Cl-含量冷却水模拟溶液中浸泡60 d后的腐蚀行为。结果表明：2507双相不锈钢的腐蚀程度均属于轻度腐蚀，平均腐蚀速率随着Cl-浓度增加先升后降，Cl-的质量分数约在237 mg/L时平均腐蚀速率达到最大。但随着Cl-浓度增加孕育点蚀的灰斑数量先升后降再升，Cl-的质量分数在237 mg/L时灰斑数量最少。均未出现点蚀坑，点蚀电位高达约1. 2 V。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Corrosion behavior of 2507 duplex stainless steel in the cooling water with different Cl- contents
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The corrosion behavior of 2507 duplex stainless steel in the cooling water of different Cl- content was investigated using electrochemical measurement, weight loss, scanning electron microscopy (SEM) and energy dispersive spectrum (EDS). The results showed that 2507 duplex SS happened slight corrosion, and have shown a good passivation properties and corrosion resistance in cooling water system under the action of the different content of Cl- . With the increase of Cl- content, corrosion rate was the first increase and then decrease, but the number tendency of corrosion spot was increase-decrease-increase. When the content was 237 mg/L, the corrosion rate reached maximum, but the number of corrosion spot was minimum. 2507 duplex SS didn’t happen pitting corrosion pit after corrosion for 60 days in the cooling water of different Cl- content. The pitting potential (Epit) reached 1. 2 V.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.citation:

ZHAI Fang-ting, LI Hui-hui, XU Cong-min. Corrosion behavior of 2507 duplex stainless steel in the cooling water with different Cl- contents. , 2015, 22(3): 41-45.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 碳钢的电解磷化工艺探究
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 王雷1，袁琳1，许育东1，石敏1，齐三1,2，丁宁2
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn:
1. 合肥工业大学材料科学与工程学院，安徽 合肥 230009
2. 安徽省蚌埠市钰诚新材料科技有限公司，安徽 蚌埠 233000
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 以碳钢为研究对象，采用正交试验方法探究了一种基于普通磷化液的电解磷化工艺参数。并采用磷化膜外观、厚度、硫酸铜点滴时间等手段对磷化膜的成膜性能和耐腐蚀性能进行表征和评价。结果表明，在电解时间60 s，总酸110点，温度20 ℃，电流密度0. 4 A/dm2的条件下，形成具有厚度一致、耐腐蚀性能优越的膜层。通过SEM与XRD对磷化膜进行微观表征，得出此磷化膜是颗粒状分布均匀且由Zn3(PO4)2·4H2O单相构成。这种磷化方法可制备出成膜速度快、抗腐蚀性能优良的磷化膜，且磷化液无沉渣、无有毒离子，是一种高效环保磷化处理方法。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Study on the process parameters of electrolytic phosphating
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：A new kind of electrochemical phosphating was developed and its key process parameters were optimized through a series of designed orthogonal experiments. The optimal parameters which were assessed by appearance, film thickness and corrosion resistance，i. e, phosphating time，electrolytic current density，total acid value and phosphating temperature are 60 s, 0. 4 A/dm2，110 points and 25 ℃, respectively. Crystal morphology and main composition of electrochemical phosphating coating were analyzed by SEM, EDS and XRD. Results showed that the coating which was uniformly deposited on the carbon steel substrate under the optimal phosphating condition was mainly composed of spherical structured Zn3(PO4)2·4 (H2O) grains. Furthermore, experiments indicated that the electrochemical phosphating is free of slag and does not contain any harmful ions, which implies that this metal pretreatment process is effective and “green” for environmental protection.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.citation:
王雷，袁琳，许育东，石敏，齐三 ，丁宁. 碳钢的电解磷化工艺探究[J]. , 2015, 22(3): 35-40.
WANG Lei, YUAN Lin, XU Yu-dong, SHI Min, QI San,, DING Ning. Study on the process parameters of electrolytic phosphating. , 2015, 22(3): 35-40.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: Co0. 8Zn0. 2Fe2O4及其磁电复合薄膜的制备与表征
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 许育东，汪泉，王雷，石敏，齐三, 彭旭东
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 合肥工业大学材料科学与工程学院，安徽 合肥 230009
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 采用溶胶-凝胶法制备Zn2+取代钴铁氧体Co0. 8Zn0. 2Fe2O4及Co0. 8Zn0. 2Fe2O4/ (Ba0. 85Ca0. 15)(Zr0. 1Ti0. 9)O3磁电复合薄膜(CZFO/BCZT)。利用X射线衍射仪(XRD)、场发射扫描电子显微镜(FE-SEM),拉曼光谱仪及振动样品磁强计(VSM)等对样品进行表征。研究表明，沉积在Pt(111)/Ti/SiO2/Si衬底上的CZFO薄膜为多晶结构，无明显择优取向，处于压应变状态。磁场平行于CZFO薄膜表面的饱和磁化强度和矫顽力分别为405 emu/cm3和780×79. 577 A/m，其矫顽力高于CZFO粉体样品。制备的磁电复合薄膜结晶质量良好，多层纳米结构清晰完整。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Preparation and magnetoelectric characterization of Co0. 8Zn0. 2Fe2O4 composite thin films
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Zn2+ doped cobalt ferrite and the Co0. 8Zn0. 2Fe2O4/(Ba0. 85Ca0. 15)(Zr0. 1Ti0. 9)O3 magnetoelectric composite thin films (CZFO/BCZT) were prepared via a Sol-gel process. The samples were characterized by X-ray diffraction (XRD), field-emission scanning electron microscope (FE-SEM), Raman spectrometer and vibrating sample magnetometer (VSM). The results show the CZFO thin film deposited on Pt(111)/Ti/SiO2/Si substrate exhibit a good crystalline quality with pure phase and no obvious preferred orientation under a compressive strain state. The saturation magnetization (Ms) and coercive field (Hc) are 405 emu/cm3 and 780×79. 577 A/m respectively with the external magnetic field applied parallel to the thin film surface. The CZFO thin film, by contrast, exhibit a higher Hc compared with the CZFO powder. The magnetoelectric composite thin films also exhibit good crystalline quality and obvious interface.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.citation:

XU Yu-dong, WANG Quan, WANG Lei, SHI Min, QI San, PENG Xu-dong. Preparation and magnetoelectric characterization of Co0. 8Zn0. 2Fe2O4 composite thin films. , 2015, 22(3): 10-15.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 纳米掺镝铁氧体颗粒的磁特性与温度的相关性
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 杨冲1，陈静2，刘紫燕1，张茂润1
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn:
1. 安徽理工大学化工学院，安徽 淮南 232001
2. 中钢集团安徽天源科技股份有限公司，安徽 马鞍山243000
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 采用液相共沉淀法制备出平均粒径约17 nm的掺镝铁氧体磁颗粒，在-60～85 ℃范围内，研究了样品的磁特性与温度的相关性。借助透射电镜（TEM）、X射线衍射仪（XRD）、超导量子干涉仪（SQUID）对产物的形貌、相结构、磁性能进行了表征。结果表明，磁颗粒的形貌多为类球型，主流粒径在15～18 nm，相结构为面心立方尖晶石型。样品的饱和磁化强度(Ms)、矫顽力(Hc) 随温度(T)的降低呈现出增大的变化规律，且在85～20 ℃范围内，温度降低，Ms、Hc的增幅较小；在20～-60 ℃范围内，Ms、Hc随温度的降低而显著提高。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Study of the correltion between temperature and magnetic properties of Dy3+-doped ferrite nanoparticles
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Dy3+-doped ferrite nano-particles were prepared by the liquid phase coprecipitation method, the size of particles is about 17 nm. The effect of temperatures on magnetic properties of the sample were investigated in the range of -60 ℃ and 85 ℃. The morphology, structure, magnetic properties of the products were characterized by transmission electron microscopy(TEM), ray-diffraction(XRD),and super-conducting quantum interference device (SQUID). The results show that the major diameter of particles is about 15～18 nm，morphology of magnetic particles are spherical with face-centered cubic spinel structure. The saturation magnetization (Ms) and the coercitivity (Hc) of the sample increase with the decrease of temperature, Ms and Hc of the sample increase greet in the range 20 ℃ and -60 ℃.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: Sc的添加对Al-Si-Cu系铝合金钎料性能的影响
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 孙禹冲, 左衡, 李先芬
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 合肥工业大学材料科学与工程学院, 安徽 合肥 230009
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 研究了Sc元素的添加量对Al-Si-Cu钎料的微观组织、熔化温度、铺展性能和力学性能的影响。结果表明，在Al-8. 5Si-20Cu-10Ge钎料中添加Sc元素，可以改善钎料的微观组织，钎料的熔化温度基本不变，在铝板上的铺展性能明显改善，钎焊接头强度得到提高。当Sc的质量分数为0. 3%时，钎料在铝板表面铺展性能最佳，继续增加Sc含量，钎料铺展面积将减小。当合金中加入质量分数为0. 1%的Sc元素后，钎焊接头的剪切强度可以达到71. 78 MPa，相比不加稀土元素的钎焊接头强度提高了28. 64%。
keywords_cn: 铝合金钎料 显微组织 熔化温度 铺展性能 力学性能
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Effect of Sc elements on the properties of Al-Si-Cu filler metal
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The effects of Sc on the properties of filler metals have been investigated. By changing the level of Sc, the filler metals’ melting point, microstructure, spreading behavior and their shear strength of the brazed joints have been tested and measured. The results show that with the addition of Sc in Al-8. 5Si-20Cu-10Ge brazing filler metal, the microstructure is improved significantly, the melting temperature almost remain the same, the spread ability and the mechanical property of the brazed joint are improved. When the Sc content is up to 0. 3%, the filler metal shows the best spread ability. If continue to increase the Sc content, the spreading area will be reduced. Compared with the joints without the Sc element, the joint strength could be up to 71. 78 MPa which is increased by 28. 64% when the content of Sc is 0. 1%.
keywords_en: Al fill metal microstructure melting temperature spread ability mechanical property
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.citation:

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 蔡振武, 胡正飞, 童慧, 张振, 何大海
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 同济大学材料科学与工程学院，上海市金属功能材料开发应用重点实验室，上海 200092
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Research on the compressive properties of aluminum foams prepared by gas injection and melt foaming
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Uniaxial compression tests were carried out to study the aluminum foams prepared by different methods. The results show that the aluminum foams prepared by melt foaming method are much better than that made by gas injection. The microstructures and components of aluminum foams prepared by gas injection and melt foaming were observed by SEM to analyze the effects of aluminum foams preparation methods on the compressive properties. It is shown that the cells of aluminum foams prepared by gas injection are polyhedral shape with thin thickness and folded wall; the relatively high silicon carbide (SiC) content and heavy oxidation lead to high brittleness of aluminum foams. Aluminum foams fabricated by melt foaming method have circular cells with thick and smooth wall. Due to the differences of cell structure and microstructure, these two aluminum foams have quite different compressive properties.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: The influence of grain size on resistivity for Cr20Ni35 Alloy
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：With different grain size gained by different plastic deformation and recrystallization annealing process for Cr20Ni35 alloy, the influences of grain size on the resistivity of Cr20Ni35 alloy were studied, and the reasons were analyzed. Results show that the resistivity decreased gradually after different deformation, and the grain size does not have much effect on the resistivity, the reason is mainly due to the state of "K" is destroyed. But after annealing, the resistivity value rises again, and by observing its metallography, the result shows that the smaller the grain size is, the greater the resistivity will be.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 研究了一种具有低弹性模量(约66 MPa)形状记忆合金 Ti- 9. 5Mo- 4Nb- 2V- 3Al的力学性能与形状记忆效应（SME）。研究结果表明，固溶处理后Ti- 9. 5Mo- 4Nb- 2V- 3Al合金拉伸过程中伴随发生应力诱发马氏体转变，马氏体组织呈片层状。拉伸变形后的合金试样经223 ℃保温处理5 min后将发生马氏体相的逆转变，合金表现出完全非线性恢复特征，其完全恢复应变量为2. 2%。对马氏体相逆转变过程分别采用了X射线衍射仪、差热分析及四点电阻法进行了研究，Ti- 9. 5Mo- 4Nb- 2V- 3Al合金的马氏体逆转变开始温度Ms为92 ℃，转变结束温度Mf为105 ℃。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Mechanical behavior and martensitic transformation of a Ti-Mo based shape memory alloy Ti-9. 5Mo-4Nb-2V-3Al
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Mechanical properties and shape memory effect (SME) of Ti-9. 5Mo-4Nb-2V-3Al (mass%) alloy with low elastic modulus (66 MPa) has been investigated. The lath-shaped martensite can be stress-induced from the parent phase by tensile deformation. Shape memory effect with a completely nonlinear recoverable strain of 2. 2% was obtained when the deformed specimen heated to 223 ℃ and the reverse martensite transformation occured, which has been verified by X-ray diffraction (XRD), DSC and electrical resistivity method. The starting temperature of the reverse martensitic transformation is 92 ℃ and the finishing temperature is 105 ℃.

SONG Jie, JIANG Hong, FAN Zhi-guo，ZHAO Jia-feng. Mechanical behavior and martensitic transformation of a Ti-Mo based shape memory alloy Ti-9. 5Mo-4Nb-2V-3Al. , 2015, 22(3): 16-21.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 付中泽1，杜兆富2，丁辉2，王蕾2，张洪平2，赵栋梁2

2. 钢铁研究总院功能材料研究所，北京 100081
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 为了适应器件的小型化、提高薄膜两相复合磁电材料的磁电效应，采用磁控溅射方法在Pb(Mg1/3Nb2/3)O3-PbTiO3（PMN-PT）衬底上生长FeCoV薄膜和Ni薄膜，形成FeCoV/PMN-PT/Ni薄膜复合结构。采用动态磁电系数测量系统对复合结构的磁电性能和共振频率进行了研究。结果表明：复合结构的磁电系数随直流偏置场的增加呈现先增加后减小的趋势，在约39. 8 kA/m附近达到峰值17. 8×10-3 mV·cm-1·A·m-1，在31. 84 kA/m的直流偏置场下，磁电电压随着交流激励场强度的增加呈线性增加。复合结构在85. 5 kHz下具有一个明显的共振峰，在共振频率下，磁电性能提高5倍以上。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Magnetoelectric effect in thin film composites FeCoV/Pb(Mg1/3Nb2/3)O3-PbTiO3/Ni
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：To improve the magnetoelectric (ME) property of piezoelectric thin film systems, Ni and FeCoV magnetic films are used to sandwich piezoelectric foil Pb(Mg1/3Nb2/3)O3-PbTiO3 (PMN-PT) in the middle. The ME voltages and coefficients have been characterized under a static magnetic field superimposed with an alternating magnetic field. The influences of the static and the alternating field strength are discussed. The peak ME coefficient obtained at 39.8 kA/m in the sandwiched structure reached 17. 8×10-3 mV·cm-1·A·m-1, which is about five times greater than the Ni film-sandwiched counterpart. A linear relationship is observed between the magnetoelectric voltage and the alternating field strength under a static field of 31. 84 kA/m. Near the natural resonant frequency (~85. 5 kHz) of laminate, the ME effect were found to be dramatically increased, 5 times larger than the properties in low frequency.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The current researches on progress in Mg2Ni hydrogen storage alloys were reviewed. The effect of several preparation processes, including melting, melt spinning, mechanical alloying, hydriding combustion synthesis and sintering, on phase compositions, morphologies and electrochemical properties is simply represented and the further research trend in this field is proposed.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: Fe72. 5Cu1Nb2V2Si13. 5B9纳米晶薄带的巨磁阻抗效应
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 胡怀谷， 郝延明，梁飞飞，高纯静
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 天津科技大学理学院， 天津 300457
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: Fe72. 5Cu1Nb2V2Si13. 5B9非晶薄带经晶化退火处理，随退火温度增加，析出纳米晶bcc α- Fe(Si)相，当超过550 ℃，薄带在析出纳米晶bcc α- Fe(Si)的同时，还析出硬磁性的Fe2B相。Fe72. 5Cu1Nb2V2Si13. 5B9 纳米晶薄带具有巨磁阻抗(GMI)效应， 其效应强度灵敏依赖于退火温度， 当退火温度为550 ℃、退火时间为30 min 时，bcc α- Fe(Si)平均晶粒尺寸约为16 nm，其巨磁阻抗存在最大值。巨磁阻抗效应还强烈依赖于频率。对于550 ℃退火30 min 的Fe72. 5Cu1Nb2V2Si13. 5B9纳米晶薄带，其在50 kHz下，ΔX/X(H=7 162 A/m)可达到-500%，3 MHz下，ΔR/R(H=7 162 A/m)约为-150％。700 kHz下，GMI效应值有最大值，ΔZ/Z(H=7 162 A/m)约为-121％。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Giant magnetoimpedance effect in Fe72. 5Cu1Nb2V2Si13. 5B9 nanocrystalline ribbons
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The nanophase bcc α- Fe(Si) crystallizes from Fe72. 5Cu1Nb2V2Si13. 5B9 ribbon through thermal annealing. When the annealing temperature is higher than 550 ℃, the hardmagnetic phase Fe2B occurs accompanying with nanophase bcc α- Fe(Si). The nanocrystalline Fe72. 5Cu1Nb2V2Si13. 5B9 ribbons exhibit giant magnetoimpedance (GMI) effect, which sensitively depends on the annealing temperature. The optimal annealing temperature for obtaining stronger GMI is 550 ℃, where the average grain size of α- Fe(Si) is about 16 nm. The GMI effect also strongly depends upon the frequency. For Fe72. 5Cu1Nb2V2Si13. 5B9 nanocrystalline ribbon annealed at 550 ℃ for 30 min, ΔX/X under H=7162 A/m reaches -500% at 50 kHz,ΔR/R under H=7 162 A/m is -150％ at 3 MHz, and ΔZ/Z is -121％at 700 kHz.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 采用传统陶瓷工艺制备了Sr0. 42La0. 38Ca0. 2Fe10. 4-xCo0. 24ZnxO19(x=0，0. 05，0. 10，0. 15，0. 20)样品，利用 X 射线衍射仪、扫描电子显微镜和永磁铁氧体B- H测量仪对该系列化合物的结构和磁特性进行了表征。 结果表明，随着ZnO添加量的增加，预烧料样品的相组成均为单一的M相，晶粒尺寸逐渐增大，有柱状生长的趋势。样品的剩磁Br随着添加量x的增加而逐渐增大，但矫顽力HcJ却逐渐降低。通过添加剂组合的调节，当取代量x=0. 10时，样品能够获得最优的综合磁性能：Br=441 mT，HcJ=437 kA/m。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Effects of ZnO substitution on the microstructure and magnetic properties of CaLaCo- doped strontium hexaferrites
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Sr0. 42La0. 38Ca0. 2Fe10. 4-xCo0. 24ZnxO19 (x=0，0. 05，0. 10，0. 15，0. 20) hexaferrite samples were prepared by the ceramic process. The microstructure and magnetic properties of these compounds were characterized by means of X- ray diffractometer, scanning electron microscope and a B- H meter. The results showed that with the increasing of ZnO- doped, the phase composition of the calcined ferrite powders were all single M phase and the average grain size gradually increased. The remanence Br of samples increased with the increasing of x, while the intrinsic coercivity force HcJ decreased obviously. With some specific additives, the optimum magnetic properties of sintered ferrite samples (Br =441 mT, HcJ =437 kA/m) could be obtained when x=0. 10.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 片状Fe- 10%Co合金磁粉的SiO2包覆改性与电磁性能研究
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 陈 辉，王 鲜，龚荣洲
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 华中科技大学光学与电子信息学院，湖北 武汉 430074
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 采用球磨方法制备片状Fe- 10%(质量分数)Co合金磁粉，并使用溶胶- 凝胶法对其进行多次包覆处理，测试分析包覆样品的电磁性能和反射损耗。结果表明，片状合金磁粉经过包覆后，其微波电磁参数间的比例以及吸波性能得到明显改善；随着包覆次数增加，SiO2包覆层厚度逐渐增大，样品的复介电常数和复磁导率均逐渐减小，但复磁导率减小幅度不大，反射损耗峰值逐渐降低、对应频率移向高频，吸波能力逐渐增强，但包覆次数过多不利于其阻抗匹配，且会使其电磁波衰减能力过弱，导致吸波性能反而下降。
keywords_cn: 片状Fe-10%(质量分数)Co合金粉末
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Study of the electromagnetic properties of the SiO2- coated flaky Fe- 10%Co magnetic alloy powder
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The flaky Fe- 10%Co(mass fraction) magnetic alloy powder, on whose particle surface the coating layer was quickly prepared for different times by sol- gel process， was obtained by ball milling method. The microwave electromagnetic properties and the reflection loss of the coated samples were also investigated and analyzed. The results show that the proportion between the electromagnetic parameters and the wave absorbing performance of the alloy powder have been improved significantly after coating by SiO2; With the increase of the coating times, the thickness of the coating layer increases, while the complex permittivity and permeability of the samples all decrease, but the complex permeability changes slightly, and the reflection loss peak of the sample decreases constantly with the corresponding frequency shift to high frequency due to the improvement of its impedance matching performance, thus the microwave absorbing ability of the alloy powder has been enhanced obviously. However, too much coating times is not conducive to the impedance matching for the alloy powder，and will also lead the electromagnetic wave attenuation ability to be so weak, which will result in the bad wave absorbing performance.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.citation:

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 对Ti- 25%Nb（原子分数）合金在中温400 ℃进行等径弯角挤压（ECAP）研究，结果表明，Ti- 25%Nb合金ECAP后强度、超弹性均得到提高。ECAP结合300 ℃时效1 h后，合金的强度和超弹性将进一步提高。2道次ECAP及4道次ECAP并结合300 ℃时效1 h，Ti- 25%Nb合金呈现完全超弹性性，此时的应变量为1. 5%。ECAP及时效处理后合金小应变(1. 5%)变形时超弹性稳定，随着应变量增加，稳定性略有下降。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Effect of aging and ECAP on the mechanical properties of Ti- Nb alloy
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The equal channel angular pressing (ECAP) on Ti- 25%Nb（atom fraction） alloy at 400 ℃ has been investigated. The strength and super- elasticity can be improved after ECAP for Ti- 25%Nb alloy. The strength and super- elasticity would be improved further through ECAP and aging at 300 ℃ for one hour. Ti- 25%Nb alloy exhibits completely super- elasticity properties after two passes ECAP or aging at 300 ℃ following 4 passes ECAP, and the recovery strain is 1. 5%. The super- elasticity of the alloy is stable after ECAP and aging treatment with small strain (1. 5%), and the stable decreases with the increasing of the strain.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 采用多尺度准连续介质法（简称QC方法）模拟双晶Al薄膜纳米压痕过程，研究上层膜厚度及晶界两侧晶体取向对薄膜材料屈服点的影响规律。在模型总尺寸不变的前提下，变化上层膜厚度，得到了双晶材料屈服点随上层膜厚度变化的关系曲线，通过载荷- 位移曲线及其上各个特征点所对应Von Mises应变图。分析得到载荷陡降的原因是位错的形核或层错的扩展，晶界处的晶格畸变致使晶界处更易发生应变的集中，当上层膜厚度较薄时，位错易于在晶界处形核，致使其屈服点较低。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Quasicontinuum study on the initial deformation behaviors of Al bi- crystal
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Multiscale simulations using the quasicontinuum (QC) method were performed to explain the process of nanoindentation on Al bi- crystal. The macroscopic load versus indentation depth curves, as well as microscopic representations, such as atomic location maps and plots of strain distribution were obtained, with different upper film thickness. The abrupt drops of load are caused by the nucleation of dislocations or the extension stacking faults, and strain concentration at grain boundary due to lattice distortion. When the upper layer film is thin, dislocation is more likely to emit at the grain boundary, which leads to a lower yield point.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 等温时效对Cu38Zr46Al8Ag8大块非晶合金结构弛豫影响的内耗研究
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 蒋 坤, 李小蕴, 黄中月
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 合肥工业大学材料科学与工程学院, 安徽 合肥 230009
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 采用多功能内耗仪，测定了在5种频率下经不同等温时效处理的Cu38Zr46Al8Ag8大块非晶合金内耗- 温度(Q-1-T)曲线。结果表明,经等温时效处理的试样的内耗峰值和峰温均比未经处理的试样低；等温时效温度相同情况下，随着等温时效时间的延长，试样的内耗峰值逐渐减少，对应的内耗峰温降低；在等温时效时间相同的情况下，随着等温时效温度的增加，内耗峰温降低。并利用结构弛豫理论分析了等温时效处理对结构弛豫的影响。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Effect of isothermal aging on structural relaxation of Cu38Zr46Al8Ag8 bulk amorphous alloys in internal friction
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Internal friction instrument was used to investigate internal friction- temperature curve(Q-1- T)and relative modulus- temperature curve(M- T)at 5 frequencies for Cu38Zr46Al8Ag8 bulk amorphous alloys annealed with different isothermal aging treatment. It is found that and the sample of the temperature of the Q-1 peak without isothermal aging treatment is higher than the others；under the same aging treatment temperature， the Q-1 peak and the corresponding temperature are dwindling with the increase of aging treatment time；under the same aging treatment time，the temperature of the Q-1 peak is dwindling with the increase of isothermal aging temperature. The effects of isothermal aging treatment on internal friction are analyzed in terms of theory of structural relaxation．
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.citation:
蒋 坤 李小蕴 黄中月. 等温时效对Cu38Zr46Al8Ag8大块非晶合金结构弛豫影响的内耗研究[J]. , 2015, 22(4): 13-15.
JIANG Kun, LI Xiao- yun, HUANG Zhong- yue. Effect of isothermal aging on structural relaxation of Cu38Zr46Al8Ag8 bulk amorphous alloys in internal friction. , 2015, 22(4): 13-15.

Introduced the industry standard of nickel coating, and prospected the standards.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 退火温度对La4MgNi17. 5Co1. 5贮氢合金结构和性能的影响
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 蔡 鑫，魏范松，胥小丽，肖佳宁, 魏范娜
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 江苏科技大学材料科学与工程学院，江苏 镇江 212003
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 研究了不同退火温度对La4MgNi17. 5Co1. 5合金相结构及电化学性能的影响。XRD分析表明，合金主要由LaNi5相 (CaCu5结构)和La4MgNi19相(Ce5Co19+Pr5Co19)组成，且退火温度的增加，可使La4MgNi19的相丰度和晶胞体积增大。但退火温度提高到1 173 K时，La4MgNi19有所减少并出现富Ni相。电化学性能测试表明，随着退火温度提高到1 123 K，合金电极的最大放电容量(Cmax)明显增大，循环寿命(S100)和高倍率放电性能(HRD900)也得到了明显改善。但退火温度进一步提高到1 173 K时，上述电化学性能均有所下降。如：Cmax和S100分别从铸态时的369. 66 mA·h/g和59. 96%提高到1 123 K时的375. 33 mA·h/g和65. 52%，然后又下降到1 173 K时的312. 44 mA·h/g和62. 82%。研究认为退火温度的提高可以改善成分的均匀性，提高La4MgNi19相的含量。但温度进一步提高则可能增加Mg的挥发，导致La4MgNi19相发生分解。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Influences of different temperatures of annealing treatment on electrochemical properties of La4MgNi17. 5Co1. 5 hydrogen storage alloy
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The influences of different temperatures of annealing treatment on the phase structure and electrochemical properties of La4MgNi17. 5Co1. 5 hydrogen storage alloy were investigated. The XRD analysis reveals that the alloys consist of LaNi5 phase and La4MgNi19 phase. With the increase of the temperature of annealing, the cell volume and the abundance of La4MgNi19 phase increases. While the temperature is up to 1 173 K, the abundance of La4MgNi19 phase decreases and the Ni- riched phase appears. The electrochemical measurement shows that the maximum discharge capacity increases obviously when the temperature is up to 1 123 K. The high- rate discharge ability(HRD) and cyclic stability(S100) are also improved. But when the temperature is up to 1 173 K, the electrochemical properties above are all decreased. For example, Cmax and S100 are increased from (369. 66 mA·h/g, 59. 96%)(as- cast) to (375. 33 mA·h/g, 65. 52%)(1 123 K) and then decreased to (312. 44 mA·h/g, 62. 82%)(1 173 K). It is found that the increase of the temperatures of annealing treatment can improve the uniformity of the phase structure. But when the temperature increases further, it will increase the volatilization of Mg and lead to the decomposing of La4MgNi19 phase.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.citation:
蔡 鑫，魏范松，胥小丽，肖佳宁 魏范娜. 退火温度对La4MgNi17. 5Co1. 5贮氢合金结构和性能的影响[J]. , 2015, 22(4): 16-20.
CAI Xin，WEI Fan- song，XU Xiao- li，XIAO Jia- ning， WEI Fan- na. Influences of different temperatures of annealing treatment on electrochemical properties of La4MgNi17. 5Co1. 5 hydrogen storage alloy. , 2015, 22(4): 16-20.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 静电纺丝技术结合碳热还原法制备Sn/C薄膜锂电池负极材料
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 冯圣雅1，于湧涛2，王 瑶1，王海鹰3
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn:
1.安泰科技股份有限公司，北京 100081
2.中国石油天然气股份有限公司吉林石化分公司研究院，吉林 吉林 132021
3.常熟理工学院，江苏 常熟 215500
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 利用静电纺丝技术与碳热还原相结合，制备了具有较高容量和较好循环性能的Sn/C无纺布纤维膜。利用扫描电镜（SEM）, X射线衍射（XRD），表征Sn/C纤维的形貌和结构。样品首次循环得到较高的充放电容量，分别为1 329. 8 和808. 6 mA·h/g。循环40圈以后，充电容量仍保持在743 mA·h/g，为第二圈充电容量的97. 5%。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Preparation of Sn/C anode film for lithium batteries via electrospinning and carbothermal reduction
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：A large Sn/C non- woven film with high capacity and good cycleability have been prepared by an electrospinning of a mixture solution of SnCl4 and PAN, followed by heat- treatment at high temperature. Scanning electron microscopy (SEM), and X- ray diffraction (XRD) analyses demonstrated the morphology and the structure of the Sn/C nanofibers. At first cycle, the Sn/C nanofiber delivers high charge and discharge capacities, 808. 6 and 1 329. 8 mA·h/g, respectively. After 40 cycles, the discharge capacity remains 743 mA·h/g, which is 97. 5 % of the capacity of the second cycle.

FENG Sheng- ya, YU Yong- tao, WANG Yao, WANG Hai- ying. Preparation of Sn/C anode film for lithium batteries via electrospinning and carbothermal reduction. , 2015, 22(4): 35-38.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 不同辊压厚度正极片对锂离子电池内阻影响研究
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 徐兴无，张良新，李 磊，苗 萌，朱晓辉
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 合肥国轩高科动力能源有限公司，安徽 合肥 230001
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 研究了正极片的不同辊压厚度对其制作的电池内阻及循环前后内阻变化的影响。采用场发射电子显微镜（FE- SEM）、X- 射线光电子能谱仪（XPS）及感应耦合等离子体原子发射光谱仪（ICP）等测试手段对循环前后的锂离子电池电极材料进行了表征。结果表明，正极片的辊压厚度影响着活性物质与集流体之间的接触电阻；辊压厚度较大正极片制作的电池经循环后，其电池正极表面产生了明显的裂纹，而产生该现象的最主要原因是电池正极处的铁离子溶解进入电解液后沉积于负极表面。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Effect of resistance of graphite/LiFePO4 cells with different rolling thickness
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The resistance of lithium- ion cell before and after cycles was affected by the rolling thickness of the cathode electrode. The characteristics of structure and morphology were investigated by scanning electron microscope (SEM), inductive coupled plasma emission spectrometer (ICP), and X- ray photoelectron spectrometer (XPS). The results showed that the rolling thickness affected contact resistance between active material and collector. Contact resistance increase of the cell was in relationship with cycle number and the battery cathode surface produced obvious cracks. The surface components were the deposition of dissolved Fe cations from the cathode.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.citation:

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 热处理对Gd3Al2-xGax系合金磁热效应的影响
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 生利英
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 包头职业技术学院材料工程系，内蒙古 包头 014030
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 采用真空高频磁悬浮炉制备了Gd3Al2-xGax（x=0，0. 1，0. 2，0. 3）4种样品。把样品分2份：1份不进行热处理，1份置于真空烧结炉中进行退火处理。首先用磁热效应直接测量仪测量热处理前后样品在1. 5 T磁场下的绝热温变；然后利用XRD测量样品的结构；最后选取典型样品采用SEM观察其组织形貌。结果表明，热处理前后Gd3Al2-xGax合金的结构相同；最大居里温度下降2 K；主相增加，杂相减少；绝热温变提高。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Influence of heat treatment process on magnetocaloric effect in Gd3Al2-xGax
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Four samples of Gd3Al2-xGax（x=0，0. 1，0. 2，0. 3）were prepared in a high- frequency floating furnace. The samples were divided into two parts: one part without heat treatment, the other for annealing treatment put in vacuum sintering furnace. Firstly，the adiabatic temperature of samples before and after heat treatment was measured by direct measurement of magnetocaloric effect instrument under magnetic field change of 1. 5 T. Then，the Structure was measured by XRD. Finally，the microstructure and morphology of typical sample was observed by SEM. The results showed that the structure of Gd3Al2-xGax alloys is the same before and after heat treatment; the biggest Curie temperature declines 2 K; the main phase increases, the mixed phase decreases; the diabatic temperature change is improved.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 王庆凯, 赵军涛, 张玉孟, 葛鹏
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 烟台正海磁性材料股份有限公司，山东 烟台 264006
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 研究了烧结钕铁硼制备中磁粉粒度与烧结温度以及磁性能之间的关系。研究结果表明：随着磁粉粒度的降低，磁体的矫顽力Hcj增加；但磁粉粒度降低至2. 4 μm以下时，Hcj不再继续增加，反而降低。另外，对比研究了采用细晶工艺制备的Co含量不同的钕铁硼磁体的耐蚀性能，结果表明Co可以显著改善磁体的失重。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Investigation on preparation of high performance sintered Nd- Fe- B through grain refinement treatment
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The relationship between the NdFeB powder size and the sintering temperature, the magnetic properties was researched. The results showed that the sintered NdFeB’s intrinsic coercivity increases with the decreased powder size. However, when the powder size decreases further to lower than 2. 4 μm, the coercivity cannot be improved any further but starts to decrease. In addition, the sintered NdFeB with different Co content through the grain refinement treatment was investigated. The weight loss of the magnets decreases with the increasing of the Co content.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 在菱形路径下接触应力对35CrMoA微动疲劳特性的影响
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 沈月,何国球, 田丹丹, 刘晓山, 吕世泉
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 同济大学材料科学与工程学院,上海市金属功能材料开发应用重点实验室, 上海 201804
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 研究了在菱形加载路径，相同等效应力幅值（400 MPa）下，不同接触应力（50、150、250 MPa）对35CrMoA微动疲劳特性的影响。循环应力响应表明：接触应力越高，35CrMoA循环软化的程度越严重。滞后回线表明：微动疲劳的破坏主要由剪切应力引起，剪应力- 剪应变循环滞后环的面积随着接触应力增大而变大。微动斑微观结果表明：当接触应力较小时，微动斑中的滑移区较宽，粘着区较窄，反之亦然；接触应力越大，微动斑磨损越严重。微动疲劳宏观断口表明：微动疲劳裂纹源萌生于微动斑，裂纹开始扩展的方向垂直于试样表面。
keywords_cn: 合金钢，35CrMoA，微动疲劳，接触应力，菱形路径
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: fatigue of 35CrMoA under the diamond loading path
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Effects of different contact stress (50, 150, 250 MPa) on fretting fatigue of 35CrMoA were investigated, the study was at the same equivalent stress amplitude (400 MPa) under the diamond loading path. Cyclic hardening/softening exhibited that the higher of the contact stress, the more serious of the degree of cyclic softening was. The result of hysteresis loop indicated that the fretting fatigue damage of 35CrMoA was mainly caused by shear stress under the diamond loading path, the shear stress- strain cycle hysteresis loop areas became larger with increasing the contact stress. The SEM of fretting zone showed that when the value of contact stress was lower, the slip region in the fretting zone was wide, and the adhesive region was narrow, and vice versa.The macro fracture of fretting fatigue illustrated that the crack source was initiative at the fretting zone and the fatigue cracks in the initial phase were perpendicular to the sample surface.
keywords_en: steel alloy, 35CrMoA, contact stress, fretting fatigue, the diamond loading path
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.citation:
沈月 何国球 田丹丹 刘晓山 吕世泉. 在菱形路径下接触应力对35CrMoA微动疲劳特性的影响[J]. , 2015, 22(5): 25-31.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 中钢天源高性能永磁铁氧体材料研发进展
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 李小艳, 赵修彬, 李劲松, 邱伟国, 舒云峰, 马宝
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 中钢集团安徽天源科技股份有限公司，安徽 马鞍山 243000
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 近年来，永磁铁氧体材料的市场容量稳步发展，高性能永磁铁氧体材料技术发展十分迅速，介绍了国际上高性能永磁铁氧体当前发展水平，并着重介绍了近年来中钢天源公司的高性能永磁铁氧体材料研究开发情况，最后对中钢天源高性能产品未来市场情况和技术发展进行了展望。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Research and development of high- performance permanent ferrite of Sinosteel Tianyuan
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The market capacity of the permanent ferrite material developed steadily in recent years. High- performance permanent ferrite materials technology has developed very rapidly. The current developments level of international high performance permanent ferrite, and presents highlightly the recent research and development of high- performance permanent ferrite of Sinosteel Tianyuan were introduced. Finally, prospect the future market conditions and technological development of high- performance products.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 结合剂含量对陶瓷膜结构及性能影响
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 康峰，刘开琪，罗志勇
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 中国钢研科技集团有限公司特种陶瓷与耐火材料北京市重点实验室,北京 100081
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 以平均粒径20 μm的α- Al2O3为原料，高岭土、硅灰为结合剂，制备出具有高强度的氧化铝陶瓷膜。研究了结合剂含量对陶瓷膜物相组成、显微结构、气孔率及耐压强度的影响。结果表明：通过改变结合剂的含量，氧化铝陶瓷膜的气孔率变化为36. 3%～36. 7%；耐压强度变化为53. 7～105. 9 MPa，且随着结合剂含量增加，耐压强度呈先增大后减小的趋势。当结合剂质量分数为7. 5%时，耐压强度达到最大值105. 9 MPa，显微结构良好，孔隙分布均匀。
keywords_cn: 结合剂，陶瓷膜，高强度结构
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Effect of the content of binding agent on structure and properties of ceramic membranes
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：High strength and high porous alumina ceramic membrane was prepared with the raw material of average particle size of 20 μm α- Al2O3, the solvent of deionized water, the binding agent of kaolin and silica fume. The effect of binding agent on phase composition, microstructure, porosity and compressive strength of ceramic membranes were discussed. The results showed that alumina ceramic membranes with high porosity ranging from 36. 3%- 36. 7% were prepared by adjusting the content of binding agent. The compressive strength of the sample was between 59 to 105. 9 MPa, which showed a first increasing and then decreasing trend with the content of binding agent increasing and reached 105. 9 MPa at the 7. 5% (mass fraction) binding agent.
