http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 综述了国内外目前关于LiAlH4及其复合体系目前研究的现状。对LiAlH4及其复合体系LiAIH4- LiNH2、LiAlH4- MgH2和LiAlH4/NH4Cl储氢性能的研究情况进行了详细介绍，并对LiAlH4及其复合体系研究中存在的关键问题进行了概述。

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Research trend of LiAlH4 and compound system of LiAlH4 in both home and abroad is summarized. Study on hydrogen storage capacity of LiAlH4 and compound system of LiAlH4, such as, LiAIH4- LiNH2, LiAlH4- MgH2 and LiAlH4/NH4Cl was detailedly introduced. The current major problem existed in study on LiAlH4 and compound system of LiAlH4 was summarized.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 多孔Ti3SiC2金属间化合物的制备
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 李端阳，袁静，李松，秦高梧
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 东北大学材料各向异性与织构教育部重点实验室，辽宁 沈阳 110819
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: Ti3SiC2金属间化合物综合了金属和陶瓷诸多优异性能，具有低密度、高弹性模量、高强度和高稳定性，同时表现出良好的塑性，是热和电的良导体，易于机械加工，抗热震性优良。为制备Ti3SiC2多孔材料，系统研究了Ti3SiC2浆料的性质，通过水解和电动力学实验研究,结果表明，未添加分散剂的Ti3SiC2悬浮液在pH=4~11范围内很难保持浆料的稳定性。添加干粉质量分数为1% 和1. 5% 的PEI可使Ti3SiC2悬浮液在pH=4~8范围内具有很高的稳定性。并在此工作的基础上，以聚氨酯海绵为模板，采用有机浸渍法及随后的高温煅烧获得了Ti3SiC2多孔材料。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Fabrication of porous Ti3SiC2 intermetallic compound
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Ti3SiC2 intermetallic compound combines some excellent performance of both metals and ceramics. It has a low density, high Young’s modulus, high strength and high thermal stability. It also exhibits excellent thermal and electrical conductivity, as well as good resistance to thermal shock. In addition, it is machinable with conventional tools. In order to fabricate porous Ti3SiC2 material, the slurry of Ti3SiC2 should been systematically investigated. The slurry without any dispersant can not keep stable in the range of pH 4- 11, determined by hydrolysis and eletroacoustic spectrum. With addition of 1 dwb% or 1. 5 dwb% polythylenimine (PEI) to the slurry of Ti3SiC2, the stabilization of slurry can be significantly improved. Using the stable Ti3SiC2 slurry, the porous Ti3SiC2 material was fabricated via "polymer sponge" method with polyurethane sponge as a template and followed by high temperature sintering.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.citation:

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 原位析出Li3Bi对Li- Mg- N- H体系放氢动力学性能的影响
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 米菁,郝雷, 刘晓鹏, 杜淼, 蒋利军, 王树茂
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 北京有色金属研究总院, 北京 100088
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 基于对Li- Mg- N- H体系放氢动力学机理的研究发现，其放氢过程的速率控制步骤是Li+、H+ 或H-的扩散。在实验中，原位析出的Li3Bi相增加了Li- Mg- N- H体系放氢过程中Li+离子的扩散速率，进而使得该体系在200 ℃下放氢量(质量分数)从4.37% 增加到4.55%，达到90%放氢量的放氢时间从298 min缩短到11 min。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: In situ formation of Li3Bi and its improvement on the dehydrogenation kinetic property of Li- Mg- N- H system
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Based on the understanding of dehydrogenation and hydrogenation reaction mechanism, the origin of kinetic barrier of the Li- Mg- N- H system is the mobility. In the experiment, the formation of Li3Bi phase increases the diffusion rate of Li+. The dehydrogenation capacity(mass fraction) is increased from 4.37% to 4.55% and the time required for 90% dehydrogenation is reduced from 298 min to around 11 min for the sample with 10% Bi (mass fraction) measured at 200 ℃.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.citation:

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 不同冷却速度下45钢枝晶生长过程的原位观察
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 严春亮1，王凤鸣2，张庆军1
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn:
1. 华北理工大学分析测试中心，河北 唐山 063009
2.华北理工大学理学院 ，河北 唐山063009
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 利用超高温激光共聚焦显微镜对45钢在不同冷却速度下的凝固过程中枝晶的形成进行原位观察，研究45钢在不同的冷却速度下,凝固过程中的枝晶生长状况。凝固结束后,对枝晶的形貌进行观察、测量和分析枝晶间距，研究冷速度对枝晶及最终凝固组织的影响。结果表明：在凝固过程中随着温度的降低，枝晶不断生长，新核也不断形成，随着冷却速度的加快，枝晶组织明显细化。冷却速率由50 ℃/min到400 ℃/min的过程中，一次枝晶间距由0.54 mm减小至0.34 mm
keywords_cn: 关键词: 凝固 冷却速度 枝晶
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: In situ observation of dendritic growth of 45 steel under different cooling rates
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：In situ observations of dendrite formation in the process of solidification of 45 steel under different cooling rate was explored by use of high temperature laser confocal microscope. The dendritic growth in 45 steel during different cooling rate was studied. After the solidification, the morphology of dendritic crystal was observed; the primary dendrite arm spacing was measured and analyzed. The effect of cooling rate on the dendritic and final solidification structure was studied. The results showed that the dendrite growth continually and the new nuclear also constantly form with the decrease of temperature in the process of solidification; the structure of dendritic structure obviously refined with the increase of cooling rate. The primary dendrite spacing decreased from 0.54 mm to 0.34 mm in the process of cooling rate from 50 ℃ /min to 400 ℃ /min.

2. 浙江英洛华磁业有限公司，浙江 东阳 322118
3. 昆明理工大学，云南 昆明650093
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 电镀技术是钕铁硼材料应用中的重要防护技术，钕铁硼材料的电镀技术是随着钕铁硼材料应用范围的扩大而逐渐发展完善的，钕铁硼材料的电镀技术和装备的发展经历了模仿、改进和创新发展几个过程。经过30年的发展，钕铁硼电镀技术已经由一门单纯的表面防护技术发展成为集材料研发、电镀技术研发、工艺设计和设备制造一体的综合技术。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: The development of electroplating process and equipment on NdFeB permanent magnet materials
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Electroplating technology is an important protection technology in NdFeB materials’ practical application. The electroplating technology of NdFeB material is developing gradually with the enlargement of the scope NdFeB materials’ practical application. Then the development history of electroplating technology and equipment on NdFeB material can be summarized as several process, imitation, improvement and innovation. After 30 years’ development, NdFeB electroplating technology is not only a simple surface protection technology, but also it has developed into aintegrated technology which combined with materials research, plating technology research, process design and equipment manufacturing.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 关键工艺参量对Sm(Co0.715Fe0.20Cu0.06Zr0.025)z磁体磁性能的影响
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 苏帅， 王云峤， 岳明， 张东涛， 张久兴
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 北京工业大学新型功能材料教育部重点实验室，北京 100124
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 采用真空感应熔炼获得了名义成分为Sm(Co0.715Fe0.20Cu0.06Zr0.025)7和Sm(Co0.715Fe0.20Cu0.06Zr0.025)9.5两种铸锭，经过破碎球磨后以不同的比例混粉制备不同z值的样品。然后使用不同的烧结温度、固溶温度以及时效工艺，对z值分别为7.86、7.63和7.41的三种成分的磁体进行了处理。结果表明，z值为7.86的磁体在室温时拥有最佳磁性能，剩磁、矫顽力和磁能积分别达到1.13 T、2 387.32 kA/m和226.40 kJ/m3。在300 ℃时其剩磁为1. 013 T，矫顽力为831.59 kA/m，最大磁能积为164.17 kJ/m3，磁体综合磁性能良好。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Influence of preparation process on magnetic properties of Sm(Co0.715Fe0.20Cu0.06Zr0.025)z permanent magnet
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The alloys with the nominal compositions Sm(Co0.715Fe0.20Cu0.06Zr0.025)7 and Sm(Co0.715Fe0.20Cu0.06Zr0.025)9.5 were prepared by induction melting. The two kinds of ball milled powders were mixed to obtain the magnets with different z value. The processing conditions of sintering, solid solution and aging were investigated for the Sm(Co0.715Fe0.20Cu0.06Zr0.025)z magnets with z=7.86, 7.63, 7.41, respectively. The results show that the magnet with z=7.86 has a optimal magnetic properties at room temperature, Br，Hcj and (BH)max reached 1.13 T, 2 387. 32 kA/m and 226.40 kJ/m3. Moreover, the magnet has a good magnetic performance at 300 ℃, Br =1.013 T, Hcj =831.59 kA/m, (BH)max= 164.17 kJ/m3.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.citation:

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: CO与CO2在铂表面吸附模式或可能性研究
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 陈艳平，秦宏伟，李玲，胡季帆
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 山东大学物理学院，山东 济南 250100
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 用第一性原理密度泛函理论研究了CO在Pt(111)、Pt(100)面上的吸附行为，并对吸附体系的吸附热、C- O键和C- Pt键的键长、布居数分析、电子态密度进行了研究。经比较吸附能、化学键参数和CO布居数，发现在CO主要以C朝下的方式吸附在Pt位，C原子与Pt原子间发生了强烈的杂化作用。为防止铂CO中毒, 一般可采用在燃料气中充入一定量的氧气，这些氧气与CO反应生成CO2。计算表明，CO2不会在Pt（111）与(100)上面吸附， 从而表明生成的CO2不会阻挡CO与Pt的作用，不会降低Pt的催化效应。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Study of adsorption modes or possibility for CO and CO2 on Pt surfaces
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Using density functional theory, the adsorption of CO on the Pt(111), Pt(100) surface were investigated. The adsorption energy，bond lengths of C- O, C- Pt, Pt- Pt, population analysis and density of state (DOS) were calculated．The results showed that the most stable mode is C- down on the Pt(111), Pt(100) surface, and there are orbital hybridizations between the orbits of C and Pt atoms. Generally to prevent platinum poisoning, a certain amount of oxygen can be used in the fuel gas, and the oxygen will react with CO to generate CO2. The calculation results show that CO2 can not be adsorbed on Pt (111) and (100) surfaces, which indicates that the generated CO2 will not stop the reaction between CO and Pt, thus will not reduce the catalytic effect of Pt.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.citation:
陈艳平，秦宏伟，李玲，胡季帆. CO与CO2在铂表面吸附模式或可能性研究[J]. , 2015, 22(5): 1-5.
CHEN Yan- ping, QIN Hong- wei, LI Ling, HU Ji- fan. Study of adsorption modes or possibility for CO and CO2 on Pt surfaces. , 2015, 22(5): 1-5.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 基于滚压强化的钛合金零件工艺改进
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 朱朝晖, 刘进明
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 苏州大学机电工程学院，江苏 苏州 215131
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 为了提高Ti- 6Al- 4V零件的疲劳强度，采用滚压强化的工艺方法加工零件的过渡圆角和螺纹。针对零件滚压后出现了表面缺口及表面裂纹等缺陷，从零件的技术要求入手分析不合格原因，改进了工艺，使得产品合格率从86.7%上升到了96%，并对该工艺改进进行了讨论，提供了可借鉴的经验。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Process improvement of titanium alloy parts based on rolling strengthening
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to improve the fatigue strength of Ti- 6Al- 4V parts，the transition fillet and the thread of the parts are worked by rolling strengthening process. However, notch and crack defects appeared on surface after rolling. So the reason for the failure of the transition fillet and the thread surface is analyzed from the technical requirements analysis, the product qualification rate is greatly raised from 86.7% to 96% after the process improvement. Three referential experiences are provided after the process improvement was discussed.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 闭孔泡沫铝中低频振动的阻尼性能测试
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 王辉1，范爱琴2，薛俊强3，吕昭平1
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn:
1.北京科技大学新金属材料国家重点实验室，北京 100083
2.钢铁研究总院科技信息与战略研究所，北京 100081
3. 北京科技大学机械工程学院，北京 100083
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 为研究泡沫铝材料的动态减振性能，利用自行设计的实验装置，通过电磁振动实验台配合多通道动态信号采集分析系统，对泡沫铝材料在不同激振条件下的减振效果进行了系统研究。结果表明，泡沫铝材料在中高频下具有优异的减振效果且具有很大的频率依赖性，试样几何参数对其减振范围具有重要影响，相同条件下孔径越小减振效果越优异。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: The damping performance measurement of cellular aluminium foam on low frequency vibration
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Using electromagnetic vibration test platform with multi- channel dynamic signal acquisition and analysis system, low frequency vibration dynamic damping property of cellular aluminium foam was investigated systematically. The results show that cellular aluminium foam displays excellent vibration damping effect and its performance is closely depended on the frequency under the medium and high frequency loads. Moreover, the geometrical parameters of the samples have important influence on the vibration reduction range, and the smaller the pore- size is, the better the damping effect is under the same conditions. The results of the research can provide the experimental basis for the engineering application of cellular aluminium foam.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.date: 通讯作者: 王辉     E-mail: wanghui@ustb.edu.cn

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 复合催化剂Co2B/TiO2对NaBH4水解放氢的影响
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 郑雪萍，刘敏，鲁卓睿，刘胜林
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 长安大学材料科学与工程学院，陕西 西安 710061
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 实验通过排水法研究了复合催化剂Co2B/TiO2对NaBH4水解放氢性能的影响。研究结果显示，复合催化剂Co2B/TiO2配比以及加入量对NaBH4的放氢量的影响不是很明显，当改变复合催化剂的加入量以及复合催化剂的配比时，NaBH4的水解放氢量都介于343~375 mL之间。然而，NaBH4水解放氢速率的研究发现，复合催化剂Co2B/TiO2加入量以及复合催化剂配比对NaBH4的水解放氢速率的影响非常大，当复合催化剂的加入量在1%~4%的变化区间时，掺杂复合催化剂的试样的放氢速率随着掺杂量的增加都呈现出了一个明显的增加趋势，在所有掺杂复合催化剂Co2B/TiO2的试样中，掺杂5% Co2B/2TiO2试样的放氢速率最大，达到了187.5 mL/min。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Effects of composite catalyst Co2B/TiO2 on hydrolysis of NaBH4
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The effect of compound catalyst Co2B/TiO2 on hydrogen generation by hydrolysis of NaBH4 was studied through drainage method. The results show that the effects of the proportioning and amount of Co2B/TiO2 on amount of hydrogen release of NaBH4 are not obvious. Changing the proportioning and the amount of Co2B/TiO2, the amount of hydrogen release by hydrolysis of NaBH4 is between 343-375 mL. However, the study on the rate of hydrogen release finds that the effects of the proportioning and amount of Co2B/TiO2 on the rate of hydrogen release are very marked. The rate of hydrogen release of samples doped with Co2B/TiO2 presents an obvious increase with the amount of Co2B/TiO2 when the amount of Co2B/TiO2 is 1%-4%. Among all the samples doped with Co2B/TiO2, the rate of hydrogen release of the sample doped with 5% Co2B/2TiO2 is the largest and reaches 187.5 mL/min.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.citation:

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：A novel technology of SHS ceramic liner technology was proposed through adding graphite rod in the reaction to solve the problem that the length of the small- caliber SHS ceramic- lined composite pipe prepared by traditional technology. A small- diameter ceramic- lined composite pipe with a length of 650 mm was successfully prepared which proved that the new technology was capable to improve the length of the composite pipe. The coating of the small- diameter ceramic- lined composite pipe was about 2 mm which has a dense structure and closely combined with the matrix. All of the mechanical properties tested in the paper of the sample made by new technology were better than the sample made by traditional technology.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 片状Al- Ni合金快速水解制氢的研究
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 胥小丽，魏范松，肖兵，杨志轩，王想花
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 江苏科技大学材料科学与工程学院，江苏 镇江 212003
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 通过HVDS- П高真空甩带机熔炼制备一种能快速水解制氢的Al- Ni合金，考察了合金成分以及碱溶液浓度对铝水解制氢性能的影响。由水解曲线和XRD结果表明，添加一定量的Ni能有效的提高合金的活性，常温下该系列合金与水反应迅速。在20%浓度的KOH溶液中，反应速率由纯Al的1.53 mL /(min·cm2)增加到Al- 3%Ni合金的2.31 mL /(min·cm2)，同时显著地减少了制氢反应时间，Al- 4%Ni合金能在60 min内反应完全，而纯Al需要140 min，反应时间是Al- 4%Ni合金的2倍。由不同的碱溶液浓度得到的实验结果显示，碱浓度提高能直接加快反应速率。Al- 4%Ni合金由1.99 mL /(min·cm2)（15% KOH）增大到3.0 mL /(min·cm2)（25% KOH）。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: The research of hydrogen production from rapid hydrolysis of sheet Al- Ni alloys
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：A novel material for rapid generating hydrogen by splitting water, Al- Ni alloy, was prepared by HVDS- П high vacuum machine. The effects of alloy composition and concentration of alkali solution were studied through the hydrolysis experiments and XRD analysis. The results showed that add a certain amount of Ni can improve the activity of the alloys. The hydrogen production rate increase from 1.53 mL /(min·cm2) (x=0,in 20%KOH) to 2.31 mL / (min·cm2) (x=3, in 20%KOH). The hydrogen reaction time of Al alloy was twice of Al- 4%Ni alloy. The different alkali solution concentration experiments results showed that the alkali concentration can improve directly to speed up the reaction from 1.99 mL / (min·cm2) (x=4, in 15% KOH) to 3.0 mL / (min·cm2) (x=4, in 25% KOH).

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 利用高温激光共聚焦显微镜加上自行研制的脉冲磁场发生装置，研究脉冲磁场对45钢凝固组织的影响。在熔体凝固阶段中施加不同的脉冲磁场，分析不同强度的磁场电压对最终凝固组织影响。结果表明：施加脉冲磁场较未施加时组织明显细化，随着励磁电压的提高，凝固组织明显细化。将脉冲磁场电压由10 V增加到50 V，试样平均晶粒尺寸由720 μm降至416 μm。

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Effect of low pressure pulse magnetic field on solidification structure of 45 steel
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The influence of pulse magnetic field on the solidified structure of steel was explored by use of high temperature laser confocal microscope equipped with independently developed pulse magnetic field generator. In the melt solidification phase of applying different voltage, analysis of different voltage of pulse magnetic field impact on final solidification organization. The results showed that the microstructure of the sample with the magnetic field is obviously refined compared with the sample without magnetic field. And with the increase of excitation voltage, the solidification structure is obviously refined. The pulse magnetic field voltage is increased from 10 V to 50 V, the average grain size of the sample is from 720 μm to 416 μm.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 快速凝固LaMg0.25Ni4.0-xCo0.75Alx(x=0～0.3)合金的相结构与电化学性能
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 朱凡红，魏范松，肖佳宁，蔡鑫，高旭红
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 江苏科技大学材料科学与工程学院, 江苏 镇江 212003
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 对LaMg0.25Ni4.0-xCo0.75Alx(x=0～0.3)系列合金进行了快速凝固处理（15 m/s），系统研究了该条件下Al部分替代Ni对合金相结构和电化学性能的影响。XRD分析结果表明，合金主要由La4MgNi19相(A5B19型) 和LaNi5相（CaCu5型）相组成，两相的晶胞体积（V）和LaNi5相的相丰度均随x的增加而增大。电化学性能测试表明，x的增加，会使合金的活化性能、最大放电容量以及高倍率放电性能(HRD)下降，但循环稳定性有明显改善，如100次循环后的容量保持率（S100）从x=0的59.07%提高到了x=0.3合金的85.99%。研究认为，合金中较高吸氢相（A5B19型）随x的增加而减少是导致合金电极最大放电容量下降的主要原因，而循环寿命的改善则是由于Al含量的增加降低了合金颗粒的吸氢体积膨胀率，同时减小了两种吸氢主相在吸放氢过程中产生的内应力，从而降低了合金电极的粉化程度所致。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: The structure and electrochemical propertiest of melt- spun LaMg0.25 Ni4.0-xCo0.75Alx(x=0～0.3) hydrogen storage alloys
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The LaMg0.25Ni4.0-xCo0.75Alx(x=0～0.3) alloys were prepared by melt spun treatment (15 m/s), and the effect of Al substitution for Ni on the phase structure and electrochemical properties of the alloys were systematically studied. The XRD analysis reveal that all the alloys are composed of La4MgNi19（A5B19 type）and LaNi5 phases. With the increasing of x value, the cell volume（V） of the two phases and the phase abundance of LaNi5 phase generally increase. The electrochemical measurements show that the increase of Al content decreases the activation properties, maximum discharge capacity and high-rate discharge ability (HRD) of the alloy electrodes, but improve the cyclic stability obviously. For example, the capacity retention rate after 100 cycles (S100) increases from 59.07% (x=0) to 85.99% (x=0.3). It is found that the decrease of maximum discharge capacity is due to the decrease of higher absorbing hydrogen phase, and the main reason for the improving cyclic life of the alloy electrodes is that the increase of Al content reduces the hydrogen absorption volume expansion rate of the particles, and decrease the internal stress caused by two kinds of hydrogen absorption phases during ab-desorbing hydrogen process, which can reduce the degrees of pulverization of alloy particles.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.citation:

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 熔体过热处理工艺对GH4169合金组织和力学性能的影响
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 郭晓凡，寇生中，蒲永亮，曲红霞，董天文，张志栋
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 兰州理工大学省部共建有色金属先进加工与再利用国家重点实验室，甘肃 兰州 730050
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 选用光学显微镜、扫描电镜和电子万能试验机研究了不同熔体过热处理对GH4169合金组织和力学性能的影响。结果表明：熔体过热处理后，合金组织形貌规整，γ+Laves共晶团、有害Laves相析出数量减少，分布均匀；合金室温综合力学性能显著提高，存在最佳过热温度，此时Rm最大值为721 MPa，约是过热处理前的1.5倍；GH4169合金的硬度降低，存在最小值为10.15 HRC，与过热处理前相比，降低26.7%； Nb、Mo元素偏析显著降低。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Effect of melt superheat treatment on microstructure and mechanical properties of GH4169 alloy
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The effect of melt superheat treatment on microstructure and mechanical properties of GH4169 alloy were investigated by using the optical, scanning electron microscope and electronic universal testing machine. The results showed that the microstructure morphology of GH4169 alloy is neat, uniform distribution after the melt superheat treatment. The number of γ+ Laves eutectic group and fewer harmful Laves phase are decreased. The comprehensive mechanical properties at room temperature of alloy are significantly improved. The Rm (721 MPa) is about 1.5 times in front of the overheating at the best overheating temperature. The hardness of GH4169 alloy was reduce, there is the minimum 10.15 HRC, compared with the overheating before processing, reduced by 26.7%; Nb and Mo element segregation significantly reduced.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Research review of amorphous soft magnetic materials and their development
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The situation of research and development of amorphous soft magnetic ribbon alloys were introduced. The topics are mainly focused on the scientific research, manufacture and technical application in this field around the world. Some kinds of suggestive discussions and expectations are given for the technical barriers of amorphous and nanocrystalline soft magnetic ribbons in future market development.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 主要从液化储氢、高压气态储氢、金属氢化物储氢及复合储氢等4个方面总结了氢气的主要储存技术及其发展。重点介绍了金属氢化物储氢材料的研究进展及其应用。尤其是对储氢材料在大规模风电储能中的实际应用作了阐述。

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 黎凯强，向雄志，白晓军，梁宝盈，龚文亚
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 深圳大学材料学院，深圳市特种功能材料重点实验室，广东，深圳 518060
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 研究了不同粒度和石墨含量对铜- 镀铜石墨复合材料性能的影响。结果表明，大颗粒石墨复合材料具有较高的电导率，而小颗粒石墨复合材料在硬度以及摩擦磨损性能上更好；无论哪种粒度的石墨，其质量分数为9%时综合性能最优。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Effects of particle size and copper- coated graphite content on properties of the Cu/copper- coated graphite compose
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The effects of particle size and copper- coated graphite content on properties of the Cu/copper- coated graphite compose were studied. The results show that in Cu/copper- coated graphite composite, the larger particles have a higher electrical conductivity than the smaller particles, and the smaller particles shows well friction and wear behaviors. No matter what kind of particle size, the composite with 9% graphite had the best comprehensive properties.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 正极片的搁置时间对锂离子电池平均内阻影响研究
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 张宝，苗萌，朱晓辉
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 合肥国轩高科动力能源有限公司，安徽 合肥 230001
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 研究了正极片的不同搁置时间对正极片电阻率及其制作的电池平均内阻变化的影响。采用场发射电子显微镜（FE- SEM）、感应耦合等离子体原子发射光谱仪（ICP）及X- 射线光电子能谱仪（XPS）等测试手段对正极片进行了表征。结果表明，在不同搁置时间(0~25 h)段，正极片电阻率是受磷酸铁锂表面碳包覆层与磷酸铁锂作用力、磷酸铁锂与水反应以及粘合剂的粘合作用共同影响的。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Effect of average resistance of graphite/LiFePO4 cells with different hold times
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The effects of the different hold time on the resistivity of positive electrode and average resistance of the cells were investigated. The characteristics of structure and morphology were investigated by scanning electron microscope (SEM), X- ray photoelectron spectrometer (XPS), and inductive coupled plasma emission spectrometer (ICP). The results showed that the resistivity of positive electrode was affected by force of the carbon layer on the LiFePO4 and LiFePO4, the reaction of LiFePO4 and H2O, and the adhesion of adhesive.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 杜世举1，李建1，程星华1，刘涛1，齐彩孜2，喻晓军1
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn:
1.中国钢研科技集团有限公司，北京 100081
2.深圳高级中学国际部，广州 深圳 518040
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 晶界扩散处理技术是将重稀土附着于钕铁硼磁体表面并通过高温处理过程使其扩散渗入磁体内部的技术。与传统技术相比较，该技术能用少量重稀土大幅提高磁体矫顽力而剩磁几乎不变。总结和归纳了已公开报道的晶界扩散处理技术成果，还详细论述了该技术最新研究。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Grain boundary diffusion technique and research development
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Grain boundary diffusion(GBD) technique is able to drastically increase the coercivity of the Nd- Fe- B sintered magnet but merely decreasing the remanence just with little amount of heavy rare earth(HRE), which is achieved by attachment and subsequent high- temperature diffusing process of the HRE. The GBD research results that have been reported so far, and then, the very new improvement of the technology and theoretical study progress is also shown.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 以钛板为骨架的SCR催化剂的制备研究及其性能测试
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 刘冠夫, 童震松, 宋存义, 钱大益
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 北京科技大学土木与环境工程学院,北京 100083
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 选用钛板作为催化剂的骨架，以磷酸、聚乙烯醇为助剂，采用提拉法，在钛板表面制备二氧化钛涂层，再采用分步浸渍法制备催化剂。探索此方法下磷酸、聚乙烯醇加入量的变化及水粉比对二氧化钛涂层BET（比表面积）及耐磨性能的影响，优选出磷酸和聚乙烯醇的最佳添加量以及水粉比。按照实验得出的最优配比制备的催化剂BET值为10. 57 m2/g。浸渍活性成分后，通过烟气模拟实验，O2的质量分数保持在5%条件下制得催化剂在 350~450 ℃之间的脱硝效率高于90%。
keywords_cn: 关键词：板式脱硝催化剂
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Preparation study and performance test of SCR denitration catalyst with the skeleton of the titanium plate
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The titanium plate as the skeleton of the catalyst and phosphate and PVA as additives were selected. The preparing of the catalyst used the manner, which firstly preparing a titanium oxide coating on the surface of the titanium plate and impregnating the active ingredient. By examining the additive amount of phosphate and PVA affects the coating BET value and abrasion resistant, select the optimal addition amount. Then, the performance of the catalyst was examined by BET and the imitating the flue gas denitrification test. When O2 content（mass fraction） in the flue gas were maintained at about 5%, the catalyst denitrification efficiency is higher than 90% between 350~450 ℃.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 氧化石墨烯- Fe2O3复合材料的制备及其光催化脱硝性能
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 李曈1,2，宋存义1,2，童震松1,2
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn:
1.北京科技大学土木与环境工程学院环境工程系，北京 100083
2.工业典型污染物废物资源化处理北京市重点实验室，北京 100083
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 以氧化石墨烯为载体，通过水热法制备了氧化石墨烯- Fe2O3复合材料，并利用X射线衍射、扫描电镜和X射线光电子能谱等手段对其进行了表征；在H2O2- 紫外光体系中加入一定量的GO- Fe2O3光催化剂，研究了其光催化氧化脱硝性能。光催化氧化实验结果表明，NO转化率随催化剂投加量、H2O2浓度、溶液温度、氧气浓度等因素的增加而提升，达到一定值后转化率保持不变或转而降低，即在催化剂投加量0. 5 g/100 mL，H2O2浓度0. 5 mol/L，溶液温度30 ℃，氧气体积浓度为6%时，氮氧化物转化效率达84. 33%。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Synthesis and photocatalytic denitrification performance of graphene oxide/Fe2O3 composites
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Graphene oxide has been made by improved Hummers method, then using graphene oxide as a carrier to the hydrothermal preparation of graphene oxide iron oxide composite material (GO- Fe2O3), by adjusting the additive amount of raw materials, reaction temperature and time conditions changed into the structure and properties of composite materials. Using, X- ray diffraction (XRD), scanning electron microscopy (SEM) and X- ray photoelectron spectroscopy of the product have been characterized. A certain amount of catalyst in H2O2/UV system was added, the photocatalytic oxidation denitrification performance was studied. The experiment shows that, the conversion rate of NOx improved with the increasing of catalyst dosing quantity, concentration of H2O2, solution temperature, oxygen concentration until they reach a certain value. And then conversion rate remains unchanged or to reduce. The best process parameters : catalyst dosing quantity is 0. 5 g/100 mL, H2O2 concentration 0. 5 mol/L, solution temperature 30 ℃, oxygen volume concentration is 6%, nitrogen oxide degradation efficiency up to 84. 33%.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.citation:

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: Mg3MnNi2-xCox(x=0~0. 2)储氢合金的相结构及电化学性能研究
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 李小雷，巩帅，张世杰，魏明强
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 河南理工大学材料科学与工程学院，河南 焦作 454000
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 为了研究Mg3MnNi2储氢合金的电化学储氢性能，实验采用Co元素部分取代Mg3MnNi2合金中的Ni，用固相扩散法制备出Mg3MnNi2-xCox(x=0~0. 2)系列合金，并分析其相结构，以及测试合金的电化学性能和动力学性能。结果表明：Co元素的添加并不改变合金的主相，Co替代Ni明显改善了合金的放电容量、循环稳定性以及动力学性能等，其中当Co的含量从0增加到0. 2时，合金的最大放电容量达到最大值282. 36 mA·h/g，20次循环后容量保持率仍有74. 7%, 而且动力学性能也是最优，高倍率放电性能ηHRD从66. 4%增长到73. 3%。这主要是Co替代Ni能够降低生成氢化物的稳定性，提高合金的抗粉化能力，以及降低合金的极化电阻。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: The study on phase structure and electrochemical performance of Mg3MnNi2-xCox(x=0~0. 2) hydrogen storage alloys
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to study the electrochemical hydrogen storage characteristics of the Mg3MnNi2 alloy, the Mg3MnNi2-xCox(x=0~0. 2) hydrogen storage alloys were synthesized by sinering method, in which Ni was partially substituted by Co in the alloys. The phase structure was analysed, and the electrochemical performance and dynamics performance were tested. The results show that the principal phase of alloys has not changed after the substituting Ni with Co. The substitution of Co for Ni clearly improves the discharge capacity, cycling stability, dynamics performance and so on. As Co content increase from 0 to 0. 2, the maximum discharge capacity (Cmax) of the alloy increases to 282. 36 mA·h/g, the retention capacity still has 68. 4% after 20 times cycle. And the dynamics performance is optimal, the high- rate discharge ability increases from 66. 4% to 73. 3%. This is mainly due to the substitution of Co for Ni reduces the stability of the hydride, increases the anti- pulverization ability of alloys, and reduces the polarization resistance.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.citation:
李小雷，巩帅，张世杰，魏明强. Mg3MnNi2-xCox(x=0~0. 2)储氢合金的相结构及电化学性能研究[J]. , 2016, 23(1): 26-31.
LI Xiao- lei，GONG Shuai，ZHANG Shi- jie，WEI Ming- qiang. The study on phase structure and electrochemical performance of Mg3MnNi2-xCox(x=0~0. 2) hydrogen storage alloys. , 2016, 23(1): 26-31.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 粘结复合物的磁热效应
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 李道勤1,2，松林1，欧志强1，明明1，王莹1，黄焦宏2
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn:
1. 内蒙古师范大学内蒙古自治区功能材料物理与化学重点实验室，内蒙古 呼和浩特 010022
2. 包头稀土研究院，内蒙古 包头 014030
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 通过高频悬浮炉反复熔炼，在1 363 K纯氩环境下退火144 h后淬火，饱和吸氢后得到母合金样品La0. 9Ce0. 1Fe11. 7-x MnxSi1. 3Hy(x=0. 21, 0. 25)。对其进行等质量塑性粘结，得到复合物。XRD相图结果表明，母合金的主相均为NaZn13型立方结构（空间点群为Fm- 3c）。由热磁曲线和磁熵变曲线可以明显看出，复合物的温变区间与两母合金相比有所增大，并且其熵变值在1. 5 T磁场下依然比Gd的要高很多，最高约为6. 4 J/(kg·K)。复合物的相对制冷能力RCP( S )值与两母合金相比略大。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Magnetocaloric effects of bonded compound of La0. 9Ce0. 1Fe11. 7-x MnxSi1. 3Hy(x=0. 21,0. 25)
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Appropriate amount of raw materials were melted for several times in the high frequency suspension furnace, the obtained ingots were annealed in a high purity argon atmosphere at 1 363 K for 144 h before being quenched into water. Finally, after saturated hydrogen absorption and mixing of the two parents alloys, the composite has achieved. XRD results indicate that the parent compounds mainly consist of the NaZn13- type cubic structure phase with a space group of Fm- 3c. The M- T curves and magnetic entropy change curves show that the bonded composite has a larger temperature change interval than its parent compounds. The magnetic entropy change of the composite is much higher than that of Gd, the maximum value is about 6. 4 J/(kg·K) in a magnetic field change of 1. 5 T. And the larger relative cooling power （RCP(S)） of the composite is remained comparing with its parent compounds.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.citation:
李道勤 ，松林，欧志强，明明，王莹，黄焦宏. 粘结复合物的磁热效应[J]. , 2016, 23(1): 17-20.
LI Dao- qin ,, SONG Lin, OU Zhi- qiang, MING Ming, WANG Ying, HUANG Jiao- hong. Magnetocaloric effects of bonded compound of La0. 9Ce0. 1Fe11. 7-x MnxSi1. 3Hy(x=0. 21,0. 25). , 2016, 23(1): 17-20.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 热处理对Fe基非晶涂层结构与性能的影响
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 吴仡璇，罗强，焦津，沈军
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 同济大学材料科学与工程学院，上海 201804
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 利用HVAF超音速火焰喷涂技术制备了Fe40Cr23Mo14C15B6Y2非晶合金涂层。并将涂层在550、600、665、716、760、811 ℃这6个温度下进行真空热处理。采用X射线衍射仪、差热分析仪、场发射扫描电子显微镜、显微维氏硬度仪、动态极化曲线对涂层进行结构和性能的研究。通过与原始状态下涂层进行对比发现，热处理后涂层会析出Fe、Cr、Mo的碳化物，使得涂层硬度明显升高，而同时也产生贫铬区和孔洞，使得涂层耐腐蚀性能降低。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Effects of heat treatment on structure and properties of Fe- based amorphous coatings
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Fe- based amorphous alloy coatings (Fe40Cr23Mo14C15B6Y2) were deposited by high- velocity air fuel technology. The as- sprayed coatings were heat treated under 550、600、665、716、760、811 ℃, respectively. XRD, DSC, SEM, Vickers Indenter and Electrochemical measurements were used for the investigation on structure and properties of coatings. Compared to the as- sprayed coating, precipitate composed of (Fe, Cr, Mo)- carbide was observed in heat treated coatings, which lead to the increase of hardness and decrease of corrosion resistance.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.citation:
吴仡璇，罗强，焦津，沈军. 热处理对Fe基非晶涂层结构与性能的影响[J]. , 2016, 23(1): 12-16.
WU Yi- xuan, LUO Qiang, JIAO Jin, SHEN Jun. Effects of heat treatment on structure and properties of Fe- based amorphous coatings. , 2016, 23(1): 12-16.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 退火热处理对扁平状Fe- Si- Al磁粉电磁性能的影响
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 张伟，刘天成，朱景森，李德仁，卢志超
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 中国钢研科技集团有限公司，安泰科技股份有限公司，北京 100081
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 采用搅拌球磨工艺对Fe- Si- Al粉末进行了扁平化处理，然后在不同温度及不同保温时间下对其进行了退火处理，借助激光粒度、SEM和XRD，研究了扁平化工艺和热处理工艺对Fe- Si- Al粉末粒度、形貌和物相组成的影响。借助阻抗分析仪，考察了以所制合金粉末为吸收剂制成的吸波材料在1 MHz~100 MHz频率范围内的电磁参数。结果表明：经扁平化和退火处理后，Fe- Si- Al吸波材料的复磁导率得到了显著提高，由经扁平化并经600 ℃退火2 h的Fe- Si- Al粉末制成的吸波材料在1 MHz~100 MHz的低频段具有更加优异的电磁性能，起始磁导率实部达到64。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Annealing treatment’s influence on the electromagnetic properties of flattening Fe- Si- Al powders
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The Fe- Si- Al powders were flattened by using stirring and ball- milling first and then annealed at different temperatures for different time. The effects of flattening and heat treatment on the powder size, morphology and phase were investigated with laser particle size analyzers, SEM and XRD. In addition, the electromagnetic parameters of the microwave absorbing materials made from the prepared Fe- Si- Al powders were studied in a range of 1 MHz- 100 MHz with a impedance analyzer. The results show that the flattening and annealing of Fe- Si- Al powders significantly increase the complex permeability of absorbing materials. The absorbing material which were made by the flattened Fe- Si- Al powders and annealing at 600 ℃ for 2 h shows a more excellent electromagnetic parameters in the range of 1 MHz- 100 MHz, the initial permeability up to 64.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.citation:
张伟，刘天成，朱景森，李德仁，卢志超. 退火热处理对扁平状Fe- Si- Al磁粉电磁性能的影响[J]. , 2016, 23(1): 21-25.
ZHANG Wei, LIU Tian- cheng, ZHU Jing- sen, LI De- ren, LU Zhi- chao. Annealing treatment’s influence on the electromagnetic properties of flattening Fe- Si- Al powders. , 2016, 23(1): 21-25.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 等双轴预拉伸下介电弹性体驱动器力电稳定性分析
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 樊亚玲1，杨宏亮2
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn:
1西安铁路职业技术学院机电工程系, 陕西 西安 710014
2西安科技大学工程训练中心，陕西 西安 710054
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 等双轴预拉伸下介电弹性体驱动器机电稳定性特性是研究衡量介电弹性体性能的重要指标之一。为了解介电弹性体驱动器机电稳定性特性，借助有限元数值模拟手段，针对等双轴预拉伸条件下的介电弹性体驱动器，开展了驱动器力电特性有限元仿真计算，建立了伸长率与名义电场强度之间的关系，将仿真结果与已有的理论计算结果进行了对比，二者完全重合；同时根据等双轴预拉伸情况下系统的状态方程，分析不同预拉伸水平下极限电致应变、电场强度、电位移等参数关系，获取该介电弹性体驱动器稳态工作区间；有限元建模及分析方法可以为等双轴预拉伸驱动器的设计提供参考。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Electromechanical stability analysis for the DE actuator with biaxial pre- stretch
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Electromechanical stability analysis for the DE(dielectric elastomer) actuator with biaxial pre- stretch is one of the important indexes to measure the dielectric elastomer properties By the method of FEM, the characteristics of a DE actuator subject to a voltage and biaxial pre- stretches are simulatedRelationships between the nominal electric field with the stretches, the nominal electric field with the nominal electric displacement, and the true electric field with the stretches are analyzed The simulation results get along well with the results obtained by the theoretical model The results show that the stability of the actuator is markedly enhanced by prestresses, and the method used in the FEM can be used in the design of the design of DE actuators with biaxial pre- stretch
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.citation:
樊亚玲，杨宏亮. 等双轴预拉伸下介电弹性体驱动器力电稳定性分析[J]. , 2016, 23(2): 40-44.
FAN Ya- ling，YANG Hong- liang. Electromechanical stability analysis for the DE actuator with biaxial pre- stretch. , 2016, 23(2): 40-44.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: Mn125Fe065P05Si05-xBx系列化合物的结构及磁性
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 王莹，欧志强，特古斯，李道勤, 松林
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 内蒙古师范大学物理与电子信息学院,内蒙古自治区功能材料物理与化学重点实验室，内蒙古 呼和浩特010022
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 研究了Mn125Fe065P05Si05-xBx(x= 0，001，003，004，006，007)系列化合物的结构及磁性。结果表明,该系列化合物均为Fe2P型六角结构，空间群为P- 62m；磁性测量表明该系列化合物都经历了一级相变，并且均存在热滞，但热滞都较小，当硼的原子分数为007时，热滞最大值为5 K。居里温度随着硼含量的增加，呈现升高的趋势，当硼的原子分数为007时，居里温度为325 K，而化合物的最大磁熵变呈现下降的规律，当硼的原子分数为007时，最大磁熵变为2 J/（kg·K）。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Structural and magnetic properties of Mn125Fe065P05Si05-xBx compounds
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The structure and magnetic properties of Mn125Fe065P05Si05-xBx(x= 0，001，003，004，006，007) compounds were studied The XRD results show that the main phase of the compounds is Fe2P- type hexagonal structure with space group P- 62m Magnetic measurements indicate that the compounds undergo a first- order phase transition, and the thermal hysteresis is very small, the maximum thermal hysteresis is 5 K for B=007（atom fraction） With the increase of the content of B, the Curie temperature increases When the content of B is 007（atom fraction）, the Curie temperature is 325 K and the maximum magnetic entropy is about 2 J/（kg·K） for a field change of 15 T With the increase of the content of B, the maximum magnetic entropy decreases.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.citation:
王莹，欧志强，特古斯，李道勤 松林. Mn125Fe065P05Si05-xBx系列化合物的结构及磁性[J]. , 2016, 23(2): 16-19.
WANG Ying, OU Zhi- qiang, O Tegus, LI Dao- qin, SONG Lin. Structural and magnetic properties of Mn125Fe065P05Si05-xBx compounds. , 2016, 23(2): 16-19.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 20Mn2管材光纤激光焊接焊缝接头组织与性能
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 李彦良，何力佳
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 辽宁工业大学材料科学与工程学院，辽宁 锦州 121001
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 通过金相显微镜、扫描电镜、显微硬度计等分析手段研究了激光焊接20Mn2管材焊接接头的组织与性能。结果表明：当激光功率为2 400 W，焊接速度为73 mm/s，离焦量为0 mm时，焊缝熔深最大。当激光功率为1 200 W，焊接速度为73 mm/s，离焦量为0 mm时，焊缝硬度达到最大值3824HV10。焊缝的主要组织为板条马氏体，热影响区的主要组织为铁素体、珠光体、贝氏体和板条马氏体。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: The microstructure and mechanical property of 20Mn2 pipe by fiber laser welding
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Laser welding on 20Mn2 pipes has been conducted in detail Microstructure and property of welded joint are analyzed by optical metallurgical microscope, scanning electron microscope, micro- hardness tester The microstructure and property of laser welded joints on 20Mn2 pipes with different laser powers, welding speeds and defocus amounts are studied It shows that the maximum weld depth was got when the laser power is 2 400 W, the welding speed is 73 mm/s and the defocus amount is 0 mm When the laser power is 1 200 W, the welding speed is 73 mm/s and the defocus amount is 0 mm, the maximum value of micro- hardness is 3824HV10 The main microstructure of weld is lath martensite The main microstructure of heat affected zone is ferrite, pearlite ,bainite and lath martensite
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.citation:
李彦良，何力佳. 20Mn2管材光纤激光焊接焊缝接头组织与性能[J]. , 2016, 23(2): 35-39.
LI Yan- liang，HE Li- jia. The microstructure and mechanical property of 20Mn2 pipe by fiber laser welding. , 2016, 23(2): 35-39.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: SAW工艺参数对熔敷金属及接头组织与性能的影响
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 王鑫1，吕尚志2，索忠源1，姜峰1，张志浩1
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn:
1吉林化工学院机电工程学院，吉林 吉林 132022
2阿美科福斯特惠勒动力机械有限公司，广东 江门 529141
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 采用SAW对12 mm厚的16Mn钢板进行焊接工艺试验，通过接头几何尺寸、金相组织、显微硬度和室温冲击试验，分析了SAW焊接工艺参数对熔敷金属及接头组织与性能的影响，研究结果表明：SAW电流、电压对接头宏观尺寸均有影响，在中等规范（电流540 A、电压36 V、焊速32 m/h）下焊接，接头组织细小均匀且韧性较好，焊缝和热影响区冲击功分别为92 J和72 J，较其他试样分别提高了2737%和3699%。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: SAW process parameters on the deposited metal and the influence of joint organization and performance
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The 16Mn of 12 mm thick steel plate welding procedure test was made by using SAW The SAW welding process parameters on the deposited metal and the influence of joint microstructure and properties were analyzed through joint macroscopic measurement, microstructure analysis, microhardness test and impact test at room temperature The results show that the affect of SAW current, voltage on joint macro dimensionIn medium specification (current 540 A,voltage 36 V,welding speed 32 m/h),the joint organization fine uniform and better toughness, the impact absorption power of weld zone and heat affected zone were 92 J and 72 J respectively, increased by 2737% and 3699% respectively than other samples.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.citation:
王鑫，吕尚志，索忠源，姜峰，张志浩. SAW工艺参数对熔敷金属及接头组织与性能的影响[J]. , 2016, 23(2): 45-49.
WANG Xin，L Shang- zhi，SUO Zhong- yuan，JIANG Feng ，ZHANG Zi- hao. SAW process parameters on the deposited metal and the influence of joint organization and performance. , 2016, 23(2): 45-49.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 单晶Fe3O4超薄膜的制备与磁性研究
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 张贤楠，刘思润，谢娟，张宪民
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 东北大学材料各向异性与织构教育部重点实验室，辽宁 沈阳 110819
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Preparation and magnetic properties of single crystal Fe3O4 ultra- thin film
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Ultra- thin Fe3O4 films with single crystal structure have been prepared by magneto sputtering method, and the effect of film thickness (3~30 nm) on magnetic properties was systematically investigated X ray diffraction results show that the Fe3O4 films grow along (220) crystal direction, and the full width at half maximum for (220) peak of Fe3O4 films becomes wider and wider with the film thickness decrease Magnetization curves were clearly observed and the saturated magnetization intensity can be 400×103 A/m The measurement of resistivity at low temperature confirms the Verwey transition from conductivity to insulator at around 120 K It is seen that the surface roughness of Fe3O4 film is very low measured by atomic force microscopy, which indicate the Fe3O4 film is suitable for the development of nano- scaled spin electronic devices.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 国产690合金管在碱溶液中的应力腐蚀行为研究
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 马明娟1，李成涛2，张立红1
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn:
1宝钢特钢有限公司, 上海 200940
2苏州热工研究院电站寿命管理技术中心, 江苏 苏州 215004
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 采用金相显微镜和扫描电镜（SEM）方法，分析国产690合金管的微观组织，并利用恒载荷方法分析研究了国产690合金管在氢氧化钠溶液中的应力腐蚀行为。结果表明，国产690合金管呈现等轴奥氏体晶粒，且晶界上分布着连续致密的碳化物；外表面腐蚀形貌显示为腐蚀沟壑，内表面腐蚀形貌表现为晶格网状，腐蚀产物主要为Cr、Ni、Fe的氧化物；经过氢氧化钠溶液中1 000 h的试验，国产690合金管未出现应力腐蚀裂纹，但发生了一定程度的晶间腐蚀。试验结果表明了国产690合金管在氢氧化钠溶液中具有较好的抗应力腐蚀性能。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: The study of domestic alloy 690 tube stress corrosion behavior in aqueous alkali
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The microstructure of alloy 690 tube have been analysed by the method of metalloscope and SEM, and the stress corrosion behavior of alloy 690 tube performed in NaOH solution by using constant loading method The results showed that the microstructure of the equiaxed austenitic grain appeared in alloy 690 tube and the continuous compacted carbide were precipitated on the grain boundary The surface corrosion morphology indicated that the corrosion ravines were deposited on the exterior surface and crystal lattice mesh existed in the interior surface The corrosion products were mainly composed of the oxide of Cr、Ni 、Fe and during 1 000 h testing in NaOH solution, the stress corrosion cracking did not appear in alloy 690 tube except for general intergranular corrosion The result expressed that alloy 690 tube possessed an excellent resistance to stress corrosion in NaOH solution.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.citation:
马明娟，李成涛，张立红. 国产690合金管在碱溶液中的应力腐蚀行为研究[J]. , 2016, 23(2): 30-34.
MA Ming- juan, LI Cheng- tao, ZHANG Li- hong. The study of domestic alloy 690 tube stress corrosion behavior in aqueous alkali. , 2016, 23(2): 30-34.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 电荷补偿剂对红色发光材料CaAl12O19∶Mn4+发光性能的影响
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 李迪,王雷,许育东,屈冰雁,石敏
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 合肥工业大学材料科学与工程学院，安徽 合肥 230009
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 采用高温固相法在1 500 ℃保温4 h的条件下合成了CaAl12O19∶Mn4+红色发光材料。通过发光性能测试表征了Mn4+浓度、Na+、Li+ 、K+以及Mg2+ 等掺杂离子对材料发光性能的影响。研究发现，在紫外和蓝色波段均可有效激发CaAl12O19∶Mn4+，其发射主峰位于652 nm的深红色光波段，其两侧的肩峰（640、666 nm）可归属为声子副带发射。研究结果表明，Mn4+的最佳掺杂浓度为005 mol%；共掺的Na+、Li+、Mg2+、K+均可有效提高CaAl12O19∶Mn4+的发光强度，其中Na+和 Li+的最佳掺杂浓度均为5 mol%时的发光强度可被提高2倍以上。因此，CaAl12O19∶Mn4+是一种潜在的可用于提高LED显色性的红色发光材料。
keywords_cn: 关键词：电荷补偿、光致发光、铝酸盐、高温固相法
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Effects of charge compensators on the luminescent properties of red emission phosphor CaAl12O19∶Mn4+
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：A promising candidate red fluorescence CaAl12O19∶Mn4+was developed, which was prepared by the solid- state reaction method at 1 500 ℃ for 4 h The influence of Mn4+ concentration and the co- doped ions, R(R=Na+, Li+, K+, and Mg2+) ions on the luminescent properties of CaAl12O19∶Mn4+ were investigated, respectively The results indicated that the phosphor was able to be excited by both UV and blue band light The emission band of CaAl12O19∶Mn4+ was in the deep- red region with the maximum at 652 nm, the shoulders on both sides of the peak (640,666 nm) were attributed to the phonon sideband transition It was observed that optimal concentration of Mn4+ in CaAl12O19 was 005 mol% The co- doped Na+, Li+, Mg2+and K+ could dramatically improve the luminous performance of CaAl12O19∶Mn4+ When the concentration of Na+ and Mg2+ was 5 mol %, the maximum emission intensity of CaAl12O19∶Mn4+ could be increased by more than 2 times So CaAl12O19∶Mn4+, Na+ was expected to be a potential candidate as a red phosphor in warm white LEDs
keywords_en: Keywords: Charge compensation, Photoluminescence, aluminate, solid-state reaction method

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: GdErCoAl非晶合金的玻璃形成能力及磁热效应
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 阮庭方，罗强，吴仡璇，沈军
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 同济大学材料科学与工程学院，上海 201804
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 利用真空甩带机制备了成分为Gd56-xErxCo24Al20(x=0,16,24,32,40,48)的一系列非晶条带，并用高真空电弧熔炼炉铜模吸铸法制备了直径为3 mm的大块非晶合金棒；然后对合金的结构、热稳定性和磁热效应进行了系统研究。研究结果表明，该系列合金有很好的玻璃形成能力、较高的热稳定性以及高的磁熵变(最大可达1258 J·kg-1 ·K-1)和宽的磁熵变曲线峰。当x从0增加到48时，该系列合金在磁场变化为5 T条件下制冷能力(RCP)分别是729 J·kg-1、736 J·kg-1、757 J·kg-1、621 J·kg-1、576 J·kg-1和435 J·kg-1。随Er含量的增加，合金磁转变类型从铁磁转变逐步到自旋玻璃转变，磁转变温度从112 K降低到165 K。Gd56-xErxCo24Al20系列的非晶合金优异的磁制冷能力，连续可调的磁转变温区，良好的热稳定性和软磁性能表明这系列合金在10~150 K的范围内做为磁制冷材料拥有良好的应用前景。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Glass forming ability and magnetocaloric effect of Gd- Er- Co- Al alloys
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Metallic glass ribbons with norminal composition of Gd56-xErxCo24Al20 (x=0,16,24,32,40,48) were fabricated by melt spinning technique, and rod samples of 3 mm in diameter were fabricated by copper- mold suck casting method The microstructure, thermal properties and magnetocaloric effect of these amorphous alloys were investigatedThe results show that these alloys have good glass formation ability, good thermal stability, and large magnetic entropy change (having a maximum value of 1258 J·kg-1·K-1 under a field change of 5 T) The magnetic entropy change curve has a broadened peak due to the amorphous structure The refrigeration capacity (RCP) under a field change of 5 T can be determined to be 729 J·kg-1,736 J·kg-1,757 J·kg-1, 621 J·kg-1,576 J·kg-1and 435 J·kg-1 for the 6 samples from x=0 to x=48, respectively With the increase of Er content, the Curie temperature decreases from 112 K to 165 K Due to the very good magnetocaloric effect, high thermal stability, free of hysteresis and well tunability of the working temperature, this series of alloys can be good candidates as magnetic refrigerants working in the temperature range of 10~150 K
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.citation:
阮庭方，罗强，吴仡璇，沈军. GdErCoAl非晶合金的玻璃形成能力及磁热效应[J]. , 2016, 23(2): 10-15.
Phuong Nguyen Dinh, LUO Qiang, WU Yi- xuan, SHEN Jun. Glass forming ability and magnetocaloric effect of Gd- Er- Co- Al alloys. , 2016, 23(2): 10-15.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 欧新哲1,姚雷1，马明娟2
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn:
1.宝山钢铁股份有限公司,上海 200941
2.宝钢特钢有限公司,上海 200940
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 研究了950~1 200 ℃固溶处理对800H合金冷轧管组织和力学性能的影响。结果表明，固溶温度从950 ℃提高至1 200 ℃，碳化物逐渐溶解至基体中；固溶温度对800H合金室温力学性能和晶粒度的影响显著，而保温时间对800H合金室温力学性能和晶粒度的影响不显著；晶粒尺寸和析出相数量是影响800H合金强度的主要因素。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Influence of solution temperature on the microstructure and mechanical properties of 800H alloy
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The effect of solution treatment at 950- 1 200 ℃ on microstructure and mechanical properties of cold rolling tube of 800H alloy were investigated. The results indicate that with increasing temperature of solution treatment from 950 ℃ to 1 200 ℃, the carbides in 800H alloy dissolved completely. The solution temperature is critical factor for mechanical properties and grain size of 800H alloy, but the solution time is not significant; The grain size and the number of precipitated are critical factors for mechanical properties of 800H alloy.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 研究了950~1 200 ℃固溶处理对UNS N06625合金冷轧管组织和力学性能的影响。结果表明，当固溶温度从950 ℃提高至1 200 ℃，屈服强度和抗拉强度分别从480 MPa和900 MPa降至380 MPa和810 MPa，伸长率由45%提高至57.5%；晶粒度级长大至4.0~7.0级；1 100 ℃以上固溶处理时，合金中的碳化物基本溶解；晶粒尺寸和析出相数量是影响UNS N06625合金强度的主要因素。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Influence of solution temperature on the microstructure and mechanical properties of UNS N06625 alloy
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The effect of solution treatment at 950~1 200 ℃ on microstructure and mechanical properties of cold rolling tube of UNS N06625 alloy were investigated. The results indicate that with increasing temperature of solution treatment from 950 ℃ to 1 200 ℃,the yield strength and tensile strength of alloy decrease respectively from 480 MPa and 900 MPa to 380 MPa and 810 MPa,while the elongation of alloy increases from 45% to 57.5% and grain size increases 4.0~7.0 grade; as solution treatment temperature is more than 1 100 ℃, the carbides in alloy dissolve completely. The grain size and the number of precipitated are critical factors for mechanical properties of UNS N06625 alloy.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Research progress and development tendency of mechanical properties of sintered Nd- Fe- B magnets
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Sintered Nd- Fe- B magnets are widely used in many fields due to its excellent property- price ratio. However, sintered Nd- Fe- B magnets are rather brittle, and they are prone to be lack of the corner or edge, even to be broken. The mechanical property is a very important index of the comprehensive performance of the magnets. The mechanical properties and the machinability of index performance sintered Nd- Fe- B magnets directly influence their service reliability and the production cost. The magnetic functional devices are developing to the miniaturization, lightweight, high functionality and high accuracy directions, such as the motors applied in intelligent mobile phones, and so on. The dimension needed is very thin and small for dimensionsome machined magnet products, in which the good machinability is required, and the degradation of the magnetic properties often happened in the thin and small products. The failure of brittle materials is usually caused by a dynamic load. In some applications such as military, aviation, and space fields, the high anti- overload performance and impact stability are demanded. For electric vehicle drive motors in which high rpm and small air gaps are necessary, sintered Nd- Fe- B magnets need to be used as a structural element. The mechanical properties and fracture mechanism of sintered Nd- Fe- B magnets have been summarized; the influences of doped elements on mechanical properties of the magnets, have been discussed; the research results on strengthening, toughening, and impact resistance of sintered Nd- Fe- B magnets were introduced; the characterization method of machinability for the Nd- Fe- B magnets were proposed. The research and development trends of the mechanical properties of sintered Nd- Fe- B magnets were pointed out in the future.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 采用电化学极化曲线和变温失重法研究了Ti35Zr30Be20Cu7.5Co7.5块体非晶合金分别在0.5、1、2 mol/L NaOH溶液中的腐蚀行为，并比较了304不锈钢的耐蚀性。极化曲线测试结果表明，Ti35Zr30Be20Cu7.5Co7.5块体非晶合金在0.5、1、2 mol/L NaOH溶液中均表现出良好的耐蚀性，阳极极化曲线表现出明显的钝化特征。随着NaOH溶液浓度的增大，极化曲线左移，耐蚀性降低。非晶合金的自腐蚀电位高于不锈钢。在293、313、333 K，2 mol/L NaOH溶液的不同温度失重腐蚀中，随温度增加，其非晶合金均较不锈钢耐蚀性高。探讨了NaOH溶液浓度变化、温度变化对Ti35Zr30Be20Cu7.5Co7.5块体非晶合金的耐蚀性机理。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Corrosion behavior of Ti-Zr based bulk amorphous alloys in NaOH solution
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Corrosion behaviors of the Ti35Zr30Be20Cu7.5Co7.5 bulk amorphous alloy in 0.5, 1 , 2 mol/L NaOH solution were studied by potentiodynamic polarization method and variable-temperature weight loss measurement. Moreover, the corrosion behaviors of the Ti35Zr30Be20Cu7.5Co7.5 bulk amorphous alloy and the 304 stainless steel were compared in 0.5, 1, 2 mol/L NaOH solution, respectively. The results of potentiodynamic polarization experiment show that the Ti35Zr30Be20Cu7.5Co7.5 bulk amorphous alloy has excellent corrosion resistance in 0.5, 1 , 2 mol/L NaOH solution and its anodic reaction has a passive character. While increasing the NaOH concentration from 0.5 to 2 mol/L, polarization curve shifts to the left and the corrosion resistance is reduced. The self corrosion potential of the Ti35Zr30Be20Cu7.5Co7.5 bulk amorphous alloy is higher than that of the 304 stainless steel. The corrosion resistance of the amorphous alloy is better compared to the 304 stainless steel with temperature increasing for 293, 313, 333 K in 2 mol/L NaOH solution by weight loss corrosion. Corrosion resistance mechanism of the Ti35Zr30Be20Cu7.5Co7.5 bulk amorphous alloy is discussed, according to the temperature and concentration of NaOH solution properties.

2.兰州理工大学省部共建有色金属先进加工与再利用国家重点实验室，甘肃 兰州 730050
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 在Deform的基础上模拟纯镍热挤压时的变化情况。结果表明：在模拟条件下，挤压力随坯料温度的升高逐渐降低；挤压速度较小时，挤压速度的升高影响坯料温度扩散，软化作用大于加工硬化作用，导致挤压力减小；随着模锥角的增大先减小后增大，模锥角为45°时，挤压力最小；随挤压筒预热温度的提高，挤压力下降速度逐渐变缓，然后趋于稳定。其中模锥角对挤压力影响最大，挤压筒预热温度对挤压力影响最小。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Numerical simulation of extrusion force during hot extrusion of pure nickel
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The changes of extrusion force of pure nickel were studied on the basis of Deform. The results show that the extrusion force gradually decreases with the increase of the temperature of the billet; the extrusion speed is lower, the billet temperature is changed by the increase of the extrusion speed, the softening effect of the temperature is greater than work hardening which lead the extrusion force to decrease; with the increase of die cone angle, the extrusion force decreases and then increases, extrusion pressure minimum when die cone angle is 45 degrees; with the increase of the pre heating temperature of the extrusion container, the dropping degree of extrusion force becomes slow, and then tends to be stable. The die cone angle has the biggest influence on the extrusion force, and the influence of the preheating temperature of the extrusion container on the extrusion force is the least.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 李登禄1,2，刘德学1,2，庞鑫1,2，尹逊岩1,2
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn:
1.兰州理工大学材料科学与工程学院，甘肃 兰州 730050
2.兰州理工大学省部共建有色金属先进加工与再利用国家重点实验室，甘肃 兰州 730050
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 采用Gleeble1500D热模拟试验机，在变形温度为350～500 ℃，应变速率为0.001～1 s-1，最终应变量为60%的条件下，对可降解生物医用镁合金WE43的流变行为进行研究，并建立该合金的热加工图。结果表明：该合金的流变应力随着变形温度的升高和应变速率的减小而降低；同时，利用双曲正弦模型获得该镁合金的热激活能及其应力指数，并建立该合金的流变应力本构关系。在热加工图中，功率耗散因子η随着应变速率的减小和变形温度的增加而先增后减。并得到该合金的最佳加工区间为温度400～450 ℃，应变速率为0.003～0.02 s-1。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Hot deformation behavior and processing map of WE43 biodegradation magnesium alloy
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The flow behavior of WE43 biodegradation magnesium alloys was investigated using Gleeble-1500D thermal simulation test machine at deformation temperation of 350～500 ℃, strain rates of 0.001～1 s-1 and the final strain of 60%. Furthermore, the hot processing maps were set up. The experimental results indicated that the flow sress of the alloy decrease with increasing of deformation temperature and decreaseing of strain rate. Meanwhile, the deformation activation energy and stress exponent were attained according to the hyperbolic-sine model and the flow stress constitutive relationship was established. In processing maps, the power dissipation factor first increases and then decline with the increase of temperature and the decrease of strain rate. Optimal processing parameters were the deformation temperature of 400～450 ℃ and the strain rate range of 0.003～0.02 s-1.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: MnFe(P,Si)一级相变热磁发电材料的制备与磁性研究
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 韩睿，特古斯，欧志强，王莹，国庆
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 内蒙古师范大学,内蒙古功能材料物理与化学重点实验室，内蒙古 呼和浩特市 010022
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 通过机械合金化和固相烧结方法，制备一系列MnFe(P,Si)一级相变化合物，并测定其结构、磁热性能及部分热力学性能。研究结果表明：MnFe(P,Si)系列化合物呈Fe2P型六角结构，空间群为P-62m，其中部分化合物存在少量Fe3Si或Fe5Si3第二相。MnFe0.9P0.5Si0.5呈单相Fe2P型六角结构，由铁磁态到顺磁态（升温）和顺磁态到铁磁态（降温）的?浞直鸪鱿衷赥tw=330 K，Ttc= 318 K，其热滞ΔThys=12 K。升降温相变较快，均在10 K以内完成，说明相变是一级相变。在0~1.5 T的外磁场中最大等温磁熵变-ΔSmax=18.6 J/(kg·K) ；其比热容最高为（升温）Cp= 1 571 J/(kg·K)，（降温）Cp=1 447 J/(kg·K) 。由此推断，MnFe0.9P0.5Si0.5化合物符合热磁发电工作需求，是一种具有良好磁热性能的热磁发电候选材料。
keywords_cn: 一级相变化合物，巨磁热效应，居里温度，热磁发电
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Investigation on the synthesize and magnetic properties of first-order phase transition thermomagnetic power generation compound MnFe(P,Si)
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The first-order phase transition compounds MnFe(P,Si) have been prepared by mechanical alloying and solid-state reaction method, and investigated the structure，magnetocaloric properties and thermodynamic properties. The results show that the obtained MnFe(P,Si) compounds are composed of a main phase of Fe2P-type hexagonal structure with space group P-62m, and a secondary phases of Fe3Si or Fe5Si3, which appeared in some of them. MnFe0.9P0.5Si0.5 crystallizes in single phase with Fe2P-type hexagonal structure, the transitions from ferromagnetic state to paramagnetic state (heating process) and paramagnetic state to ferromagnetic state (cooling process) are appeared at Ttw= 330 K and Ttc= 318 K, respectively. Its thermal hysteresis is ΔThys= 12 K and the transition in heating and cooling process are completed in 10 K, which means these transitions are of first-order phase transition. The maximum value of magnetic entropy change is-ΔSmax= 18.6 J/(kg·K) in a magnetic field change of 0-1.5 T. The maximum heat capacity is Cp=1571 J/(kg·K) (heating process) and Cp=1447 J/(kg·K) (cooling process). Therefore, it can be inferred that MnFe0.9P0.5Si0.5 compound is an excellent candidate material for thermomagnetic power generation.
keywords_en: first-order phase transition compound, giant magnetocaloric effect, Curie temperature, thermomagnetic power generation

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 低碳PrNd合金制备烧结钕铁硼磁体
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 邹宁，郑巨根，邹旭杰，邹永博，邹宇钦
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 宁波复能新材料股份有限公司，浙江 宁波，315336
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 采用不同碳含量的PrNd合金原料，制备了名义成分为(PrNd)30.7Cu0.2FebalB0.98的钕铁烧结硼磁体，研究了碳含量对磁体磁性能和微观组织的影响。结果表明，PrNd合金中的碳含量对烧结磁体中的碳含量影响显著。碳含量增加会导致磁体内富稀土相的相对减少以及一些含碳相的增加，从而引起矫顽力的降低。当磁体中碳含量最低至335×10-6时，其方形度和综合磁能最好，矫顽力达到909 kA/m。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Fabrication of sintered Nd-Fe-B magnets with low carbon content PrNd alloys
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：PrNd alloys with different carbon content were applied to preparation of the nominal compositions of (PrNd)30.7Cu0.2FebalB0.98 (mass fraction%) magnets. Effects of carbon content on the magnetic properties and the microstructure of the magnets were investigated. The carbon content of the magnets was influenced by the carbon content of the PrNd alloys. The increase of carbon reduces the rare earth-rich phase in the magnets, and presents carbide-phase in the magnets, which lead to the decreasing of coercivity. The magnet has the best magnetic properties for Hcj=909 kA/m with the lowest carbon content for 335×10-6.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 张淑兰，付小同
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 钢铁研究总院，北京 100081
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 利用粗糙度仪分别对不同表面质量非晶带材的表面粗糙度进行了测量。结果表明，非晶带材自由面与贴辊面的粗糙度有较大差别，这与非晶带材的制造工艺有关，数据统计分析结果表明，非晶带材的自由面与贴辊面粗糙度之和较仅考虑单表面的粗糙度更能准确表征非晶带材的表面粗糙度，与非晶带材磁性能有更强的相关性。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Investigation on the surface roughness of the amorphous ribbons
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The roughness of the amorphous ribbons with different surface morphology was measured by using of the roughness equipment. The experiment results prove that the roughness between the back surface and free surface of the ribbons was large, which mainly related with processing of the ribbons. Through analyzing the experiment data, it can be concluded that the total roughness of the ribbon back face and free face can better characterize the ribbon surface roughness as compared to the single roughness of the ribbon back face or free face, which has strong relationship with the magnetic properties of the ribbons.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 孙静，彭程，石志霞，白雪, 刘宇阳, 李文良
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 北京有色金属研究总院稀有金属与冶金材料研究所，北京 100088
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 采用V2O5和C粉为原料制备了V2O3粉体。通过热力学计算证实了反应的可行性，研究了不同的V2O5∶C配比及合成温度对产物组成的影响。结果表明：当V2O5∶C配比为3∶4，1 000 ℃保温2 h后，得到的产物中有少量VO2和C相存在；将产物进一步球磨混合，1 000 ℃保温1 h后可以获得较纯的V2O3相。粉体颗粒?还嬖蜃矗６仍?~30 μm。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Preparation of V2O3 by carbon thermal reduction
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：V2O3 was prepared by V2O5 and C powders. The feasibility of reaction was substantiated through thermodynamics calculation. The ratio of V2O5∶C and reaction temperature were researched，which have influences to products phase. The results show that the ratio of V2O5∶C was 3∶4 and reaction at 1 000 ℃ for 2 h，the products have small VO2 and C phases. The pure V2O3 has been prepared by milling the products above and reaction at 1 000 ℃ for 1 h. The powder was irregular and the size is 1~30 μm.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 微孔结构对低钴粗晶WC硬质合金摩擦性能的影响
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 黄丽容1,2，陈宇航1，王晓雷2
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn:
1.江西理工大学机电工程学院，江西 赣州 341000
2. 南京航空航天大学江苏省精密与微细制造技术重点实验室，江苏 南京 210016
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 在球-盘摩擦试验机上，以材料为GCr15、304不锈钢、SiC和Si3N4球为上试样，下试样为致密的和微孔结构的低钴粗晶硬质合金盘。结果发现：微孔结构对GCr15球/硬质合金盘组成的摩擦副的影响较大，微孔结构显著降低摩擦系数，摩擦系数变化缓慢，最后稳定在0.4附近，而致密硬质合金的摩擦系数波动较大，在0.5~0.6之间波动；对SiC球/硬质合金盘组成的摩擦副略有影响，微孔结构摩擦系数稍有降低，效果不明显；对Si3N4球/硬质合金盘组成的摩擦副的摩擦系数几乎没有影响；对304不锈钢球/硬质合金盘组成的摩擦副的摩擦系数反而增大。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: The effect of micro-porous structure on the friction property of low-cobalt coarse-grained WC cemented carbides
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The preparation process of cemented carbides is the liquid phase sintering process, in which the essence is the process of densification, so density is an important indicator of detection. In recent years, the surfaces of cemented carbides have been textured. It is found that a certain non-smooth surface has better wear resistance and wetting property than the smooth one. The friction property was evaluated by using a ball-on-disk tribometer. The upper sample is a ball which is made of GCr15, 304 stainless steel, SiC, or Si3N4. The lower sample is a disc made of dense or porous WC cemented carbides. The experimental results show that the micro-porous structure has a great effect on the friction coefficient of GCr15 ball / WC cemented carbide disc. The micro-porous structure can obviously reduce the friction coefficient. The friction coefficient changes slowly but finally stabilizes in the vicinity of 0.4. However, the friction coefficient of the dense cemented carbide is larger and is fluctuated between the value of 0.5~0.6. There is a little effect on the friction coefficient of SiC ball / WC cemented carbide disc. The friction coefficient of micro-porous structure is lower than the dense one, but the effect is not obvious. There was no role on the friction coefficient of Si3N4 ball / WC cemented carbide disc. On the contrary, the friction coefficient of 304 stainless steel ball / WC cemented carbide disc increases.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 空冷态FeMnAlNi形状记忆合金逆向记忆效应的研究
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 黄攀，彭华备，文玉华
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 四川大学制造科学与工程学院，四川 成都 610065
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 采用金相法、XRD和热膨胀法研究了经1 150 ℃固溶10 min后的空冷态Fe43.6Mn34.7Al13.4Ni8.3合金的逆向记忆效应。结果表明：空冷态Fe43.6Mn34.7Al13.4Ni8.3合金在400 ℃至700 ℃之间呈现显著的逆向记忆效应，其源于α→γ相变。在α→γ相变时，依附于γ′马氏体形成的板条状γ相以及与γ′马氏体成一定角度的针状γ相对逆向记忆效应的贡献显著大于蠕虫状γ相。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Study on reverse shape memory effect in an air cooled FeMnAlNi shape memory alloy
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The reverse shape memory effect in an air cooled Fe43.6Mn34.7Al13.4Ni8.3 alloy after solution treatment at 1 150 ℃ for 10 min was investigated by optical metallography, XRD and thermal dilatometer. Results showed that the air cooled Fe43.6Mn34.7Al13.4Ni8.3 alloy presented an obvious reverse shape memory effect when the heating temperatures were between 400 ℃ and 700 ℃. The reverse shape memory effect derives from the α→γ transformation. During this phase transformation, the lath γ phase precipitated along the γ′ martensite and the needle γ phase precipitated along a certain angle with the γ′ martensite were much more beneficial for the reverse shape memory effect than the vermiculate γ phase.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.citation:

HUANG Pan, PENG Hua-bei, WEN Yu-hua. Study on reverse shape memory effect in an air cooled FeMnAlNi shape memory alloy. , 2016, 23(3): 31-36.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 反常霍尔效应及其应用研究进展
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 于广华，彭文林，张静言
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 北京科技大学材料科学与工程学院，北京 100083
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 反常霍尔效应是自旋电子学中一种非常重要的物理现象。最近十年，随着人们对反常霍尔效应的研究的不断深入，基于反常霍尔效应的应用已经延伸到了磁场传感器和磁随机存储器等许多领域，但是有关反常霍尔效应的物理起源自Hall效应发现一百多年以来依然存在着许多未解之谜。主要介绍了反常霍尔效应及相关的基本概念，概述了产生反常霍尔效应的三种机制及最新的理论研究成果，并且总结了目前反常霍尔效应的应用及所面临的各种挑战。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Research progress on anomalous Hall effect and its application
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Anomalous Hall effect is a very important physical phenomenon in the field of spintronics. With the continuous deepening of the study of anomalous Hall effect, in the last ten years, the application of anomalous Hall effect has been extended to many fields, such as magnetic field sensor and magnetic random access memory. However there are still many mysteries in the physical origin of the anomalous Hall effect since the discovery of Hall effect in 100 years. The basic concept of anomalous Hall effect, and then generalized the three mechanisms of the anomalous Hall effect and the latest theoretical research results, and finally summarized the challenges faced by the anomalous Hall effect in the field of application were mainly introduced.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.citation:
于广华，彭文林，张静言. 反常霍尔效应及其应用研究进展[J]. , 2016, 23(3): 1-10.
YU Guang-hua, PENG Wen-lin, ZHANG Jing-yan. Research progress on anomalous Hall effect and its application. , 2016, 23(3): 1-10.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 朱来斌
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 中国钢研科技集团有限公司，北京 100081
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 通过光学显微镜、电子显微镜等研究了不同固溶热处理温度对一种马氏体超高强度不锈钢的微观组织和力学性能的影响。结果表明，固溶处理温度范围内，碳化物M6C的溶解行为对材料最终力学性能具有重要影响。固溶处理温度为1 000~1 050 ℃时具有一定体积分数的未溶碳化物，形成合理的奥氏体晶粒尺寸和马氏体内元素过饱和度，有利于材料在时效后获得最佳的综合力学性能。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Effect of solution treating temperature on the microstructure and mechanical properties of a ultra-high strength stainless steel
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The effect of various solution treating temperatures on the microstructure and mechanical properties of a martensitc ultra-high strength stainless steel was studied by methods of optical microscope, electron microscope and so on. The results indicated that in the range of solution temperatures, the dissolution behavior of M6C carbide is critical to the final mechanical properties. Steel solution treated between 1 000-1 050 ℃ was preferred for its best combination of mechanical properties due to rational austenite grain size and degree of supersaturation of martensite resulting from certain fraction of undissolved carbide.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 李云龙1，付花睿1，张霄1，周广迪1，游才印1，沈乾龙2
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn:
1.西安理工大学材料科学与工程学院，陕西 西安 710048
2.武警后勤学院，天津 300309
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 采用直流反应磁控溅射法在不同氧分压气氛下制备了氧化钒薄膜，并进行后续真空退火处理。分别利用X-射线衍射仪，扫描电子显微镜和综合物性仪分析薄膜的相成分、表面形貌以及电性能。结果表明：随着氧分压的增加，450 ℃退火1 h的薄膜逐渐由非晶态?湮猇O2(M)，VO2(M，B)和V6O13的混合结构，并且晶化程度逐渐提高。氧分压6.67%的薄膜相转变温度(TMST)接近52 ℃，SEM分析表明，微裂纹的存在为相转变时应力释放提供空间，降低了TMST。氧分压10%的薄膜具有-2.38 %/K的电阻温度系数(TCR)值和1.67×104 Ω的室温电阻值，满足制备非致冷红外探测器的要求。
keywords_cn: 氧化钒薄膜, 相转变温度, 电阻温度系数(TCR), 磁控溅射
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Vanadium oxide thin films with low phase transition temperature prepared by magnetron sputtering
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Vanadium oxide thin films were prepared by DC reactive magnetron sputtering with the different oxygen partial pressure accompanied by the vacuum post annealing. The phase composition, surface morphology and electrical properties of the thin films were characterized and measured using X-ray diffraction (XRD), Scanning Electron Microscope (SEM) and Quantum Design Versa-lab comprehensive physical analyzer, respectively. The results show that, for the films annealed at 450 ℃ for 1 hours, the amorphous structure gradually transferred to VO2(M), VO2(M, B) and V6O13 mixed structure, the degree of crystallization was improved with increasing the oxygen partial pressure. The phase transition temperature (TMST) is close to 52 ℃ for the film at a partial pressure of oxygen 6.67%. Combining with SEM analysis, it shows that the existence of microcracks can provide enough space for stress release during the phase transition, which leads to the decrease of TMST. In addition, it was found that the TCR is about -2.38%/K and the room temperature resistance is about 1.67×104 Ω for the thin film prepared under a oxygen partial pressure of 10% , which can meet the demands of the fabrication for uncooled infrared detector.
keywords_en: vanadium oxide thin film, phase transition temperature, temperature coefficient of resistance (TCR), magnetron sputtering

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 借助热处理炉，试验研究了无取向硅钢板固化工艺和消除应力退火工艺对铬酸盐涂层中铬的转化情况。研究结果表明：硅钢涂层中六价铬的转化率随固化时间的延长，先显著增大然后缓慢增加。随着消除应力退火温度的升高，六价铬含量降低明显；随消除应力退火时间的增加，涂层中六价铬含量减少。

Content of hexavalent chrome decreases obviously when stress relief annealing temperature and time increase.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: Cr掺杂对MnFe0.9P0.5Si0.5化合物结构及磁性的影响
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 欧志强，王莹，哈斯朝鲁，李英杰，松林，特古斯
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 内蒙古师范大学，内蒙古自治区功能材料物理与化学重点实验室，内蒙古 呼和浩特 010022
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 采用高能球磨法制备了Mn1.0Fe0.9-xCrxP0.5Si0.5 (x = 0，0.02，0.04，0.06，0.08，0.10(原子分数))和Mn1.0-xCrxFe0.9P0.5Si0.5 (x =0，0.02，0.04，0.06，0.08(原子分数))两个系列化合物。利用X射线衍射和磁性测量技术研究了材料的晶体结构，磁性和磁热效应,研究结果表明：两个系列化合物均结晶为Fe2P型六角结构，空间群为P6-2m。通过调整Cr元素的掺杂量，可将该磁热材料的居里温度调节在155~375 K范围。随Cr含量增加，化合物的最大磁熵变逐渐变小，但等温磁熵变随温度变化曲线的半峰宽变宽，相对制冷能力变大。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Cr doping effects on the structural and magnetic properties of MnFe0.9P0.5Si0.5 compound
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Mn1.0Fe0.9-xCrxP0.5Si0.5 (x = 0，0.02，0.04，0.06，0.08，0.10(atom fraction)) and Mn1.0-xCrxFe0.9P0.5Si0.5(x=0，0.02，0.04，0.06，0.08(atom fraction)) were synthesized using mechanical alloying and high temperature sintering method. The crystal structure, magnetic and magnetocaloric properties were studied by using X-ray diffractometer and magnetic magnetometer. Both of the two series compounds crystallize in Fe2P-type hexagonal structure with space group of P6-2m. The Curie temperature can be tuned within a range of 155-375 K by varying the Cr concentration. The maximum magnetic entropy change decreases with increasing Cr content. The full width at half maximum (FWHM) of the magnetic entropy change curves and the relative cooling power (RCP)increase with increasing Cr content.

OU Zhi-qiang, WANG Ying, O Hascholu, LI Ying-jie, SONG Lin, OJIYED Tegus. Cr doping effects on the structural and magnetic properties of MnFe0.9P0.5Si0.5 compound. , 2017, 24(3): 12-17.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: Ni49Ti51-xZrx合金冷轧板相变温度及记忆性能研究
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 冯昭伟1，尚再艳2，李君涛2，崔跃2，袁志山1，王江波2，缪卫东2，马嘉丽2
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn:
1.有研亿金新材料有限公司，北京 102200
2.有研医疗器械北京有限公司，北京 102200
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 系统地研究了Ni49Ti51-xZrx合金冷轧板的相变温度及记忆性能。随着Zr含量的增加，Ni49Ti51-xZrx合金铸锭相变温度Af升高，在15%Zr(原子分数)时达到228 ℃，Mf先降低后升高。Ni49Ti51-xZrx合金板材的硬度随冷轧变形量增加而增加，随退火温度升高而降低。对于Ni49Ti51-xZrx合金25%冷轧变形量板材，随退火温度升高，锆的原子分数低于5%时合金板材的Af先降低再升高，Ni49Ti41Zr10、Ni49Ti36Zr15合金板材Af持续升高。随退火温度升高，冷轧板材记忆恢复应变先升高后降低，在500 ℃时具有最高值，双程可恢复应变升高；随Zr含量增加，可恢复应变降低，双程记忆恢复应变减小。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: The research on transformation temperature and shape memory property of Ni49Ti51-xZrx cold-rolled plate
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Transformation temperature and shape memory property of Ni49Ti51-xZrx cold-rolled plate under different annealing temperature were systematically analyzed. The phase transformation temperature Af of Ni49Ti51-xZrx alloys ingot increases with increasing Zr content, reaching 228 ℃ at 15% Zr content（atom fraction）. The Mf transformation temperature first increases and then decreases with the increasing of Zr content. The hardness of Ni49Ti51-xZrx alloys plate shifts to higher value with lager cold-rolled deformation and decreases gradually with increasing annealing temperature. For 25% cold-rolled reduction plate of Ni49Ti51-xZrx alloys, with the increasing of annealing temperature, Af first increases and then decreases for the alloys of Zr content lower than 5%（atom fraction）, while that continuously increases for the Ni49Ti41Zr10 and Ni49Ti36Zr15 alloys, and the recovery strain of Ni49Ti51-xZrx alloys first increases and then decreases reaching the highest value at 500 ℃. The recovery strain increases and two-way memory recovery strain decreases with the increasing of Zr content.
