冯昭伟，尚再艳，李君涛，崔跃，袁志山，王江波，缪卫东，马嘉丽. Ni49Ti51-xZrx合金冷轧板相变温度及记忆性能研究[J]. , 2017, 24(3): 33-38.
FENG Zhao-wei ,SHANG Zai-yan , LI Jun-tao ，CUI Yue, YUAN Zhi-shan , WANG Jiang-bo , MIAO Wei-dong ，MA Jia-li . The research on transformation temperature and shape memory property of Ni49Ti51-xZrx cold-rolled plate. , 2017, 24(3): 33-38.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 硅钼蓝分光光度法测定稀土系贮氢合金中硅的含量
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 高立红1,2，朱悦然1,2，张立锋1,2，周凯红1,2
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn:
1.瑞科稀土冶金及功能材料国家工程研究中心有限公司，内蒙古 包头 014030
2.包头稀土研究院，内蒙古 包头 014030
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 试样用王水溶解，蒸发至体积约2 mL，盐酸提取，在pH=1时，正硅酸与钼酸铵形成硅钼杂多酸，草硫混酸消除磷、砷等干扰元素，抗坏血酸还原硅钼杂多酸为硅钼蓝，建立了分光光度法测定稀土系贮氢合金中硅的方法。方法用于稀土系贮氢合金中硅的测定，硅的检测范围为0.005 0%～0.50%，检出限为0.000 50%,检测下限为0.005 0%（质量分数）。方法中用低、中、高三个样品涵盖硅的检测范围，结果的相对标准偏差（RSD，n=11）分别为2.04%（低），3.81%（中）、2.08%（高）。加标回收率为97.26%～102.02%。按实验方法对稀土系贮氢合金实际系列样品（K8A、TL8A、TB7A、H3A、F2A）进行分析，结果与使用电感耦合等离子体原子发射光谱法的测定结果一致。
keywords_cn: 关键词：稀土系贮氢合金
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Determination of silicon in rare earth system hydrogen storage alloys　by silicon-molybdenum blue spectrophotometer
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The samples were dissolved by aqua regia and evaporated to about 2 mL of the volume. Hydrochloric acid was extracted. The silicon molybdenum heteropoly acid was formed with silicon and ammonium molybdate at pH=1.Phosphorus and arsenic were masked with oxalic acid. The determination method of silicon in rare earth system hydrogen alloys by silicon molybdenum blue spectrophotometery was established after being reduced to silicon molybdenum blue with ascorbic acid. The proposed method was applied to the determine silicon in rare earth system hydrogen alloys. The detection range of silicon is 0.0050%-0.50%.The detection limit and lower limit of silicon in the method was 0.000 50% and 0.005 0%(mass fraction),Method with low, medium and high grade three samples covering the detection range of silicon. The relative standard deviations(RSD,n=11) of found results was 2.04%（low），3.81%（medium），2.08%（high）.The recoveries were between 97.26%-102.02%.The content of silicon in rare earth system hydrogen alloys actual sample was determined according to the experimental method, and the found results were consistent with consistent with those obtained by inductively coupled plasma atomic emission spectrometry.
keywords_en: Key words: Rare earth syste hydrogen alloys

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 固溶温度对Fe-24Al-Sn合金微观组织和力学性能的影响
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 何东，石磊，王海波，李强
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 北方工业大学机械与材料工程学院，北京100144
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 研究了不同固溶温度对Fe-24Al-Sn合金的微观组织和力学性能的影响。结果表明，与Fe-24Al合金相比，随着固溶温度从825 ℃增加到875 ℃，Fe-24Al-Sn合金的硬度逐渐从379HV增大到394HV，抗压强度逐渐从500 MPa降低到225 MPa，合金变脆。铸态合金的相结构为B2的FeAl相和Fe3Al相，还出现了Fe9Sn和Sn相。随着固溶温度的增加，合金中逐步发生B2→DO3(Fe3Al)的相变。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Effect of solid solution temperature on microstructure and property of Fe-24Al-Sn alloys
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Effect of the different solid solution temperatures on the microstructure and property was investigated. The results indicate that the hardness of the alloy gradually increase from 379HV to 394HV and compressive strength decrease from 500 MPa to 225 MPa with the increase of the solid solution temperature. Comparing with the Fe-24Al alloys, the alloy becomes brittle. The phase structure of the casting alloys are comprised of B2 (FeAl) ordered phase, Fe3Al, Fe9Sn and a few of Sn. B2→DO3(Fe3Al) phase transformation gradually occurs as the solid solution temperature increase.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.citation:
何东，石磊，王海波，李强. 固溶温度对Fe-24Al-Sn合金微观组织和力学性能的影响[J]. , 2017, 24(3): 25-28.
HE Dong，SHI Lei，WANG Hai-bo，LI Qiang. Effect of solid solution temperature on microstructure and property of Fe-24Al-Sn alloys. , 2017, 24(3): 25-28.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 基体镀前表面状态对镀铬层综合性能的影响
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 顾晶晶，韩登峰，张晴晴，曹帅
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 亳州学院生物与化学工程系，安徽 亳州236800
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 电镀前对工件抛光处理，在碳钢表面电镀硬铬，考察镀前阳极刻蚀对不同粗糙度基体镀铬层耐蚀性能的影响，通过分析镀层的厚度、硬度、孔隙率和镀层耐盐雾试验能力来表征镀层综合性能。实验结果表明：碳钢基体粗糙度在小于0.20　μm且经阳极刻蚀的条件下，硬铬镀层的综合性能满足工艺要求，具有良好的耐蚀性，可达到NSS 200　h 10级水平。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Effect of the surface state on the corrosion resistance of hard chrome plating
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The workpiece is polished by the different mesh belt before plating, hard chromium was electrodeposited on the surface of carbon steel. The effect of anodic etching on the corrosion resistance of chromium coating with different substrate roughness was investigated. The comprehensive properties of the coating were characterized by analyzing the thickness, hardness, porosity and salt spray test ability of the coating. Experimental results show that when the surface roughness of carbon steel is less than 0.20 μm and under the condition of reverse etching，the technical requirements were satisfied by the comprehensive properties of hard chromium coating, and the hard chromium layer has good corrosion resistance, the ability of salt spray test was improved to 10 levels by the 200 h test of NSS.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 磁流变液沉降稳定性影响因素分析
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 赵明媚，张进秋，姚军，彭志召
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 装甲兵工程学院装备试用与培训大队，北京100072
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 分析了磁流变液稳定性的影响因素，采用正交实验法在不同粒径大小、Fe颗粒不同包覆层厚度和不同数量添加剂油酸条件下制备磁流变液，并对磁流变液的沉降速率进行记录。其中不同包覆厚度的羰基铁粉颗粒采用不同浓度的PVA溶液制备得到。结果表明，颗粒粒径对沉降稳定性影响最明显。颗粒粒径越大沉降速度越快。油酸可以一定程度上提高磁流变液流动性及稳定性。聚乙烯醇PVA包覆对提高沉降稳定性有一定效果，但是随着厚度的增加稳定性变差。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Analysis of magnetorheological fluid settling stability influence factors
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to analysis influence factors of magnetorheological fluid, an orthogonal test has been designed. The magnetorheological fluid samples, with soft magnetic particle of carbonyl iron, carrier of shock absorbing oil used in tracked vehicle, additive of stearic acid, kaolin were prepared by using different size partials, different thickness PVA cladding and different amount of oleinic acid. Record the setting velocity of MRF. Different concentration PVA solution has been prepared to get particle with different thickness of coating layer. Result reveals, partical size is the largest factors which influence the stability of settlement, the bigger particles, the faster settling velocity. Oleinic acid can improve MRF liquidity and stability. PVA cladding has some effect, but with the increase of thickness, stability decline.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 夏雪兰，王立涛，裴英豪，施立发，张振海
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 马鞍山钢铁股份有限公司，安徽 马鞍山 24300
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 研究了不同环境温度对高牌号无取向硅钢力学性能的影响。重点研究了温度在-40~200 ℃范围内变化时，屈服强度、抗拉强度和伸长率的变化规律，结果表明：温度从-40 ℃升高到200 ℃时，抗拉强度和屈服强度呈先下降后上升的趋势；而当温度低于-20 ℃或高于140 ℃时，伸长率才出现明显的下降。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Effect of different ambient temperatures on mechanical properties of high grade non- oriented silicon steel
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The effects of different ambient temperatures on the mechanical properties of high grade non- oriented silicon steel were investigated, especially the variation of the yield strength, the tensile strength and elongation, when the temperature changed from - 40 ℃ to 200 ℃.The results showed that the yield strength and the tensile strength decreased first, then became rising. While, the elongation was decreased obviously when the temperature is lower than -20 ℃ or higher than 140 ℃.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Effects of Ga addition on the anti- tarnishing property of 925 silver alloys
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Alloying is an important approach to prevent silver alloys from tarnishing. By means of metallographic analysis, color measurement and hardness test, the effect of the addition of gallium on the surface anti- tarnishing property of silver was studied. The results showed that the addition of 0. 5%(mass fraction) gallium to the 925 silver can effectively improve the anti- tarnishing property of silver alloy, The addition of Ga will soft the alloy due to the formation of coarse precipitate. So Ga addition should not exceed 0. 5%( mass fraction).

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 王晓军1，梁海之1，南宏强2，董生茂2
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn:
1. 兰州理工大学材料科学与工程学院, 甘肃 兰州 730050
2. 金川集团股份有限公司, 甘肃 金昌 737104
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 通过静态氧化法研究了Cr20Ni80电热合金在空气中电加热到1 200 ℃的恒温氧化行为。使用无纸记录仪记录了Cr20Ni80合金两端电流电压的变化，扫描电镜(SEM)、X射线衍射仪(XRD)分析研究了氧化60、120 h的氧化膜表面与截面形貌、表面氧化膜的相组成以及氧化层中元素分布情况。结果表明，Cr20Ni80合金在1 200 ℃下的氧化过程符合氧化过程的三阶段理论。氧化60 h正处于氧化的第二阶段，氧化产物区分为三层，最外层主要包括NiO与NiCr2O4，中间层为Cr2O3，最内层为SiO2内氧化层，其中最外层基本剥落。氧化120 h为氧化的第三个阶段初期，此时，氧化膜剥落严重，Cr20Ni80合金丝即将断裂。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Isothermal oxidation behavior of Cr20Ni80 alloy at 1 200 ℃
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The isothermal oxidation behavior of Cr20Ni80 electrothermal alloy in air at 1 200 ℃ was studied with static oxidation method. The paperless recorder were used to record the variation of the voltage and current between the two ends of wire, and SEM and XRD to analyze cross section morphology, phase composition on the surface and the distribution of elements in the oxide layer of Cr20Ni80 after heating 60 h, 120 h. The results show that oxidation process of Cr20Ni80 alloy at 1 200 ℃ may be divided into 3 stages. Oxidation products is made up of 3 layers in 60 h: the outermost layer including NiO and NiCr2O4 and almost peeling off, the middle one being Cr2O3, and the inner one being SiO2. Oxidation comes to the third stages after heating 120 h. At this time, the oxide film has peeled completely and Cr20Ni80 alloy wire is about to break.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.citation:
王晓军，梁海之，南宏强，董生茂. Cr20Ni80合金1 200 ℃恒温氧化行为[J]. , 2017, 24(4): 29-33.
WANG Xiao- jun, LIANG Hai- zhi, NAN Hong- qiang, DONG Sheng- mao. Isothermal oxidation behavior of Cr20Ni80 alloy at 1 200 ℃. , 2017, 24(4): 29-33.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 钛铝相图亚稳相的研究进展
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 朱涛,沈军
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 同济大学材料科学与工程学院,上海 200092
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 综述了TiAl相图中的亚稳相及其对于相图绘制的干扰，并结合了近十年的研究成果分析了亚稳相的形成原因及亚稳相的鉴别，第一性原理计算具有深刻的物理学内涵，利用最基本的量子力学参量对各相的结构稳定性、机械稳定性进行计算，得出了各个相的存在温度及存在范围。对于Al5Ti3相的? 浼靶纬啥冀辛死砺奂扑悖⒊晒馐土耸笛橄窒螅币蔡峁┝薃l5Ti3相作为亚稳相的证据。另外证明了h- Al2Ti相为稳定相的证据，这对于相图的绘制具有重大的借鉴意义。利用Al5Ti3相及h- Al2Ti相的成功经验，将第一性原理用于解释Al3Ti相的稳定性及形成过程。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Research progress of metastable phase in TiAl phase diagram
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The interference of metastable phase were summarized, combines the research results during last ten years and the formation of metastable phases were analysis. First principle calculation was based on physics, the mechanical stability and structure stability, which is calculated by the basic parameters of quantum mechanics. The conclusion is that there is a temperature range of each metastable phase. For Al5Ti3 phase, the calculations successfully explain the process of transformation and formation, meanwhile, prove that Al5Ti3 phase is a metastable phase. On the other hand, first principle calculations also prove h- Al2Ti is stable. As a reference, the successful application of first principle in the calculation of Al5Ti3 and h- Al2Ti.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.citation:
朱涛 沈军. 钛铝相图亚稳相的研究进展[J]. , 2017, 24(4): 58-62.
ZHU Tao, SHEN Jun. Research progress of metastable phase in TiAl phase diagram. , 2017, 24(4): 58-62.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: Alnico合金添加量对Nd- Fe- B薄带磁体的微结构和磁性能的影响
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 刘帅, 秦晓宁, 张策, 杨薇, 步绍静, 孙继兵
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 河北工业大学河北省新型功能材料重点实验室，天津 300130
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 在Nd2Fe14B合金中添加具有调幅分解能力的Alnico合金，采用熔体快淬法在40 m/s的快淬速度下制备出名义成分为Nd2Fe14B+x%Alnico (x=0, 3, 5)的薄带磁体，探究多元复合添加Alnico合金组成元素对薄带磁体的微结构和磁性能的影响。试验结果表明：在薄带磁体中形成了由硬磁性相Nd2Fe14B、软磁性相Fe7Co3、弱磁性或非磁性相Al3Ni和Al13Co4以及部分非晶相组成的合金体系，在x=3时获得了最佳的综合磁性能：Hc=665 kA/m，Br=0. 58 T，Br/Bs=0. 60。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: The effect of additive content of Alnico alloy on microstructure and magnetic properties of the Nd- Fe- B ribbons
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Alnico alloy with spinodal decomposition was added into the Nd2Fe14B alloy to prepare the ribbons with nominal compositions of Nd2Fe14B+x% Alnico (x=0, 3, 5) by melt- spinning at a speed of 40 m/s. The magnetic properties and microstructure of the ribbons were investigated. It showed that the obtained ribbons consisted of hard Nd2Fe14B, soft Fe7Co3 magnetic phases, weak magnetic or nonmagnetic Al3Ni and Al13Co4 phases, and some amorphous phase. And the ribbons with x=3 got the best magnetic properties: Hc=665 kA/m，Br=0. 58 T，Br/Bs=0. 60.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 高速电弧喷涂含磷涂层的组织结构分析
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 王婷婷,籍鹏飞,王国平
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 合肥工业大学材料科学与工程学院，安徽 合肥 230009
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 利用高速电弧喷涂机，选用含磷金属粉芯丝材制备了FePCrC涂层，对该涂层显微组织结构进行分析。结果表明，该涂层截面组织呈典型层状结构，孔隙率较低，为3. 92%，致密度较高；涂层中的相主要为Fe- Cr、Cr7C3、FePO4。同时，为分析该涂层化学成分微观不均匀性，引入微观不均一系数KCMH，计算得其KCMH为0. 021 7，涂层结构均匀。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Analysis on the microstructure of high velocity arc sprayed coating with P
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：FePCrC coating was prepared by high velocity arc spraying machine with phosphorus- containing metal cored wire. The microstructure of the coating was analyzed. The results show that the coating has a typical lamellar structure with a lower porosity of 3.92% and a higher density, and the main phases in the coating are Fe- Cr, Cr7C3 and FePO4. In addition, the microscopic heterogeneity coefficient KCMH was introduced to analyze the microscopic inhomogeneity of the chemical composition of the coating. And the KCMH was calculated to be 0.021 7, which indicates that the coating is uniform.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: BCNO发光材料发光机理的研究
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 张健华，王雷，张原，任明溪，王枞
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 合肥工业大学材料科学与工程学院，安徽 合肥 230009
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 实验采用前驱体法合成了BCNO发光材料，该发光材料的发射光在蓝光到绿光之间可调，发光性能优良。通过对BCNO发光材料进行X射线衍射分析，发现BCNO发光材料主要成分是B2O3、BN和石墨化碳。通过对BCNO发光材料进行透射电镜分析，发现BCNO发光材料是纳米晶体结构，其晶格条纹间距为0.34 nm。通过对BCNO发光材料进行光谱分析，发现BCNO发光材料发射波长随激发波长增大而红移。综合上述分析发现，BCNO材料发光很可能源自碳取代h- BN中B或者N的格位而聚集在一起形成碳量子点发光。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Luminescence mechanism of BCNO luminescent materials
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：BCNO luminescent materials are synthesized by precursor method. It is found that the main components of BCNO luminescent materials are B2O3, BN, and graphite by X- ray diffraction method. With the transmission electron microscopy analysis of BCNO luminescent materials, some nanocrystalline structures with lattice fringes of 0.34 nm are observed in BCNO luminescent materials. The optical measurements indicate that their maximum emission wavelength is adjustable from blue to green with the increase of excitation wavelength. Moreover, the maximum emission band of phosphor is also increase with C concentration, which is somewhat like luminescent properties of carbon quantum dots.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.citation:

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: Alnico5合金对SmCo5快淬薄带结构和磁性能的影响
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 程金云，边璐鹏，杜帅龙，肖阳，李世泰，孙继兵
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 河北工业大学材料科学与工程学院，天津 300130
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 通过在SmCo5合金中掺杂Alnico5合金，并进行退火处理，研究了不同Alnico5合金添加量和退火时间对薄带微结构和磁性能的影响。研究发现,随着Alnico5合金量的增加，软磁相的含量和种类增加；薄带的磁性能呈现先增加后降低的趋势，并在x=4. 0%时(质量分数)，薄带获得最佳磁性能，即矫顽力Hc达到1 210 kA/m、剩磁Mr达到45. 2 A·m2/kg。同时发现，在600 ℃退火时，随着保温时间的延长，薄带的综合磁性能也呈现先增大后减小的趋势。当保温时间为30 min时，薄带获得最佳的综合磁性能，且S5A2薄带的矫顽力最大，Hc=1 735 kA/m。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Effect of Alnico5 alloy addition on structure and magnetic properties of the SmCo5 as- spun ribbons
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Effect of Alnico5 alloy and annealing on microstructure and magnetic properties of the SmCo5 alloy was investigated. It was found that the content and types of soft magnetic phase increased with an increase in the Alnico5 content, and the magnetic properties of the ribbons increased initially and then decreased. The best magnetic properties were obtained at the x of 4. 0%（mass fraction）. The coercivity (Hc) reached 1 210 kA/m and the remanence(Mr) reached 45. 2 A·m2/kg. It was also found that the comprehensive magnetic properties of the ribbons increased initially and then decreased with an increase in holding time when annealing at 600 ℃. The ribbons presented the best comprehensive magnetic properties at the holding time of 30 min, and S5A2 ribbons showed the maximum Hc of 1 735 kA/m.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.citation:
程金云，边璐鹏，杜帅龙，肖阳，李世泰，孙继兵. Alnico5合金对SmCo5快淬薄带结构和磁性能的影响[J]. , 2017, 24(4): 23-28.
CHENG Jin- yun, BIAN Lu- peng, DU Shuai- long,XIAO Yang, LI Shi- tai, SUN Ji- bing. Effect of Alnico5 alloy addition on structure and magnetic properties of the SmCo5 as- spun ribbons. , 2017, 24(4): 23-28.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 磁性金属纳米颗粒及其交换耦合结构的化学制备及其磁学性能
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 乔双，侯仰龙
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 北京大学工学院，北京 100871
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 磁性金属纳米颗粒在高密度磁存储、催化和生物医学等领域具有重要的应用，引起了科研工作者的广泛兴趣。软磁- 硬磁双相交换耦合金属纳米颗粒结合了软磁相材料高饱和磁化强度和硬磁相材料高矫顽力，显著增强了磁能积，为设计和制备新一代高性能新型永磁材料提供了方法。相比于物理法，化学法能够实现磁性纳米颗粒尺寸和形状的精确控制，并通过调控组成和形貌改善其磁学性能，因此成为制备磁性纳米颗粒的常用方法。介绍了单相铁、钴、镍及其合金金属纳米颗粒、稀土永磁纳米材料等的化学制备，并阐述了交换耦合原理及耦合磁体研究的最新进展。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Magnetic metal nanoparticles and their exchange- coupled nanocomposites: chemical synthesis and magnetic properties
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Magnetic metal nanoparticles have important applications in high density magnetic storage, catalysis and biomedicine, attracting great research interest. In addition, exchange- coupled nanocomposites which combine the high saturation magnetization of a soft phase with the high coercivity of a hard phase, could obtain the magnetic materials with enhanced energy products, providing a possibility for the design and preparation of new generation of permanent magnetic materials. Compared with physical methods, chemical synthesis possesses characteristic flexibilities on materials design, sizes and morphologies, and further affect magnetic properties of the materials, becoming the common methods of preparation for nanoparticles. This review introduces some representative works on the single- phase iron, cobalt, nickel and its alloy metal nanoparticles and rare- earth magnet nanomaterial and their exchange- coupled nanocomposites, as well as explaining the exchange- coupling principles.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.citation:
乔双，侯仰龙. 磁性金属纳米颗粒及其交换耦合结构的化学制备及其磁学性能[J]. , 2017, 24(4): 1-16.
QIAO Shuang, HOU Yang- long. Magnetic metal nanoparticles and their exchange- coupled nanocomposites: chemical synthesis and magnetic properties. , 2017, 24(4): 1-16.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 稀土永磁材料的最新研究进展
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 闫阿儒，刘壮，郭帅，陈仁杰
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 中国科学院宁波材料技术与工程研究所，浙江 宁波 315201
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 作为稀土应用主体的稀土永磁材料，近年来其应用领域和需求不断扩大，促使稀土永磁材料及其产业化技术的研究也呈现新的进展和特点。随着钕铁硼磁体在风力发电、混合动力汽车/纯电动汽车、节能家电等新兴领域中的应用拓展，推动了钕铁硼磁体在高性能和低成本方向的研发，并在高丰度稀土元素替代技术、重稀土减量化技术、新型热压/热变形技术等研究方面取得较大的进展。钐钴永磁材料在国防领域继续发挥不可替代的应用作用，近年来在高性能、耐高温、低温度系数、显微结构等方面取得进展。稀土永磁磁粉作为粘结磁体的原材料，其性能直接决定了粘结磁体的质量，研究在新型共半生稀土永磁磁粉、钐铁氮磁粉、各向异性磁粉、纳米双相复合磁粉等方面受到广泛关注。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Recent research development of rare- earth permanent magnetic materials
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Recent years, the application areas and requirements of permanent magnetic materials, as the main part of rare- earth application, are expending continuously, which impel some new developments and features in the research of this direction. As the extended application of Nd- Fe- B magnet in emerging fields like wind power generation, EV/HEV, energy- efficient appliances and so on, it promotes the research of Nd- Fe- B magnets in high magnetic properties and low costs. Considerable progress have been achieved in substituted technology for rare earth with high abundance, reduction technology of heavy rare earth, new hot pressed and deformed technology. Sm- Co magnets continue to play an irreplaceable role in defense industry, which have progress in the research about high magnetic energy product, high temperature resistance, low temperature coefficient and microstructure. As the raw material of bounded permanent magnets, the magnetic performance of rare- earth permanent magnetic powder directly determined the quality of bounded magnets. Research interests have been extensively attracted in the new mischmetal permanent magnetic powder, Sm- Fe- N powder, magnetocrystalline anisotropic powder and nano composite magnetic powder.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.citation:
闫阿儒，刘壮，郭帅，陈仁杰. 稀土永磁材料的最新研究进展[J]. , 2017, 24(5): 5-16.
YAN A- ru, LIU Zhuang, GUO Shuai, CHEN Ren- jie. Recent research development of rare- earth permanent magnetic materials. , 2017, 24(5): 5-16.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 初始组织对Ti- 6Al- 4V合金高温变形机制影响研究
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 张志雄，沈军
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 同济大学材料科学与工程学院，上海 201804
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 研究了两种不同初始组织(魏氏组织、马氏体组织)Ti- 6Al- 4V合金在温度区间为700~750 ℃，应变速率为10-3~1 s-1之间的高温变形行为。结果表明：初始组织对Ti- 6Al- 4V合金高温变形行为有着重要影响，初始魏氏组织Ti- 6Al- 4V合金主要发生了绝热剪切变形，在试样内部形成了绝热剪切带，绝热剪切带的密度随着温度上升和应变速率下降而减小；α′马氏体组织Ti- 6Al- 4V合金主要发生了稳态变形，在试样内形成了晶粒尺寸在亚微米级甚至纳米级的超细晶组织，晶粒尺寸和组织均匀性随着温度升高和应变速率减小而增大。α′马氏体组织的晶粒细化机制主要是连续动态再结晶，α′/α+β相变过程为再结晶的发生提供了重要的驱动力。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Effect of initial microstructure on hot deformation behavior of Ti- 6Al- 4V alloy
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The hot deformation behavior and microstructural evolution were investigated during subtransus hot deformation of a Ti- 6Al- 4V alloy with two initial microstructures (Widmansttten microstructure and α′ martensitic microstructure) by compressive deformation in a Gleeble simulator. When deformed at a temperature of 700 ℃ and 750 ℃, specimens with a Widmansttten microstructure exhibited flow instability. These microstructures exhibited flow localization bands due to the adiabatic conditions and the bands became diffused with increasing temperatures and decreasing strain rates. Specimens with α′ martensitic microstructure exhibited extensive flow softening, especially, a homogeneous ultra- fine grained structure was achieved at all deformation conditions. The new ultrafine grains mainly formed through the process of continuous dynamic recrystallization (CDRX). The phase transformation of α′/α+β was strongly contributed to the microstructure refinement.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.citation:
张志雄，沈军. 初始组织对Ti- 6Al- 4V合金高温变形机制影响研究[J]. , 2017, 24(5): 50-56.
ZHANG Zhi- xiong, SHEN Jun. Effect of initial microstructure on hot deformation behavior of Ti- 6Al- 4V alloy. , 2017, 24(5): 50-56.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: Y取代量对双主相Nd- Y- Fe- B磁体性能与微观组织的影响
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 钟淑伟1，杜君峰2,3，庞再升3，戚植奇3，喻玺2,3，王亮亮2，刘滨2，许才龙2，钟康3，钟长传2,3，蔡小勇3，剧智华3，杨牧南1,2
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn:
1. 江西理工大学材料科学与工程学院，江西 赣州 341000
2. 江西省稀土永磁材料及器件工程研究中心，江西 赣州 341000
3.赣州富尔特电子股份有限公司，江西 赣州 341000
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 采用双主相法制备低成本Nd- Y- Fe- B烧结磁体，研究高丰度稀土Y的取代量对磁体的相组成、致密性、微观组织、磁性能以及力学性能的影响。结果表明：少量的Y取代不会造成磁体磁性能的明显下降，在Y的质量分数取代量为10%时，磁体剩磁、矫顽力和磁能积仍保持在1. 32 T、955. 25 kA/m和336. 3 kJ/m3，其硬度也较高，切削性能良好。随Y取代量进一步提升，在磁体内部析出Y和O含量较高新型稀土相，磁体内部孔洞缺陷数量增多，磁性能大幅降低，硬度和切削性能也明显下降。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: The effect of Y substitution for double main phase Nd- Y- Fe- B magnet properties and microstructure
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Low cost Nd- Y- Fe- B sintered magnets were prepared by double main phase method, and the effects of high abundance rare earth Y with different substitution quantity on the phase composition, density, microstructure, magnetic properties and mechanical property of the magnets were investigated. The result shows that a small number of Y substituting does not result in a significant decrease in magnetic properties. The remanence, coercivity, and magnetic energy product of the magnet keep in 1. 32 T、955. 25 kA/m and 336. 3 kJ/m3 when the Y substitution content is 10%（mass fraction）, and the hardness and cutting performance are also excellent. However, it is further increase amount of Y substitution, which make new RE- rich phase high content in Y and O, the number of hole detects also increase. Magnetic properties, hardness, and cutting performance are greatly reduced.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 环缝式电磁搅拌技术对挤压铸造7075铝合金组织和性能的影响
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 胡斌1,高志华2,高明伟2,杨玉洁2 ,温晓帆3
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn:
1. 北京有色金属研究总院，北京 100088
2. 北京有色金属研究总院国家有色金属复合材料工程技术研究中心，北京 100088
3. 有研稀土新材料股份有限公司，北京 100088
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 研究了不同熔体处理方法（普通电磁搅拌、化学细化法和环缝式电磁搅拌）对挤压铸造7075铝合金凝固组织及力学性能的影响规律。研究结果表明，环缝式电磁搅拌熔体处理技术显著减弱了普通电磁搅拌所固有的集肤效应对合金凝固组织的影响，增加了熔体所受的平均剪切速率，同时增加了单位体积熔体的散热面积，促使合金熔体的温度场和成分场更加均匀，有利于熔体“凝固初期晶核”瞬间大量生成，有利于获得细小均匀的凝固组织。对合金熔体同时进行环缝式电磁搅拌和添加Al- Ti- B化学细化剂处理，挤压铸造的7075铝合金显微组织变得更加细小、均匀、圆整，晶粒尺寸缩小为69 μm，形状因子达到0. 62。同时有效地提高了合金的力学性能。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Effect of annular electromagnetic stirring on microstructure and property of squeeze casting 7075 aluminium alloy
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The effect of conventional electromagnetic stirring(EMS)、chemically grain refining and annular electromagnetic stirring(A- EMS) on microstructure and property of 7075 aluminium alloy was investigated. The results indicate that A- EMS melt processing technology could avoid of skin effect efficiently, impose a high shear rate and a high intensity of turbulence to the liquid metal and increase the area of heat dissipation of unit volume melt by means of innovatively combining noncontact electromagnetic stirring and an annular chamber with specially designed profiles, so that the conditioned liquid metal has uniform temperature and uniform chemical composition. The microstructural refinement is achieved through an enhanced heterogeneous nucleation rate and an increased nuclei survival rate during the subsequent solidification processing. The microstructures of squeeze casting 7075 aluminium alloy conditioned by annulus electromagnetic stirring and adding Al- Ti- B chemical refiner become more fine、uniform and globular. The grain size decreases to 69 μm and the shape factor increases to 0. 62. The mechanical property is enhanced.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 微量Ca对镁合金组织及性能的影响
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 佟坤，吴晓英，周梦雨，郑旭烟
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 合肥工业大学材料科学与工程学院，安徽 合肥 230009
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 研究了微量Ca对ZK60镁合金组织、力学性能和腐蚀性能的影响。结果表明：当ZK60合金中加入适量Ca(0. 05%~0. 40%)时，Ca主要固溶于基体中，合金中几乎无Ca相生成；随Ca含量增加，合金的力学性能和耐蚀性提高，当Ca质量分数为0. 15%时，T6态合金的抗拉强度和伸长率均达到最大值282 MPa和16. 8%，室温拉伸断口主要由韧窝组成，呈韧性断裂，且腐蚀速率也显著降低。其原因主要是由于适量Ca促进了MgZn、MgZn2的析出，晶界结构较为连续和紧密，同时使镁合金的腐蚀电位升高，从而阻碍了镁合金的腐蚀，提高了镁合金的综合性能。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Effects of minor Ca on microstructure and properties of ZK60 alloy
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The effect of calcium on microstructure, mechanical properties and corrosion resistance of ZK60 alloy was studied. When the addition of Ca is 0. 05%- 0. 40%(mass fraction), new phases do not form. Mechanical properties and corrosion resistance can be improved with increasing of the content of calcium, when the addition is 0. 15%, the ultimate strength and elongation of ZK60 alloy increase to 282 MPa and 16. 8%, the morphology of room temperature fracture is ductile rupture and mainly consist of ductile sockets and the corrosion rate decreases apparently. This is mainly caused the increasing formation of the Mg- Zn and MgZn2 phases, which acts an effective barrier against corrosion and makes the corrosion potential increasing and makes the mechanical properties and corrosion resistance significantly improved.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.citation:
佟坤，吴晓英，周梦雨，郑旭烟. 微量Ca对镁合金组织及性能的影响[J]. , 2017, 24(5): 38-43.
TONG Kun, WU Xiao- ying, ZHOU Meng- yu, ZHENG Xu- yan. Effects of minor Ca on microstructure and properties of ZK60 alloy. , 2017, 24(5): 38-43.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The classification，application and preparation situation of the magnetron sputtering Ti target are described，the several important questions about sputtering Ti target materials which have to be resolved at moment are pointed out，moreover the development trend of sputtering target materials is also discussed and prospected in this paper.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 淬火处理对La15Fe22Ni55Mn5B3储氢合金结构和电化学性能的影响
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 王宏莉1，闫慧忠2,3，王利2,3
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn:
1.包头三德电池材料有限公司，内蒙古 包头 014030
2.稀土冶金及功能材料国家工程研究中心，内蒙古 包头 014030
3.包头稀土研究院，内蒙古 包头 014030
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 为了改善La- Fe- B系储氢电极合金的电化学性能，对熔炼- 快淬工艺制备的La15Fe22Ni55Mn5B3储氢合金在一定温度 (1 173 K, 1 373 K)下保温后，在水中进行淬火处理。采用XRD，SEM，EDS及电化学方法研究了不同温度下淬火对合金结构和性能的影响。结果表明：淬火处理对合金的相组成有明显影响，放氢P- C- T平台压降低，合金电极的活化能力提高，最大放电容量增加，高倍率放电能力（HRD）得到改善，循环稳定性略有降低。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Influence of quenching treatment on structure and electrochemical properties of La15Fe22Ni55Mn5B3 hydrogen storage alloy
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to improve the electrochemical properties of La- Fe- B series hydrogen storage alloys, the La15Fe22Ni55Mn5B3 hydrogen storage alloy was prepared by melting and rapid quenching followed by different quenching treatments (1 173 K, 1 373 K) in the water. Alloy structure and electrochemical properties of different quenching alloys have been studied systematically by X- ray diffraction (XRD), scanning electron microscope (SEM) linked with an energy- dispersive X- ray spectrometer (EDS) and electrochemical experiments. Alloy structure analyses show that the quenching treatment markedly influenced the phase composition of the alloy. Electrochemical experiments show that the desorption plateau became lower after quenching treatment, the alloy electrodes exhibited good activation characteristics, that quenching treatment improved discharge capacity of alloy electrodes. At the same time, high rate discharge (HRD) of alloy electrodes was also improved. However, cycling stability was slightly deteriorated after quenching treatment.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.citation:
王宏莉，闫慧忠 ，王利 . 淬火处理对La15Fe22Ni55Mn5B3储氢合金结构和电化学性能的影响[J]. , 2017, 24(5): 27-31.
WANG Hong- li， YAN Hui- zhong， WANG Li,. Influence of quenching treatment on structure and electrochemical properties of La15Fe22Ni55Mn5B3 hydrogen storage alloy. , 2017, 24(5): 27-31.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_intro: 通讯作者: 王宏莉     E-mail: wanghongli@bsbm.com.cn

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 高性能Sm2Fe17N3永磁粉末的还原扩散工艺研究
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 胡国辉1,2，朱代漫2，高俊彦1,2，张威峰1，熊君2，贾立颖2，王倩2，孙威1,2，刘荣明1,2，李炳山1,2

1．北矿磁材阜阳有限公司，安徽 阜阳236000
2．国家磁性材料工程技术研究中心，北京102600
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 研究了还原扩散法（R/D）制备Sm2Fe17合金及通过气- 固相反应法生成Sm2Fe17N3磁粉的工艺过程。工艺过程引入乙二氨四乙酸的氨水溶液以优化水洗工艺，借助XRD和SEM分析测试手段对Sm- Fe合金扩散、渗氮过程和机理分别进行理论分析和实验研究，通过VSM分析了Sm2Fe17N3磁粉的磁滞回线。获得了最佳磁性能的磁粉：Ms＝133. 43 A·m2/kg、Mr＝122. 46 A·m2/kg、Hci＝795. 2 kA/m、(BH)max=180. 64 kJ/m3。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Research on higher Sm2Fe17N3 rare earth permanent magnet powder by the optimized reduction- diffusion process
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The production of Sm2Fe17 alloy by means of reduction- diffusion(R/D) and the preparation of Sm2Fe17N3 magnetic powders by means of gas- solid reaction have been studied. The ethylenediamine tetraacetic acid aqueous ammonia is used to optimize the washing process. With the aid of the X- ray diffraction (XRD) and scanning electron microscope (SEM), theoretical analysis and experimental investigation on diffusion and nitriding process as well as mechanism of Sm- Fe alloy have been carried out. Through vibrating sample magnetometer（VSM）,hysteresis loop of Sm2Fe17N3 magnetic powder has been analyzed. Magnetic powders are obtained with optimum magnetic properties such as Ms＝133. 43 A·m2/kg, Mr＝122. 46 A·m2/kg, Hci＝795. 2 kA/m, (BH)max=180. 64 kJ/m3.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.citation:

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 采用微磁学模拟软件OOMMF详细研究了软磁相厚度对 SrFe12O19/α- Fe纳米复合双层膜体系磁性能的影响。结果显示，固定硬磁相厚度10 nm，随着软磁相厚度(Ls)的增加，体系由完全耦合的单相反转行为? 湮泶畔嗖糠钟畔刃魏说牧较喾醋形⒈硐殖鱿灾氖４旁銮啃вΓ猛缌χ鸾ソ档? 最大磁能积随着软磁相厚度的增加，先增大后减小，并在Ls=5 nm时取得峰值，达到165. 57 kJ/m3，远远超过目前单相高性能铁氧体的最大磁能积40 kJ/m3。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Micromagnetic simulation of SrFe12O19/α- Fe nanocomposite bilayer films
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The effect of soft magnetic phase thicknesses on the magnetic properties of SrFe12O19/α- Fe bilayer films was investigated by using micromagnetic simulation software OOMMF. The result shows that when fixing the hard magnetic phase thickness as 10 nm, the system changes from fully coupled single- phase reversal behavior into two- phase reversal behavior, the remanence increases and the coercivity decreases with the increase of the thickness of soft phase (Ls). Moreover, the maximum magnetic energy product increases first, and then decreases, and reaches the peak value 165. 57 kJ/m3 when Ls equals 5 nm,which is far beyond the largest energy products(40 kJ/m3) of single phase high- performance SrFe12O19.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 镁合金筒形件热拉深变压边力工艺研究
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 李奇，吴晓英，郑旭烟，李琳
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 合肥工业大学材料科学与工程学院，安徽 合肥，230009
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 以镁合金筒形件作为研究对象，利用Dynaform软件模拟不同变压边力加载曲线下的拉深成形过程。通过比较不同变压边力加载曲线下筒形件拉深的成形质量，得出压边力随凸模行程增加的方式能够较好改善筒形件成形质量，其中线性增加变压边力加载曲线的成形质量最好。同时以压边力加载曲线、冲压速度、摩擦系数为试验因素设计正交试验，得出最优参数组合为：变压边力加载曲线5、冲压速度2 500 mm/s、摩擦系数0. 150。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: The investigation of the magnesium alloy tube parts of hot drawing variable blank- holder force
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The different curves of variable blank holder force (VBHF) were studied by using Dynaform software to simulate deep drawing process for magnesium alloy tube parts. It can draw a conclusion of that the forming quality of tube- shaped parts will be better improved as the BHF increasing with the punch stroke by comparing the formability under different curve of variable blank holder force. And the BHF increase linearly which has a best forming quality. The orthogonal experiment according to the experimental factor of VBHF curve, punching speed and friction coefficient were designed. The finally optimal parameter is the 5 cure of VBHF, the punching speed of 2 500 mm/s and the friction coefficient of 0. 150.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: The defect analysis of Finemet type iron- based amorphous ribbons
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The defects in the Finemet type amorphous ribbons with a width of less than 40 mm produced by a single- roller melt spinning method are investigated. It is found that the ribbons will become brittle if the cooling capacity of copper roller and other cooling system are instability; and the dim color, bad quality of edge, stripes, holes and other defects will generate on the free surface of ribbons when the ceramic spray nozzle is thermal etched by the high- temperature melt, the flatness of roller is varied, or the liquid level in the tundish is too low, and so on. However, all these defects can be improved or eliminated by the optimized technologies.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: Co2MnAl哈斯勒合金薄膜的制备与磁性研究
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 张宪民，肖思炎，潘醇荣，陈钦盛
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 东北大学材料科学与工程学院，材料各向异性与织构教育部重点实验室，辽宁 沈阳 110819
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 采用磁控共溅射方法制备了Co2MnAl哈斯勒合金薄膜。系统研究了衬底加热温度对Co2MnAl薄膜的晶体结构、磁学性质(饱和磁化强度和矫顽力)和表面粗糙度的影响。300 ℃时制备的Co2MnAl薄膜具有良好的B2晶体结构,显示了最大的饱和磁化强度和非常小的粗糙度。通过调控衬底加热温度，实现了Co2MnAl薄膜的矫顽力在400~2 785 A/m范围的调控。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Preparation and magnetic properties of Co2MnAl Heusler alloy film
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Co2MnAl Heulser films have been prepared by a magneto co- sputtering method. The effect of substrate temperatures (23-500 ℃) on the crystal structure, magnetic properties and surface roughness of Co2MnAl films were systematically investigated. It was confirmed that the Co2MnAl film prepared at 300 ℃ showed an optimized B2 crystal structure. The film has the maximum of saturated magnetization and a very small roughness. The study indicates the coercivity of Co2MnAl films could be regulated from 400 to 2 785 A/m by varying the substrate temperatures.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 非晶软磁合金带材斜喷工艺研究
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 郝洁，纪松，黄敬晖，丁昂，张延松，张泽强
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 内蒙古金属材料研究所宁波分所，浙江 宁波 315103
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 采用斜喷式块体旋转流动铸造技术制备了Co69Fe4Ni2Si10B15、Fe77Si8B15等合金成分的非晶软磁合金带材。研究表明，通过改变具有一定黏度的钢液层流与冷却载体表面的接触角度，使钢液层流采用斜铺的方式快速铺展到冷却载体表面，急冷后可形成超薄的非晶带材。通过对斜喷工艺参数的控制制备出的带材厚度可以降低到12 μm左右。用扫描电镜对不同工艺参数下制备出的非晶带的形貌进行了观察，发现在其他工艺参数不变的情况下，随着喷射角度的减小，制备出的非晶软磁合金带材的表观质量越好，平整度越高。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Study on oblique spraying technology of amorphous soft magnetic alloy ribbons
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The amorphous soft magnetic ribbons of the Co69Fe4Ni2Si10B15 and the Fe77Si8B15 alloy were prepared by the oblique spray type of the block- rotation- flow- casting technology. The study shown that by changing the contact angle between the laminar flow molten steel and the surface of the cooling carrier, the laminar flow of the molten steel was rapidly spread to the surface of the cooling carrier by the oblique spray type, and formed the ultra- thin amorphous strip after quenching. The thickness of ribbons could be reduced to 12 μm by controlling process parameters of the oblique spray type. The morphology of amorphous ribbons prepared under different process parameters was observed by scanning electron microscopy (SEM). It was found that the amorphous soft magnetic alloy ribbons had better apparent quality and higher flatness by decreasing the spray angle and maintaining other parameters unchanged.

The effects of CuAl and different annealing conditions on MM- Fe- B sintered magnets and the microstructure of MM- Fe- B sintered magnets. http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 王艳，赵文怡，张丞，王雨，张旭霞，李兆强
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn:
1. 包头稀土研究院,内蒙古 包头 014030
2. 稀土冶金及功能材料国家工程研究中心,内蒙古 包头 014030
3. 白云鄂博稀土资源研究与综合利用国家重点实验室,内蒙古 包头 014030
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 采用共沉淀- 浸渍法制备了一系列不同载体负载的LaCoO3催化剂，其中载体包括 Al2O3、TiO2、ZrO2、CeO2、Ce0. 9Zr0. 1Ox、Ce0. 9RE0. 1Ox(RE=La、Pr、Nd、Sm、Y)，采用XRD、BET等表征手段对其结构和性能进行了表征，并对其在柴油车尾气Soot催化消除反应中的性能进行了评价。结果表明，负载型LaCoO3催化剂的Soot燃烧性能较相应载体有明显提高，活性顺序为LaCoO3/CeSmOx>LaCoO3/CeYOx=LaCoO3/CeNdOx>LaCoO3/CeLaOx>LaCoO3/CeO2>LaCoO3/CePrOx>LaCoO3/CeZrOx>LaCoO3/TiO2> LaCoO3/Al2O3。其中LaCoO3/CeSmOx催化剂对Soot催化氧化活性最优，在与碳颗粒松散接触条件下，达到Soot最大燃烧速率对应的温度为341℃。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Study on supported LaCoO3 catalysts for diesel soot combustion
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：A series of LaCoO3 catalysts supported on different carriers including Al2O3, TiO2, ZrO2, CeO2, Ce0. 9Zr0. 1Ox and Ce0. 9RE0. 1Ox (RE=La, Pr, Nd, Sm and Y) was prepared by the method of coprecipitation- impregnation method. The structures and properties of the samples were characterized by the techniques of XRD and BET. The catalytic performance of the prepared supports and catalysts for soot combustion emitted from diesel engines was investigated. The results show that the supported LaCoO3 catalysts posse much higher activity than relevant supports. The catalytic performance follows the order of LaCoO3/CeSmOx>LaCoO3/CeYOx=LaCoO3/CeNdOx>LaCoO3/CeLaOx>LaCoO3/CeO2>LaCoO3/CePrOx>LaCoO3/CeZrOx>LaCoO3/TiO2>LaCoO3/Al2O3. The peak combustion temperature of soot particles over LaCoO3/CeSmOx catalyst is 341℃, which exhibits best soot oxidation ability among the supported catalysts when the contact between catalysts and soot are loose.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 新型富La/Ce多主相稀土永磁材料研究
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 严密，金佳莹，马天宇，王新华
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 浙江大学材料科学与工程学院，浙江 杭州 310027
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 钕铁硼是目前磁性最强、应用最广、消耗稀土最多的永磁材料。钕铁硼的多年快速增长，导致我国稀土资源利用极不平衡，其高度依赖的Nd、Pr、Dy、Tb等昂贵稀土资源日益紧缺，而La、Ce等廉价的高丰度稀土则大量积压。扩大高丰度的La、Ce在钕铁硼中的应用，发展低成本高性能磁体，已成为稀土永磁材料的重要研究方向。然而，La/Ce均匀取代Pr/Nd，会降低RE2Fe14B四方相的內禀磁性能，导致强烈的磁稀释效应。通过设计富Nd和富La- Ce两类主相合金，制备多主相RE- Fe- B磁体，即La/Ce在主相晶粒内部和晶粒间的分布是不均匀的。这种化学不均匀性导致单个晶粒内部强烈的短程交换作用，以及晶粒间的长程静磁耦合，保障了富La/Ce磁体的磁性能。同时富La/Ce多主相磁体的抗腐蚀性能和力学性能也满足了商业化应用的要求。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Research on the La/Ce- rich multi- main- phase RE- Fe- B permanent magnetic materials
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Nd2Fe14B- type sintered magnets with outstanding magnetic performance have served as indispensable components for both the industrial and household products. The continually growing demand for Nd- Fe- B magnets has led to the overuse of critical rare earth (RE) elements including Nd/Pr/Dy/Tb, whereas the abundant and cheap La/Ce are overstocked. Incorporation of La/Ce into the 2∶14∶1- type permanent magnets is beneficial to balance the utilization of RE sources and lower the material cost. On account of inferior intrinsic properties of La2Fe14B and Ce2Fe14B to Nd2Fe14B compound, directly alloying La/Ce into the 2∶14∶1 lattice severely deteriorates the magnetic properties. Here we report high figure- of- merit La/Ce- rich RE- Fe- B permanent magnets based on the new prototype of multi main phase (MMP) approach (mixing the La/Ce- free and La/Ce- rich RE2Fe14B- type components). The RE concentration in the main phase differs a lot either over local regions within an individual grain or across grains. The resultant short- range exchange couplings of local regions within an individual 2∶14∶1 main phase grain, and the long- range magnetostatic interactions among different 2∶14∶1- type grains facilitate superior magnetic performance of MMP magnets. Meanwhile, the La/Ce- rich MMP magnets also exhibit preferable corrosion resistance and mechanical properties, which are also critical criteria when assessing their applicability.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.citation:
严密，金佳莹，马天宇，王新华. 新型富La/Ce多主相稀土永磁材料研究[J]. , 2018, 25(1): 1-9.
YAN Mi, JIN Jia- ying, MA Tian- yu, WANG Xin- hua. Research on the La/Ce- rich multi- main- phase RE- Fe- B permanent magnetic materials. , 2018, 25(1): 1-9.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 铂基纳米材料电催化剂研究进展
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 门张蕾，范洪生，王荣明
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 北京科技大学数理学院，北京 100083
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 铂基纳米材料对氧还原和小分子氧化具有优异的催化效果，在燃料电池领域具有不可替代的作用，近年来吸引了大量的研究和关注。目前燃料电池的商业化应用依然困难，催化剂性价比低是一个重要的原因。精确调控铂基纳米材料的结构、形貌和组分，研究电催化性质的差异，有助于理解电催化反应机理。在此基础上，开发简便易行、高度可控的合成方法，获得具有高催化活性和稳定性的电催化剂，对于各种燃料电池的实际应用具有重要的促进作用。从载体负载的纯铂颗粒、组分调节、晶面控制和三维结构构建等几方面详细介绍了铂基纳米材料电催化剂制备合成和性质研究的最新进展。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Progress of the research on electrocatalysts of Pt- based nanomaterials
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：With excellent catalytic effect on oxygen reduction reaction and oxidation reaction of small organic molecules, Pt- based nanomaterials show irreplaceable position in the field of fuel cells and have gained considerable attention in the recent years. The low cost- effective catalysts hinder the commercialization of fuel cell technology. It is benefit for understanding the electro- catalytic mechanism by controlling the structure, morphology and component of Pt- based nanomaterials and investigating the catalytic properties. On this basis, developing facile and controllable methods to acquire catalysts with high activity and stability is extremely important for the application of fuel cells. The recent development of synthetic methods and catalytic investigation is elaborated here by introducing Pt nanoparticles, component adjustment, surface control and 3- dimentional structure acquisition.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.citation:
门张蕾，范洪生，王荣明. 铂基纳米材料电催化剂研究进展[J]. , 2018, 25(1): 10-17.
MEN Zhang- lei, FAN Hong- sheng, WANG Rong- ming. Progress of the research on electrocatalysts of Pt- based nanomaterials. , 2018, 25(1): 10-17.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 碳钢材料的点蚀深度及统计特性研究
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 由艳华,王斌容,胡海云
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 北京理工大学物理学院, 北京 100081
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 基于点蚀的随机理论和发生机理，建立了钢材料的点蚀深度和长大速率随机模型，模型中考虑了因材料和腐蚀环境的不均匀性而引起的涨落。采用该模型得出了Q235钢在模拟海洋大气环境中的点蚀深度和速率随时间变化的理论曲线，并得出点蚀深度的理论结果与实验数据比较吻合。利用非平衡统计理论，通过建立和求解Fock- Plank方程，计算了Q235钢点蚀的概率密度分布函数，推导出不同腐蚀时间时的最概然点蚀深度值和不同点蚀深度对应的最概然腐蚀时间范围。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Study on pit depth and statistical characteristics of carbon steel
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Pitting corrosion is the main localized corrosion of carbon steel, which often makes carbon steel failure. Based on the stochastic theory and growth mechanism of pitting corrosion, the stochastic model of pit depth and corrosion growth rate of carbon steel is established, and the inhomogeneous fluctuations of material and corrosive environment are considered in this model. The theoretical curves of pit depth and corrosion growth rate of Q235 steel in marine industry atmosphere are obtained by using this model, which present the trend of pit depth and corrosion growth rate versus time, and the theoretical results are agreement with the experimental data. With the non- equilibrium statistical theory, the probability density function of pitting corrosion of Q235 steel is derived by solving Fock- Plank Equation. Then the most probable pit depth in different corrosion time ranges and the most probable corrosion time range of different pit depths are deduced.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.citation:
由艳华 王斌容 胡海云. 碳钢材料的点蚀深度及统计特性研究[J]. , 2018, 25(1): 18-22.
YOU Yan- hua, WANG Bin- rong, HU Hai- yun. Study on pit depth and statistical characteristics of carbon steel. , 2018, 25(1): 18-22.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: La- Mg- Ni系A2B7型储氢合金表面包覆NAFION及其电化学性能研究
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 王浩1，罗永春1,2，邓安强1，赵磊1
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn:
1. 兰州理工大学材料科学与工程学院，甘肃 兰州 730050
2. 省部共建有色金属先进加工与在利用国家重点实验室，甘肃 兰州 730050
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 采用蒸发溶剂相转化方法对La- Mg- Ni系储氢合金表面实施包覆NAFION，研究了不同浓度的NAFION溶液对合金表面包覆效果和电化学性能的影响。结果表明，通过蒸发溶剂可使NAFION在储氢合金表面形成不同形态的NAFION功能性包覆层，随NAFION稀释比例不断增大，合金颗粒表面NAFION的包覆形态由分散和凸起的白色片状物逐渐向形成薄且铺展性较好的薄膜状产物变化，但未形成连续完整的包覆层。电化学分析表明，包覆后合金电极的循环稳定性有所提高，其中NAFION稀释比例为1∶5时的合金电极放电容量最大(387. 3mA·h/g)和循环稳定性最好，经100次充放电循环后该合金电极容量的保持率S100达到89. 0%，其性能优于未包覆的裸合金。表面包覆NAFION后，合金电极大电流放电性能明显下降，其HRD900由裸合金时的81. 6%降至包覆后的68. 1%。合金电极反应时表面电子交换阻力的增加(或交换电流密度I0减小)是影响包覆合金高倍率放电性能的主要因素之一。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Research on La- Mg- Ni system A2B7- type hydrogen storage alloy surface coating NAFION and electrochemical performance
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：La- Mg- Ni- based hydrogen storage alloy surface was coated NAFION using simple evaporation solvent phase conversion method. The effects of different concentrations of NAFION solution on the surface and electrochemical properties of La- Mg- Ni based hydrogen storage alloys were investigated. The results show that by evaporating the solvent, NAFION can form different forms of NAFION functional coating on the surface of hydrogen storage alloy. With the decrease of the concentration, The NAFION formed on the surface of the alloy particles is changed from a dispersed and raised white flakes to a thin, well- spread film, but the film can not completely coated alloy particles. Electrochemical performance test results show that the cycle stability of the alloy after coated NAFION is improved. When the NAFION dilution ratio is 1∶5, alloy electrode discharge capacity is the largest (387. 3 mA·h/g) and the cycle stability is the best, after 100 times charge and discharge cycle, the alloy capacity retention rate S100 reached 89%, which is best bare alloy. After the surface coating of NAFION, the high current discharge performance of the alloy electrode was significantly decreased, and the HRD900 was reduced from 81. 6% of the bare alloy to 68. 1% after the coating. The increase of the surface electron exchange resistance (or the exchange current density I0 decreases) at the time of the alloy electrode reaction is one of the main factors affecting the high magnification discharge performance of the coated alloy.
keywords_en: La-Mg-Ni system A2B7-type hydrogen storage alloy

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 球磨工艺对永磁铁氧体磁性能的影响
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 张伟,邱伟国,赵修彬
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 中钢集团安徽天源科技股份有限公司，安徽 马鞍山 243000
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 对球磨工艺进行了优化，分别研究了球磨用钢球种类、材质、直径大小、球磨机转速以及球磨时间对永磁铁氧体磁性能和料浆粒度分布的影响，结果表明，使用轴承钢球球磨所得产品的磁性能(Br，Hcb，Hcj)明显好于合金钢球球磨所得产品的磁性能。选择6mm与4. 8mm轴承钢球按照4∶6的比例配比，并将球磨机转速选定为22r/min，球磨10h，所获得的料浆磁性能最好，料浆粒度分布好。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Effect of ball milling process on magnetic properties of permanent ferrite
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The ball milling process is optimized. The effects of ball type, material, diameter, speed of ball mill and ball milling time on the magnetic properties and particle size distribution of permanent ferrite were studied, The results show that the magnetic properties (Br, Hcb, Hcj) of the products obtained by ball milling with ball bearings are better than those obtained by ball milling of alloy steels. Choose 6mm and 4. 8mm bearing steel ball according to the ratio of 4 to 6, and select the ball mill speed as 22r/min, ball milling 10h, the obtained slurry has the best magnetic properties, and the slurry size distribution is good.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.citation:
张伟 邱伟国 赵修彬. 球磨工艺对永磁铁氧体磁性能的影响[J]. , 2018, 25(1): 30-32.
ZHANG WEI, QIU Wei- guo, ZHAO Xiu- bin. Effect of ball milling process on magnetic properties of permanent ferrite. , 2018, 25(1): 30-32.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.date: 通讯作者: 赵修彬     E-mail: zxb19871006@163.com

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: W型铁氧体掺杂在M型铁氧体中的应用研究
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 邱伟国,吴刚,赵修彬
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 中钢集团安徽天源科技股份有限公司，安徽 马鞍山 243000
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 以自制预烧料的配方，在一次球磨中，添加一定比例的W型铁氧体BaCoZnFe16O27，采用陶瓷法制备W型铁氧体掺杂高性能M型钙锶铁氧体磁体。通过X射线衍射(XRD)、场发射扫描电子显微镜(FESEM)和TPS—2000H型磁性材料自动测量装置，研究了W型铁氧体掺杂对材料相成分、形貌和磁性能的影响。结果表明，适量的W型铁氧体掺杂能够明显地提高M型钙锶铁氧体的磁性能，在掺杂量为0. 5%(质量分数)，烧结温度1190℃时，磁性能为Br=455. 2mT、Hcb=330kA/m、Hcj=350kA/m、(BH)max=41kJ/m3。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Study on application of W ferrites doped in M ferrite
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The permanent magnet calcium strontium ferrite production as raw materials, W ferrite BaCoZnFe16O27 added in a ball milling. Preparation of W ferrite doped M type calcium strontium ferrite magnets with ceramic method. By X- ray diffraction (XRD), field emission scanning electron microscopy (FESEM) and TPS—2000H type automatic measurement device of magnetic materials, the effects of morphology and magnetic properties of W ferrite materials were studied. The results show that the doping amount of carbonate can obviously improve the magnetic properties of M type calcium strontium ferrite, in doped 0. 5% (mass fraction), the sintering temperature of 1190℃, the magnetic energy of Br=455. 2mT, Hcb=330kA/m, Hcj=350kA/m, (BH)max=41kJ/m3。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.citation:
邱伟国 吴刚 赵修彬. W型铁氧体掺杂在M型铁氧体中的应用研究[J]. , 2018, 25(1): 33-35.
QIU Wei- guo, WU GANG, ZHAO Xiu- bin. Study on application of W ferrites doped in M ferrite. , 2018, 25(1): 33-35.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 45钢表面制备碳化钨固溶体合金涂层的研究
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 万小虎， 邹致远，苏华
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 四川科力特硬质合金股份有限公司，四川 广汉 618306
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 在真空条件下，采用低熔点的NiCrBSi作为粘结剂，在45钢表面制备了碳化钨固溶体合金涂层。研究了涂层制备过程、涂层的微观组织、相结构、合金元素的分布及涂层的显微硬度，结果表明：在辊压的过程中，有机物成型剂被碾轧成纤维状，纵横交错地构成立体结构的网状，将分散的粉末颗粒联系在一起，制成柔性可弯曲、涂层厚度可以调节的“有机- 合金塑坯”，使该涂层满足各种表面的需要；在真空熔结阶段，碳化钨固溶体合金涂层与45钢基体形成高强度的冶金结合，涂层硬度随着碳化钨固溶体含量增加而有所提高，涂层的剪切强度变化不明显；当碳化钨固溶体含量为85%时，涂层表面硬度达到1132HV(HV30)，剪切强度达到407MPa。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Characterization of WC solid solution on 45 steel substrate by vacuum hot- melt
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The WC solid solution alloy coating was prepared under the condition of vacuum hot- melt WC solid solution. The alloy coating preparation process, micro- structure, phase structure and the characteristics of the distribution of alloy elements and micro- hardness were researched. Results showed that the organic forming agents were rolled into a fibrous form and a crisscross pattern with three- dimensional reticular structure in the process of rolling, which combined the dispersed powder particles together to form a flexible and bendable powder blanks. More important, the thickness of the coating can be adjusted by roll spacing. In the vacuum sintering stage, WC solid solution and 45 steel substrate combined with high strength in metallurgical combination. Coating surface hardness increased with the content of WC solid solution, but the shear bond strength of the coating increased and then decreased slightly. When the content of WC solid solution was 85% in coating, surface hardness was 1132HV (HV30), shear bond strength reached to 407 MPa.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_intro: 通讯作者: 万小虎     E-mail: meetingok@163.com

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 混料工艺对预混合铁粉质量的影响
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 李霆1,2，宫本奎2
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn:
1. 莱芜钢铁集团粉末冶金有限公司, 山东 莱芜 271105
2. 山东理工大学材料科学与工程学院，山东 淄博 255049
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 以铁基粉末制品典型混料配比Fe+0. 8%C+2. 0%Cu+Lub为例，研究对比了两种混料方式得到的成品性能及其优劣。结果表明，粘结混合粉具备粘结率高、流动性好、扬尘少、润滑性能好等优点，直接混合粉具备工艺流程短、效率高、合金损失少等优点，两种方法所产成品合金成分的偏析度基本相同，粉末的松比及压制性能接近。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Effect of premixed iron powder on mixing process
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Taking typical mixing ratio of iron base powder products as an example, the performance and quality of the finished product produced by these two kinds of mixing methods were studied and compared. It shows that they all have some advantages- bonding mixed powder with high bond strength, good flow rate, less dust, and good lubrication performance, directly mixed powder with short process high efficiency and less metal loss. The alloy composition segregation degree of finished goods by these two methods is basically the same, and apparent density, together with the suppression performance of that is close.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.citation:
李霆 ，宫本奎. 混料工艺对预混合铁粉质量的影响[J]. , 2018, 25(1): 43-49.
LI Ting,, GONG Ben- kui. Effect of premixed iron powder on mixing process. , 2018, 25(1): 43-49.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: Mn基合金/重金属异质结中的自旋轨道转矩研究进展
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 孟康康，姜勇
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 北京科技大学材料科学与工程学院，北京 100083
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 自旋电子学的一个重要研究内容是利用自旋极化的电流诱导磁性材料的磁矩翻转，其中由强自旋轨道耦合效应诱导的自旋轨道转矩效应是一种控制磁矩的有效手段。介绍了近年来基于MnGa/重金属和MnAl/重金属异质结中的自旋轨道转矩效应所取得的进展。首先简述了自旋轨道转矩的基本原理，然后分别讨论了如何降低外界辅助磁场和提高自旋轨道转矩效率，最后对这种异质结的电流驱动磁矩翻转进行了总结和展望。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Progress of spin orbit torque in Mn based alloys/heavy metals heterojunctions
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：One of the most important in spintronics is magnetization switching using spin polarized current, in which the spin orbit torque based on strong spin orbit coupling is an effective method. The recent progress of spin orbit torque in MnGa/heavy metals and MnAl/heavy metals heterojunctions were briefly described. Firstly, the physical origin of spin orbit torque were reviewed, and then how to decrease the applied magnetic field and increase the efficiency of spin orbit torque were discussed. Finally, the prospects for the development of spin orbit torque in these heterojunctions were presented.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.citation:
孟康康，姜勇. Mn基合金/重金属异质结中的自旋轨道转矩研究进展[J]. , 2018, 25(2): 1-7.
MENG Kang- kang,JIANG Yong. Progress of spin orbit torque in Mn based alloys/heavy metals heterojunctions. , 2018, 25(2): 1-7.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 铁酸铋粉末的制备及性能研究
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 段晴晴1，高坤2，张宪民1
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn:
1. 东北大学材料科学与工程学院，材料各向异性与织构教育部重点实验室，辽宁 沈阳110819
2. 滨州学院航空工程学院，山东 滨州 256603
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 研究了以硝酸铋(Bi(NO3)3·5H2O)、硝酸铁(Fe(NO3)3·9H2O)为原料，氢氧化钠(NaOH)做矿化剂，采用水热合成的方法制备的高纯度高结晶度的单相铁酸铋BiFeO3粉末。研究了不同反应温度(150~190℃)和不同反应时间(5~48h)对BiFeO3粉末相结构与微观形貌变化的影响，获得了规律性的结果，温度的提高和适当的反应时间均有助于粉末中杂相的减少，而BiFeO3颗粒的形貌主要受温度的影响，反应时间只对BiFeO3颗粒大小稍有影响。研究结果还表明，制备的高纯度高结晶度的单相BiFeO3粉末具有相对强的磁性。文章对该类多铁性材料的研制开拓了研究思路。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Preparation and properties of bismuth ferrite powder
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The single phase of BiFeO3 powder with high crystallinity and high purity prepared by hydrothermal synthesis method using (Bi(NO3)3·5H2O), (Fe(NO3)3·9H2O) and NaOH as raw materials. The evolution of phase structure and morphology of BiFeO3 powders were investigated under different reaction temperatures (150- 190℃) and reaction times (5- 48h). It is found that the appropriate reaction time and the increase of temperature contribute to reduce the impurity phase. The morphology of BiFeO3 particles is dominantly affected by temperature, while the reaction time slightly affects the size of BiFeO3 particles. The results also show that the optimized BiFeO3 powders possess relatively strong magnetic properties.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.citation:
段晴晴，高坤，张宪民. 铁酸铋粉末的制备及性能研究[J]. , 2018, 25(2): 8-12.
DUAN Qing- qing,GAO Kun,ZHANG Xian- min. Preparation and properties of bismuth ferrite powder. , 2018, 25(2): 8-12.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 无重稀土烧结钕铁硼磁体的晶粒细化研究
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 张守华，陈杰，李建，刘涛，喻晓军
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 中国钢研科技集团有限公司安泰科技股份有限公司，北京 100081
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 在无重稀土、同成分条件下，通过调整铸片冷却辊速与气流磨分级轮转速制备出了不同晶粒尺寸的烧结钕铁硼磁体，并分析了铸片柱状晶宽度、粉末粒度、磁体晶粒尺寸及矫顽力之间的对应关系。研究结果表明，铸片柱状晶的细化、均匀化是气流磨粉末细化、均匀化的基础，而铸片细化配合较高的分级轮转速才能细化最终烧结后晶粒尺寸。对应晶粒平均尺寸最小达到3. 76μm，对应矫顽力达到1339kA/m。晶粒尺寸细化促使各晶粒表面缺陷面积减少而轮廓更为平滑，降低反磁化形核几率并降低了微观散磁场，从而提高矫顽力。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Study of grain refinement in Dy- free Nd- Fe- B sintered magnet
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：Various types of Nd- Fe- B sintered magnets were prepared by adjusting wheel speed of strip casting and rotation speed of filter wheel in jet- milling machine on the condition of Dy- free and uniform composition and the relationship between critical parameters including columnar grain width, powder size, ultimate grain size and coercivity was investigated. It was discovered that refinement and homogenization of the casted strips are the critical precondition for those of jet- milled powder, and ideal grain refinement of the magnet was possible only when refinement of strips were combined with high rotation filtering jet- milling. Corresponding average grain diameter was 3. 76μm low and the coercivity was 1339kA/m high. Grain refinement possibly reduces the superficial defect area and smoothen the boundary of the grain, and that decreases the possibility of anti- magnetization and local magnetostatic interaction field, increasing the coercivity ultimately.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.citation:
张守华，陈杰，李建，刘涛，喻晓军. 无重稀土烧结钕铁硼磁体的晶粒细化研究[J]. , 2018, 25(2): 13-19.
ZHANG Shou- hua,CHEN Jie,LI Jian,LIU Tao,YU Xiao- jun. Study of grain refinement in Dy- free Nd- Fe- B sintered magnet. , 2018, 25(2): 13-19.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_intro: 通讯作者: 李建     E-mail: lijian@atmcn.com

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 晶界扩散Dy钕铁硼的高温磁性能研究
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 李建1,2，程星华2，周磊2，刘涛2，喻晓军2，李波1，干勇1
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn:
1. 钢铁研究总院，北京 100081
2. 安泰科技股份有限公司，北京 100081
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 通过晶界扩散Dy元素将烧结钕铁硼磁体的牌号从39SH提高至39UH，并与传统合金化工艺添加Dy制备的39UH磁体进行了比较研究。研究发现，经过Dy晶界扩散处理后磁体的室温矫顽力由1677kA/m增加至2218kA/m，磁体Dy的质量分数从3. 49%增加至4. 09%，Dy使用量比传统合金化方法制备的39UH磁体节约了16. 3%。电子探针分析结果显示，扩散磁体中Dy高浓度富集在晶界附近，明显不同于Dy元素呈弥散分布的合金化样品。在室温至180℃范围内晶界扩散磁体的室温矫顽力、高温矫顽力以及矫顽力温度系数均优于合金化高重稀土对比样品。室温至180℃不同温度烘烤实验表明，未处理磁体在150℃以上开始出现大幅度不可逆磁通密度衰减，而扩散处理样品和39UH比较样品则均比较稳定。进一步研究显示，经过晶界扩散处理后大幅度提高了样品矫顽力，在开路烘烤实验过程中样品工作点仍能处于拐点以上，避免了高温热退磁。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: High temperature magnetic properties of Dy grain boundary diffused Nd- Fe- B sintered magnet
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：In present work, 39SH grade Nd- Fe- B sintered magnet was upgraded to 39UH grade through Dy grain boundary diffusion, and it was compared with the traditional 39UH prepared by alloying method. The coercivity of the magnet increased from 1677 to 2218kA/m, and Dy content increased from 3. 49% to 4. 09% (mass fraction), which is 16.3% lower than alloyed 39UH magnet. Dy was found to be enriched near the grain boundary, showing a totally different trait compared with the alloyed sample, in which Dy was randomly dispersed. The high temperature coercivity and coercivity coeffeciency of diffused sample were found to be better than that of alloyed sample within the temperature ranging from 23 to 180℃. In high- temperature flux loss test within the temperature ranging from 23 to 180℃, the untreated sample showed a large irreversible flux loss, while the diffused sample and the alloyed sample remained stable. Dy grain boundary diffusion largely increased the coercivity, and that made the working point was placed upon the knee point of the BH curve and thermal demagnetization was avoided.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.citation:
李建 ，程星华，周磊，刘涛，喻晓军，李波，干勇. 晶界扩散Dy钕铁硼的高温磁性能研究[J]. , 2018, 25(2): 20-25.
LI Jian，CHENG Xing- hua，ZHOU Lei，LIU Tao，YU Xiao- jun，LI Bo，GAN Yong. High temperature magnetic properties of Dy grain boundary diffused Nd- Fe- B sintered magnet. , 2018, 25(2): 20-25.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 富镝辅合金添加对烧结NdFeB磁体磁性能与微观结构的影响及其电化学性能研究
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 宋伟，周军，孙红军，徐鹏，周根超，聂明
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 中钢集团安徽天源科技股份有限公司，安徽 马鞍山 243000
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 采用片铸、氢爆碎、气流磨工艺制备烧结NdFeB磁体。研究了富镝辅合金添加对烧结NdFeB磁体性能和微观结构的影响。在一定范围内，随着(PrNd)19Dy23(FeCoCuGa)balB1富镝辅合金添加比例的增加，磁体剩磁下降、矫顽力升高。当镝添加量小于2. 3%(质量分数)时，磁体的综合磁性能高于相同成分单合金法制备磁体的性能。当镝添加量大于2. 99%(质量分数)，与单合金法相比，在同样的烧结温度下，磁体磁能积、密度明显下降。通过适当的提高烧结温度，高镝添加量的磁体密度和磁能积得到提升，仍可获得综合性能高于单合金法制备磁体的性能。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: The influences on magnetic property and micro structure of sintered NdFeB magnets by the addition of dysprosium alloy
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The sintered NdFeB magnet was produced by the main processes of casting, hydrogen decrepitating and milling. The influences on magnetic properties and micro- structure of sintered NdFeB magnets were studied by the addition of dysprosium alloy. In a certain range, with the increasing percentage of adding dysprosium alloy, namely (PrNd)19Dy23(FeCoCuGa)balB1, the remanence of NdFeB magnet decreased, while the coercivity increased. When the percentage of Dy addition was less than 2. 3% (mass fraction), the magnetic properties can be higher than that of the magnet without addition. When the percentage of Dy addition was more than 2. 99% (mass fraction), the maximum energy product and density of the magnet can decrease obviously, compared the magnet without addition at the same sintering temperature. By increasing the sintering temperature properly, the density and maximum energy product of magnet with high Dy addition can be increased, and also the comprehensive magnetic properties were much higher than that without addition.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.citation:

SONG Wei,ZHOU Jun,SUN Hong- jun,XU Peng,ZHOU Gen- chao,NIE Ming. The influences on magnetic property and micro structure of sintered NdFeB magnets by the addition of dysprosium alloy. , 2018, 25(2): 43-46.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 衬底温度对FeCrCoNiMn高熵合金氮化物薄膜组织结构和电性能的影响
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 杨克蒋1，张国庆1，汪亮兵1，罗永春1,2
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn:
1. 兰州理工大学材料科学与工程学院，甘肃 兰州 730050
2. 兰州理工大学有色金属先进加工与再利用省部共建国家重点实验室，甘肃 兰州 730050
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 采用射频反应磁控溅射法在Si(100)衬底上制备出纳米晶高熵合金FeCrCoNiMn氮化物薄膜，结合场发射扫描电子显微镜(FESEM)、电子显微探针(EPMA)、X射线光电子能谱分析仪(XPS)、原子力显微镜(AFM)及四点探针(FPP)研究了衬底温度(40、300、500℃)对沉积薄膜的表面形貌、化学组成、微观结构和导电性能的影响。结果表明，衬底温度对高熵合金FeCrCoNiMn- N薄膜的形貌、组织结构和导电性能有显著影响。随衬底温度的升高，薄膜的表面粗糙度和颗粒/晶粒尺寸增大；与氮反应沉积后，含氮高熵合金薄膜中形成了Mn3N2、MnN、Cr2N和CrN金属氮化物，而Fe、Ni和Co元素则以Fe- Ni- Co合金相形式存在。不含氮合金薄膜其电阻率高达131. 78mΩ·cm，加入氮沉积后，随衬底温度的增加，含? ∧さ牡缱杪手鸾ゼ跣?6. 14~0. 43mΩ·cm)，含氮合金薄膜的电阻率明显小于合金靶材的沉积膜，衬底温度500℃时薄膜的电阻率达到最小值0. 43mΩ·cm。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: The influence of substrate temperature on the structure and electrical properties of FeCrCoNiMn high entropy alloy nitride films
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The nanostructured FeCrCoNiMn high entropy alloy nitride films were prepared on Si(100) substrate by radio- frequency reactive magnetron sputtering. The influence of substrate temperature(40, 300, 500℃) on morphology, elemental composition, microstructure and electrical resistivity of the films were investigated by XRD, FESEM, AFM, EPMA, XPS and four point probe tester. The study showed that the substrate temperature had a significant influence on the morphology, microstructure and electrical conductivity of the films. With the increase of substrate temperature, surface roughness and the particles/grain size of films increased gradually. The films formed metal nitrides Mn3N2, CrN, Cr2N and CrN, the Fe, Ni, Co elements were existed in the form of Fe- Ni- Co alloy. The electrical resistivity of the high entropy alloy film was as high as 131. 78mΩ·cm. With increasing substrate temperature, the electrical resistivity of the alloy nitride films gradually decreased from 6. 14 to 0. 43mΩ·cm, and the resistivity of alloy nitride films was significantly lower than that of the high entropy alloy film, and the resistivity reached a minimum value of 0. 43mΩ·cm at 500℃ substrate temperature.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.citation:

YANG Ke- jiang,ZHANG Guo- qing,WANG Liang- bing,LUO Yong- chun,. The influence of substrate temperature on the structure and electrical properties of FeCrCoNiMn high entropy alloy nitride films. , 2018, 25(2): 36-42.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 冷却速率对ZrCuAlNiNb块体金属玻璃室温塑性及断裂强度的影响
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 刘保串，徐佺，丁华平，张启东，马郁柏，祖方遒
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 合肥工业大学材料科学与工程学院,金属液/固加工研究所，安徽 合肥 230009
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 通过水冷铜模吸铸法制备出了不同直径的Zr57Nb5Cu15. 4Ni12. 6Al10金属玻璃棒材，研究了冷却速率对该金属玻璃室温塑性及断裂强度的影响。结果表明，冷却速率从63K/s逐步增加至1000K/s,该金属玻璃室温压缩塑性却从0. 41%显著增加到31. 43%，其断裂强度也随之从1706MPa显著提高至2556MPa，两者均表现出对冷却速率有强烈依赖关系。差热分析揭示这种依赖关系归因于随着冷却速率的提高，该金属玻璃中自由体积显著增加。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Effect of cooling rate on compressive plasticity of ZrCuAlNiNb bulk metallic glasses
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The influence of cooling rate on the plasticity and fracture strength of Zr57Nb5Cu15. 4Ni12. 6Al10 was studied by using samples with the diameters of 2mm, 5mm, and 8mm which were prepared by the water- cooled copper mould.The experimental results indicated that the cooling rate while only gradually increased from 63K/s to 1000K/s, the the room temperature compressive plasticity, jumped from 0. 41% to 31. 43%, the fracture strength has been significantly higher from 1706MPa to 2556MPa, both show a strong dependence on the cooling rate. The differential thermal analysis reveals that the dependence is attributed to the significant increase in the free volume of the Zr57Nb5Cu15. 4Ni12. 6Al10 as the cooling rate increases.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.citation:
刘保串，徐佺，丁华平，张启东，马郁柏，祖方遒. 冷却速率对ZrCuAlNiNb块体金属玻璃室温塑性及断裂强度的影响[J]. , 2018, 25(2): 32-35.
LIU Bao- chuan，XU Quan，DING Hua- ping，ZHANG Qi- dong，MA Yu- bo，ZU Fang- qiu. Effect of cooling rate on compressive plasticity of ZrCuAlNiNb bulk metallic glasses. , 2018, 25(2): 32-35.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 核电蒸发器水室隔板用镍基合金厚板的研制新进展
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 刘孝荣,徐长征
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 宝山钢铁股份有限公司中央研究院，上海 201900
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 介绍了宝钢特钢压水堆核电站蒸汽发生器下封头水室隔板用镍基合金厚板在成分优化、大钢锭均质化制造、热加工技术和热处理组织均匀性控制等方面的技术进步。采用该技术的镍基合金热轧厚板产品已具备产业化制造能力。镍基合金热轧厚板产品组织及力学性能全部满足水室隔板设计标准要求，可完全替代进口。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Research progress of nickel- based alloy thick plate for nuclear power steam generator divider plate
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The important development progresses of the nickel- based alloy thick plate used as the steam generator divider plate in the pressurized water reactor nuclear power plant produced were introduced in Baosteel Special Metal Co. Ltd. during the 12th Five- year Plan period. The technological progress of nickel- base alloy thick plate, such as the optimization of the alloying elements, the homogenization of the large- scale alloy ingot, the homogenization of the microstructures during the hot- working and heat treatment processes, are mainly introduced. All these progresses benefit the homogenization of alloying elements and microstructures of thick hot- rolled nickel- based alloy plate, and the capacity of the industrialized production of alloy 690 has been achieved by the establishment of the entire manufacturing process. Both the microstructure and mechanical properties of the plates coincide the design standards of the divider plate, indicating that the present products can substitute the imported products completely.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.citation:
刘孝荣 徐长征. 核电蒸发器水室隔板用镍基合金厚板的研制新进展[J]. , 2018, 25(2): 47-52.
LIU Xiao- rong,XU Chang- zheng. Research progress of nickel- based alloy thick plate for nuclear power steam generator divider plate. , 2018, 25(2): 47-52.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 低温回火工艺对冷轧6. 5%高硅电工钢复合板的影响
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 姬帅,雷西虎,刘忠军
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 西安石油大学材料科学与工程学院，陕西 西安 710065
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 将温轧后的0. 38mm 6. 5%(质量分数)高硅电工钢复合板在冷轧前进行不同的热处理工艺，通过光学显微镜观察了不同状态的复合板经过冷轧的显微组织；测试了各组复合板冷轧后的磁感应强度和铁损，对比了复合板冷轧前后的显微硬度值。研究表明，中温变形后的复合板空冷至室温后直接冷轧，其塑性差、裂纹多、硬度高、磁性能差，低温回火工艺不能阻止复合板在冷轧过程中出现裂纹，对其室温塑性和磁性能没有本质提高，淬火结合低温回火工艺可以有效地抑制复合板芯层发生有序相转变，可以显著提高其室温塑性和磁性能。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Effect of low tempering on cold rolling of 6. 5%Si electrical composite plate
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The 0. 38mm 6. 5%Si electrical composite plate is carried out the different heat treatment processing before cold rolling. Microstructure of the different states of 6. 5%Si electrical composite plate is observed by optical microscope. The magnetic property of different groups of 6. 5%Si electrical composite plate is measured. The microhardness of 6. 5%Si electrical composite plate both before and after cold rolling is compared. The results show that during the stage of 6. 5%Si electrical composite plate after warm rolling cooled to room temperature, its plastic property, magnetic property and microhardness is poor. Its plastic property at room temperature is not improved essentially by virtue of low tempering could not prevent the composite plate from cracking during cold rolling. The order phase transition of core layer of composite plate is effectively restrained because of quenching combined with low temperature tempering, and the room temperature plastic property and magnetic property of 6. 5%Si electrical composite plate could be developed significantly.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.citation:
姬帅 雷西虎 刘忠军. 低温回火工艺对冷轧6. 5%高硅电工钢复合板的影响[J]. , 2018, 25(2): 26-31.
JI Shuai,LEI Xi- hu,LIU Zhong- jun. Effect of low tempering on cold rolling of 6. 5%Si electrical composite plate. , 2018, 25(2): 26-31.

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 导热材料对某相变储热器性能的影响
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.author_cn: 李响
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 中国西南电子技术研究所，四川 成都 610036
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 以复合相变材料中的导热增强材料为研究对象，制作了4种储热器样件用于研究导热材料对储热器性能的影响。样件包含泡沫铜和泡沫碳两种不同导热材料、导热材料与金属壳体焊接和压力接触两种不同导热形式、高孔隙率和低孔隙率两种不同的泡沫铜规格，通过试验得出各对比要素对储热器性能的影响。试验表明，采用泡沫碳作为导热材料储热器样件导热性和温控性能好于泡沫铜，导热材料与金属壳体间采用了焊接工艺的储热器样件温控性能明显好于压力接触，泡沫铜导热材料的孔隙率对储热器性能的影响不大。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Effects of thermal conductive material on the performance of a phase change heat storage device
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The thermal conductive material (TCM) in composite phase change material (PCM) was studied, and four kinds of heat storage devices as samples to review the effects of TCM on the performance of heat storage devices were designed. The samples materials include copper and carbon foam, the thermal conductivity between TCM and metal shell covers welding and pressure contact, and the copper foam has two specifications, i. e. the high porosity and the low one. The effects of each element on the performance of heat storage device can be compared by means of experiments. Tests show that thermal conductivity and temperature control capability of carbon foam are better than those of copper foam, and the temperature control capability of welding is much better than that of pressure contact, and porosity of copper foam has less effect on the performance of heat storage devices.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.citation:

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_cn: 电解铜箔与压延铜箔微观组织和性能差异性的研究
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn:
1. 兰州理工大学材料科学与工程学院, 甘肃 兰州 730050
2. 省部共建有色金属先进加工与再利用国家重点实验室, 甘肃 兰州 730050
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 利用SEM和XRD分析电解铜箔和压延铜箔的微观组织及晶粒取向，通过表面粗糙度测试仪和耐折弯测试仪对两种铜箔进行性能测试。研究结果表明，电解铜箔晶粒成尖锥状，电沉积有一定的方向性，在(220)晶面上电解铜箔的衍射峰强度随着其厚度减小的而增加；压延铜箔晶粒成丘陵状，且沿轧制方向被拉长，晶面取向不随厚度的改变而变化；电解铜箔的表面粗糙度随厚度的增加而增加，压延铜箔的各个方向各种厚度上的粗糙度均比电解铜箔的小，且不随厚度变化；两种类型的铜箔的耐折弯次数均随厚度的增大而减小，相同厚度上压延铜箔耐折弯次数最高多电解铜箔52. 6%。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Differences of microstructures and properties of the electrodeposited and rolled copper foils
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The microstructures and grains orientation of electrodeposited and rolled copper foils were analyzed by SEM and XRD, the performance of the two kinds of copper foils were tested by the roughometer and the bending tester. The results showed that the electrodeposited copper foils grains were sharp- peaked and electrodeposition had a certain direction, and the diffraction peak intensity of the electrodeposited copper foils on the (220) crystal face increased with thickness decreasing. Rolled copper foils grains were hill- shape, which was elongated along the rolling direction, and the orientation of crystal face didn′t change with the thickness. The surface roughness of electrodeposited copper foils increased with thickness increasing, and in all directions and all the thickness, the roughness of rolled copper foils were smaller than the electrodeposited ones and didn′t change with the thickness. The bending resistance times of the two types of copper foils both decreased with the increasing of the thickness, on which the rolled copper foils were 52. 6% the highest more than that of the electrodeposited ones at same thickness.
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.citation:

http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.org_cn: 西安汽车科技职业学院,陕西 西安 710605
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_cn: 综述了通过化学转化膜提高镁合金基体的耐腐蚀性的方法，分析了磷酸盐、铈酸盐、锡酸盐、钼酸盐和植酸盐等无毒环保的工艺技术优缺点和研究现状及发展趋势。
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.title_en: Study of chemical conversion film on the surface of magnesium alloy
http://edit.chinamet.cn/Jweb_jsgncl/CN/a.abstract_en: Abstract：The methods of improving the corrosion resistance of magnesium alloy matrix by chemical conversion coating were reviewed. The advantages and disadvantages of phosphate, cerium, stannate, molybdate and phytate are analyzed, and the research status and development trend are also discussed.
